original: viṣṇuḥ sisṛkṣur bhūtāni jñātvā bhūmiṃ jalānugām // Vi_1.1 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ sisṛkṣuḥ bhūtāni jñātvā bhūmim jala anugām
jala krīḍā ruci śubham kalpa ādhiṣu yathā purā

original: vārāham āsthito rūpam ujjahāra vasuṃdharām // Vi_1.2 //

analyzed: veda pādaḥ yūpa daṃṣṭraḥ kratu dantaḥ citī mukhaḥ
agni jihvaḥ darbha romā brahma śīrṣaḥ mahā tapāḥ
ājya nāsaḥ sruva tuṇḍaḥ sāma ghoṣa svanaḥ mahān
vedi antarātmā mantra sphic vikṛtaḥ soma śoṇitaḥ
vedi skandhaḥ haviḥ gandhaḥ havya kavya ādi vegavān
prāgvaṃṣa kāyaḥ dyutimān nānā dīkṣābhiḥ anvitaḥ
dakṣiṇā hṛdayaḥ yoga mahā mantra mayaḥ mahān
chāyā patnī sahāyaḥ vai maṇi śṛṅgaḥ iva uditaḥ
mahīm sāgara paryantām sa śaila vana kānanām
ekārṇava jala bhraṣṭām ekārṇava gataḥ prabhuḥ
daṃṣṭra agreṇa samuddhṛtya lokānām hita kāmyayā

original: ādidevo mahāyogī cakāra jagatīṃ punaḥ // Vi_1.11 //
analyzed: ādidevaḥ mahā yogī cakāra jagatīm punar
evam yajñavarāheṇa bhūtvā bhūta hita arthinā

original: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī rasātalagatā purā // Vi_1.12 //
analyzed: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī rasātala gatā purā

original: uddhṛtya niścale sthāne sthāpayitvā tathā svake /
analyzed: uddhṛtya niścale sthāne sthāpayitvā tathā svake
yathāsthānam vibhajya apaḥ tad gatāḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: sāmudryaś ca samudreṣu nādeyīś ca nadīṣu ca /
analyzed: sāmudryaḥ ca samudreṣu nādeyīḥ ca nadīṣu ca

original: palvaleṣu ca pālvalyaḥ saraḥsu ca sarobhavāḥ // Vi_1.14 //
analyzed: palvaleṣu ca pālvalyaḥ saraḥsu ca saraḥ bhavāḥ
pātāla saptakam cakre lokānām saptakam tathā

original: dvīpānām udadhīnāṃ ca sthānāni vividhāni ca // Vi_1.15 //
analyzed: dvīpānām udadhīnām ca sthānāni vividhāni ca

original: ṛṣīṃś ca sapta dharmajñān vedān sānṅān surāsurān // Vi_1.16 //
analyzed: ṛṣīn ca sapta dharma jñān vedān sa anṅān sura asurān
piśāca uraga gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa mānuṣān

original: meghendracāpaśampādyān yajñāṃś ca vividhāṃs tathā // Vi_1.17 //
analyzed: megha indracāpa śampā ādyān yajñān ca vividhān tathā
evam varāhaḥ bhagavān kṛtvā idam sacarācaram

original: jagaj jagāma lokānām avijñātāṃ tadā gatim // Vi_1.18 //
analyzed: jagat jagāma lokānām a vijñātām tadā gatim
a vijñātām gatim yāte devadeve janārdane

original: vasudhā cintayām āsa kā dhṛtir me bhaviṣyati // Vi_1.19 //
analyzed: vasudhā cintayām āsa kā dhṛtiḥ me bhaviṣyati

original: pṛcchāmi kaśyapaṃ gatvā sa me vakṣyaty asaṃśayam /
analyzed: pṛcchāmi kaśyapam gatvā sa me vakṣyati asaṃśayam

original: madīyāṃ vahate cintāṃ nityam eva mahāmuniḥ // Vi_1.20 //
analyzed: madīyām vahate cintām nityam eva mahā muniḥ

original: evaṃ sā niścayaṃ kṛtvā devī strīrūpadhāriṇī /
analyzed: evam sā niścayam kṛtvā devī strī rūpa dhāriṇī

original: jagāma kaśyapaṃ draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tāṃ ca kaśyapaḥ // Vi_1.21 //
analyzed: jagāma kaśyapam draṣṭum dṛṣṭavān tām ca kaśyapaḥ
nīla paṅkaja patra akṣīm śārada indu nibha ānanām
ali saṃgha alakām śubhrām bandhujīva adharām śubhām
su bhrūm su sūkṣma daśanām cāru nāsām nata bhruvam
kambu kaṇṭhīm saṃhata ūrūm pīna ūru jaghana sthalām

original: virejatuḥ stanau yasyāḥ samau pīnau nirantarau /
analyzed: virejatuḥ stanau yasyāḥ samau pīnau nirantarau
śakra ibha kumbha saṃkāśau śātakumbha sama dyutī
mṛṇāla komalau bāhū karau kisalaya upamau

original: rukmastambhanibhāv ūrū gūḍhe śliṣṭe ca jānunī // Vi_1.25 //
analyzed: rukma stambha nibhau ūrū gūḍhe śliṣṭe ca jānunī
jaṅghe virome su same pādau ati manoramau

original: jaghanaṃ ca ghanaṃ madhyaṃ yathā kesariṇaḥ śiśoḥ // Vi_1.26 //
analyzed: jaghanam ca ghanam madhyam yathā kesariṇaḥ śiśoḥ
prabhā yutāḥ nakhāḥ tāmrāḥ rūpam sarva manoharam

original: kurvāṇāṃ vīkṣitair nityaṃ nīlotpalayutā diśaḥ // Vi_1.27 //
analyzed: kurvāṇām vīkṣitaiḥ nityam nīlotpala yutāḥ diśaḥ

original: kurvāṇāṃ prabhayā devīṃ tathā vitimirā diśaḥ /
analyzed: kurvāṇām prabhayā devīm tathā vitimirāḥ diśaḥ
su sūkṣma śukla vasanām ratna uttama vibhūṣitām
padanyāsaiḥ vasumatīm sa padmām iva kurvatīm
rūpa yauvana saṃpannām vinīta vat upasthitām
samīpam āgatām dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā atha kaśyapaḥ

original: uvāca tāṃ varārohe vijñātaṃ hṛdgataṃ mayā // Vi_1.30 //
analyzed: uvāca tām varārohe vijñātam hṛdgatam mayā

original: dhare tava viśālākṣi gaccha devi janārdanam /
analyzed: dhare tava viśāla akṣi gaccha devi janārdanam

original: sa te vakṣyaty aśeṣeṇa bhāvinī te yathā dhṛtiḥ // Vi_1.31 //
analyzed: sa te vakṣyati aśeṣeṇa bhāvinī te yathā dhṛtiḥ

original: kṣīrode vasatis tasya mayā jñātā śubhānane /
analyzed: kṣīrode vasatiḥ tasya mayā jñātā śubha ānane
dhyāna yogena cāru aṅgi tvad artham tad prasādataḥ

original: ity evam uktā saṃpūjya kaśyapaṃ vasudhā tataḥ /
analyzed: iti evam uktā saṃpūjya kaśyapam vasudhā tatas

original: prayayau keśavaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṣīrodam atha sāgaram // Vi_1.33 //
analyzed: prayayau keśavam draṣṭum kṣīrodam atha sāgaram
sā dadarśa amṛta nidhim candra raśmi manoharam
pavana kṣobha saṃjāta vīcī śata samākulam

original: vīcīhastaiḥ pracalitair āhvayānam iva kṣitim // Vi_1.35 //
analyzed: vīcī hastaiḥ pracalitaiḥ āhvayānam iva kṣitim

original: tair eva śuklatāṃ candre vidadhānam ivāniśam /
analyzed: taiḥ eva śukla tām candre vidadhānam iva aniśam

original: yasmāt tasmād dhārayantaṃ suśuklāṃ tanum ūrjitām /
analyzed: yasmāt tasmāt dhārayantam su śuklām tanum ūrjitām
pāṇḍuram khagama agamyam adhas bhuvana vartinam
indranīla kaḍāra āḍhyam viparītam iva ambaram

original: nirmokam iva śeṣāher vistīrṇāntam atīva hi /
analyzed: nirmokam iva śeṣa aheḥ vistīrṇa antam atīva hi

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra madhyasthaṃ daḍṛśe keśavālayam // Vi_1.39 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tatra madhya stham daḍṛśe keśavālayam
śeṣa paryaṅka gam tasmin dadarśa madhusūdanam
śeṣa ahi phaṇa ratna aṃśu durvibhāvya mukha ambujam
śaśāṅka śata saṃkāśam sūrya ayuta sama prabham
pīta vāsasam akṣobhyam sarva ratna vibhūṣitam

original: jānubhyām avaniṃ gatvā vijñāpayati cāpy atha // Vi_1.44 //
analyzed: jānubhyām avanim gatvā vijñāpayati ca api atha

original: svasthāne sthāpitā viṣṇo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // Vi_1.45 //
analyzed: sva sthāne sthāpitāḥ viṣṇo lokānām hita kāmyayā

original: tatrādhunā hi deveśa kā dhṛtir me bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra adhunā hi deveśa kā dhṛtiḥ me bhaviṣyati

original: evam uktas tayā devyā devo vacanam abravīt // Vi_1.46 //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tayā devyā devaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: tvāṃ dhare dhārayiṣyanti teṣāṃ tvadbhāra āhitaḥ // Vi_1.47 //
analyzed: tvām dhare dhārayiṣyanti teṣām tvad bhāraḥ āhitaḥ

original: varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmān vada sanātana // Vi_1.48 //
analyzed: varṇānām āśramāṇām ca dharmān vada sanātana

original: tvatto 'ham śrotum icchāmi tvaṃ hi me paramā gatiḥ /
analyzed: tvattaḥ ham śrotum icchāmi tvam hi me paramā gatiḥ
namaḥ te devadeveśa devāri bala sūdana
nārāyaṇa jagannātha śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: varāha bhīma govinda purāṇa puruṣottama // Vi_1.51 //

analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajña deva īśa salila arṇava śāyaka
mantra mantravaha acintya veda vedāṅga vigraha
jagataḥ sya samagrasya sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kāraka
dharma adharma jña dharma aṅga dharma yone vara prada
viṣvaksena amṛta vyoma madhu kaiṭabha sūdana
bṛhatām bṛṃhaṇa ajñeya sarva sarva abhaya prada
vareṇya anagha jīmūta jagat nirmāṇa kāraka
āpyāyana apām sthāna caitanya ādhāra niṣkriya
sapta śīrṣa adhvara guro purāṇa puruṣottama
dhruva akṣara su sūkṣma īśa bhakta vatsala pāvana

original: tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvadevānāṃ tvaṃ gatir brahmavādinām // Vi_1.57 //
analyzed: tvam gatiḥ sarva devānām tvam gatiḥ brahma vādinām

original: prapannāsmi jagannātha dhruvaṃ vācaspatiṃ prabhum // Vi_1.58 //
analyzed: prapannā asmi jagannātha dhruvam vācaspatim prabhum
su brahmaṇyam anādhṛṣyam vasu seṇam vasu pradam
mahā yoga bala upetam pṛśni garbham dhṛta
sura asura gurum devam vibhum bhūta mahā īśvaram
eka vyūham caturbāhum jagat kāraṇa kāraṇam

original: brūhi me bhagavan dharmāṃś cāturvarṇyasya śāśvatān // Vi_1.61 //
analyzed: brūhi me bhagavan dharmān cāturvarṇyasya śāśvatān

original: evam uktas tu deveśaḥ kṣoṇyā kṣoṇīm abhāṣata // Vi_1.62 //
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu deveśaḥ kṣoṇyā kṣoṇīm abhāṣata

original: śṛṇu devi dhare dharmāṃś cāturvarṇyasya śāśvatān /
analyzed: śṛṇu devi dhare dharmān cāturvarṇyasya śāśvatān

original: ye tu tvāṃ dhārayiṣyanti santas teṣāṃ parāyaṇān /
analyzed: ye tu tvām dhārayiṣyanti santaḥ teṣām parāyaṇān

original: niṣaṇṇā bhava vāmoru kāñcane 'smin varāsane // Vi_1.64 //
analyzed: niṣaṇṇā bhava vāma ūru kāñcane smin varāsane

original: sukhāsīnā nibodha tvaṃ dharmān nigadato mama /
analyzed: sukha āsīnā nibodha tvam dharmāt nigadataḥ mama

original: śuśruve vaiṣṇavān dharmān sukhāsīnā dharā tadā // Vi_1.65 // Vi_2

original: om / brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ceti varṇāś catvāraḥ // Vi_2.1 //
analyzed: om brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ ca iti varṇāḥ catvāraḥ

original: teṣāṃ niṣekādyaḥ śmaśānānto mantravat kriyāsamūhaḥ // Vi_2.3 //
analyzed: teṣām niṣeka ādyaḥ śmaśāna antaḥ mantravat kriyā samūhaḥ

original: kṣamā satyam damaḥ śaucaṃ dānam indriyasaṃyamaḥ /
analyzed: kṣamā satyam damaḥ śaucam dānam indriya saṃyamaḥ
ahiṃsā guru śuśrūṣā tīrtha anusaraṇam dayā

original: anabhyasūyā ca tathā dharmaḥ sāmānya ucyate // Vi_2.17 // Vi_3
analyzed: anabhyasūyā ca tathā dharmaḥ sāmānyaḥ ucyate vi

original: varṇāśramāṇāṃ sve sve dharme vyavasthāpanam // Vi_3.3 //
analyzed: varṇa āśramāṇām sve sve dharme vyavasthāpanam

original: rājā ca jāṅgalaṃ paśavyaṃ sasyopetaṃ deśam āśrayet // Vi_3.4 //
analyzed: rājā ca jāṅgalam paśavyam sasya upetam deśam āśrayet

original: tatra dhanvanṛmahīvārivṛkṣagiridurgāṇām anyatamaṃ durgam āśrayet // Vi_3.6 //
analyzed: tatra dhanva nṛ mahī vāri vṛkṣa giri durgāṇām anyatamam durgam āśrayet
tatrasthaḥ ca sva sva grāma adhipān kuryāt
grāma doṣāṇām grāma adhyakṣaḥ parihāram kuryāt
a śaktaḥ daśa grāma adhyakṣāya nivedayet
saḥ u pi a śaktaḥ śata adhyakṣāya
saḥ pi a śaktaḥ deśa adhyakṣāya
deśa adhyakṣaḥ u pi sarva ātmanā doṣam ucchindyāt
ākara śulka tara nāga vaneśu āptān niyuñjīta

original: prajābhyo balyarthaṃ saṃvatsareṇa dhānyataḥ ṣaṣṭham aṃśam ādadyāt // Vi_3.22 //
analyzed: prajābhyaḥ bali artham saṃvatsareṇa dhānyataḥ ṣaṣṭham aṃśam ādadyāt

original: dvikaṃ śataṃ paśuhiraṇyebhyo vastrebhyaś ca // Vi_3.24 //
analyzed: dvikam śatam paśu hiraṇyebhyaḥ vastrebhyaḥ ca
māṃsa madhu ghṛta auṣadhi gandha puṣpa mūla phala rasa dāru patra ajina mṛd bhāṇḍa aśma bhāṇḍa vaidalebhyaḥ ṣāṣṭha bhāgam rājā

original: rājā ca prajābhyaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhāṃśabhāk // Vi_3.28 //
analyzed: rājā ca prajābhyaḥ sukṛta duṣkṛtebhyaḥ ṣaṣṭha aṃśa bhāj

original: svadeśapaṇyāc ca śulkāṃśaṃ daśamam ādadyāt // Vi_3.29 //
analyzed: sva deśa paṇyāt ca śulka aṃśam daśamam ādadyāt

original: śilpinaḥ karmajīvinaś ca māsenaikaṃ rājñaḥ karma kuryuḥ // Vi_3.32 //
analyzed: śilpinaḥ karma jīvinaḥ ca māsena ekam rājñaḥ karma kuryuḥ
svāmi amātya durga kośa daṇḍa rāṣṭra mitrāṇi prakṛtayaḥ

original: śatrumitrodāsīnamadhyameṣu sāmabhedadānadaṇḍān yathārhaṃ yathākālaṃ prayuñjīta // Vi_3.38 //
analyzed: śatru mitra udāsīna madhyameṣu sāma bheda dāna daṇḍān yathārham yathākālam prayuñjīta

original: caitre mārgaśīrṣe vā yātrāṃ yāyāt // Vi_3.40 //

analyzed: para deśa avāptau tad deśa dharmān na ucchindyāt

original: pareṇābhiyuktaś ca sarvātmanā svarāṣṭraṃ gopāyet // Vi_3.43 //
analyzed: pareṇa abhiyuktaḥ ca sarva ātmanā sva rāṣṭram gopāyet

original: nāsti rājñāṃ samare tanutyāgasadṛśo dharmaḥ // Vi_3.44 //
analyzed: na asti rājñām samare tanu tyāga sadṛśaḥ dharmaḥ

original: rājā parapurāvāptau tatra tatkulīnam abhiṣiñcet // Vi_3.47 //
analyzed: rājā para pura avāptau tatra tad kulīnam abhiṣiñcet

original: nidhiṃ labdhvā tadardhaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dadyāt // Vi_3.56 //
analyzed: nidhim labdhvā tad ardham brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadyāt

original: nidhiṃ brāhmaṇo labdhvā sarvam ādadyāt // Vi_3.58 //
vaiṣyas tu caturtham aṃśaṃ rājñe dadyāt,
analyzed: vaiṣyaḥ tu caturtham aṃśam rājñe dadyāt

original: śūdraś cāvāptaṃ dvādaśadhā vibhajya pañcāṃśān rājñe dadyāt,
analyzed: śūdraḥ ca avāptam dvādaśadhā vibhajya pañca aṃśān rājñe dadyāt

original: svanihitād rājñe brāhmaṇavarjaṃ dvādaśam aṃśaṃ dadyuḥ // Vi_3.63 //
analyzed: sva nihitāt rājñe brāhmaṇa varjam dvādaśam aṃśam dadyuḥ

original: paranihitaṃ svanihitam iti bruvaṃs tatsamaṃ daṇḍam āvahet // Vi_3.64 //
analyzed: para nihitam sva nihitam iti bruvan tad samam daṇḍam āvahet

original: caurahṛtaṃ dhanam avāpya sarvam eva sarvavarṇebhyo dadyāt // Vi_3.66 //
analyzed: caura hṛtam dhanam avāpya sarvam eva sarva varṇebhyaḥ dadyāt

original: anavāpya ca svakośād eva dadyāt // Vi_3.67 //
analyzed: an avāpya ca sva kośāt eva dadyāt
śānti svastyayana upāyaiḥ daiva upaghātān praśamayet

original: vedetihāsadharmaśāstrārthakuśalaṃ kulīnam avyaṅgaṃ tapasvinaṃ purohitaṃ ca varayet // Vi_3.70 //
analyzed: veda itihāsa dharma śāstra artha kuśalam kulīnam avyaṅgam tapasvinam purohitam ca varayet

original: śucīn alubdhān avahitān śaktisaṃpannān sarvārtheṣu ca sahāyān // Vi_3.71 //
analyzed: śucīn alubdhān avahitān śakti saṃpannān sarva artheṣu ca sahāyān

original: svayam eva vyavahārān paśyed vidvadbhir brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham // Vi_3.72 //
analyzed: svayam eva vyavahārān paśyet vidvadbhiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham
janma karma vrata upetāḥ ca rājñā sabhāsadaḥ kāryāḥ
kāma krodha bhaya lobha ādibhiḥ kārya arthabhiḥ anāhāryāḥ

original: rājā ca sarvakāryeṣu sāṃvatsarādhīnaḥ syāt // Vi_3.75 //
analyzed: rājā ca sarva kāryeṣu sāṃvatsara adhīnaḥ syāt

original: na cāsya viṣaye brāhmaṇaḥ kṣudhārto 'vasīdet // Vi_3.79 //
analyzed: na ca asya viṣaye brāhmaṇaḥ kṣudhā ārtaḥ vasīdet
na ca anyaḥ sat karma nirataḥ

original: yeṣāṃ ca pratipādayet teṣāṃ svavaṃśyān bhuvaḥ parimāṇaṃ dānacchedopavarṇanaṃ ca paṭe tāmrapaṭṭe vā likhitaṃ svamudrāṅkitaṃ cāgāminṛpativijñāpanārthaṃ  #
analyzed: yeṣām ca pratipādayet teṣām sva vaṃśyān bhuvaḥ parimāṇam dāna cheda upavarṇanam ca paṭe tāmra paṭṭe vā likhitam sva mudrā aṅkitam ca āgāmi nṛpati vijñāpana artham
para dattām ca bhuvam na apaharet
viṣa ghna agada mantra dhārī ca

original: vadhyeṣv api na bhruṃkuṭīm ācaret // Vi_3.90 //
aparādhānurūpaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu dāpayet // Vi_3.91 //
analyzed: aparādha anurūpam ca daṇḍam daṇḍyeṣu dāpayet

original: dvitīyam aparādhaṃ na sa kasyacit kṣameta // Vi_3.93 //
analyzed: dvitīyam aparādham na sa kasyacid kṣameta

original: svadharmam apālayan nādaṇḍyo nāmāsti rājñām // Vi_3.94 //
analyzed: svadharmam a pālayan na a daṇḍyaḥ nāma asti rājñām

original: yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati nirbhayaḥ /
analyzed: yatra śyāmaḥ lohita akṣaḥ daṇḍaḥ carati nirbhayaḥ

original: prajās tatra vivardhante netā cet sādhu paśyati // Vi_3.95 //
analyzed: prajāḥ tatra vivardhante netā ced sādhu paśyati

original: svarāṣṭro nyāyadaṇḍaḥ syād bhṛśadaṇḍaś ca śatruṣu /
analyzed: sva rāṣṭraḥ nyāya daṇḍaḥ syāt bhṛśa daṇḍaḥ ca śatruṣu

original: suhṛtsv ajihmaḥ snigdheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamānvitaḥ // Vi_3.96 //
analyzed: suhṛtsu a jihmaḥ snigdheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamā anvitaḥ

original: vistīryate yaśo loke tailabindur ivāmbhasi // Vi_3.97 //
analyzed: vistīryate yaśaḥ loke taila binduḥ iva ambhasi

original: prajāsukhe sukhī rājā tadduḥkhe yaś ca duḥkhitaḥ /
analyzed: prajā sukhe sukhī rājā tad duḥkhe yaḥ ca duḥkhitaḥ

original: sa kīrtiyukto loke 'smin pretya svarge mahīyate // Vi_3.98 // Vi_4
analyzed: sa kīrti yuktaḥ loke smin pretya svarge mahīyate vi
jāla stha arka marīci gatam rajaḥ trasareṇu saṃjñakam
akṣa ardham eva sa catur māṣakam suvarṇaḥ

original: paṇānāṃ dve śate sārdhe prathamaḥ sāhasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: paṇānām dve śate sārdhe prathamaḥ sāhasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: madhyamaḥ pañca vijñeyaḥ sahasraṃ tv eṣa cottamaḥ // Vi_4.14 // Vi_5
analyzed: madhyamaḥ pañca vijñeyaḥ sahasram tu eṣa ca uttamaḥ vi

original: atha mahāpātakino brāhmaṇavarjaṃ sarve vadhyāḥ // Vi_5.1 //
analyzed: atha mahāpātakinaḥ brāhmaṇa varjam sarve vadhyāḥ
sva deśāt brāhmaṇam kṛta aṅkam vivāsayet

original: tasya ca brahmahatyāyām aśiraskaṃ puruṣaṃ lalāṭe kuryāt // Vi_5.4 //
analyzed: tasya ca brahmahatyāyām aśiraskam puruṣam lalāṭe kuryāt

original: anyatrāpi vadhyakarmaṇi tiṣṭhantaṃ samagradhanam akṣataṃ vivāsayet // Vi_5.8 //
analyzed: anyatra api vadhya karmaṇi tiṣṭhantam samagra dhanam akṣatam vivāsayet
garada agnida prasahya taskarān strī bāla puruṣa ghātinaḥ ca

original: ye ca dhānyaṃ daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyo 'dhikam apahareyuḥ // Vi_5.12 //
analyzed: ye ca dhānyam daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyaḥ dhikam apahareyuḥ

striyam a śakta bhartṛkām tad atikramaṇīm ca

original: hīnavarṇo 'dhikavarṇasya yenāṅgenāparādhaṃ kuryāt tad evāsya śātayet // Vi_5.19 //
analyzed: hīna varṇaḥ dhika varṇasya yena aṅgena aparādham kuryāt tat eva asya śātayet
eka āsana upaveśī kaṭyām kṛta aṅkaḥ nirvāsyaḥ

original: darpeṇa dharmopadeśakāriṇāṃ rājā taptam āsecayet tailam āsye // Vi_5.24 //
analyzed: darpeṇa dharma upadeśa kāriṇām rājā taptam āsecayet tailam āsye

original: droheṇa ca nāmajātigrahaṇe daśāṅgulo 'sya śaṅkur nikheyaḥ // Vi_5.25 //
analyzed: droheṇa ca nāma jāti grahaṇe daśa aṅgulaḥ sya śaṅkuḥ nikheyaḥ
śruta deśa jāti karmaṇām anyathāvādī kārśāpaṇa śata dvayam daṇḍyaḥ
kāṇa khañja ādīnām tathya vādi api kārśā paṇa dvayam
parasya patanīya ākṣepe kṛte tu uttama sāhasam
traividya vṛddhānām kṣepe jāti pūgānām ca
nyaṅga tā yukte kṣepe kārśāpaṇa śatam
sama varṇa ākrośane dvādaśa paṇān daṇḍyaḥ
hīna varṇa a kṛt uśane ṣaṭ
yathākālam uttama varṇa ākṣepe tad pramāṇaḥ daṇḍaḥ
śukta vākya abhidhāne tu evam eva
pārajāyī savarṇa āgamane tu uttamasāhasam daṇḍyaḥ

original: doṣam anākhyāya kanyāṃ prayacchaṃś ca // Vi_5.45 //
analyzed: doṣam an ākhyāya kanyām prayacchan ca

original: aduṣṭāṃ duṣṭām iti bruvann uttamasāhasam // Vi_5.47 //

analyzed: gaja aśva uṣṭra go ghātī tu eka kara pādaḥ kāryaḥ
grāmya paśu ghātī kārṣāpaṇa śatam daṇḍyaḥ

original: pakṣighātī matsyaghātī ca daśa kārṣāpaṇān // Vi_5.53 //
analyzed: pakṣi ghātī matsya ghātī ca daśa kārṣāpaṇān
phala upagama druma chedī tu uttama sāhasam
vallī gulma latā chedī kārṣāpaṇa śatam
sarve ca tad svāminām tad utpattim
pāda keśa aṃśuka kara luñcane daśa paṇān

original: śoṇitena vinā duḥkham utpādayitā dvātriṃśat paṇān // Vi_5.66 //
analyzed: śoṇitena vinā duḥkham utpādayitā dvātriṃśat paṇān
kara pāda danta bhaṅge karṇa nāsā vikartane madhyamam
ceṣṭā bhojana vāgrodhe prahāra dāne ca
netra kaṃdharā bāhu sakthi aṃsa bhaṅge ca uttamam

original: ubhayanetrabhedinaṃ rājā yāvaj jīvaṃ bandhanān na muñcet // Vi_5.71 //
analyzed: ubhaya netra bhedinam rājā yāvat jīvam bandhanāt na muñcet

original: ekaṃ bahūnāṃ nighnatāṃ pratyekam uktād daṇḍād dviguṇaḥ // Vi_5.73 //
analyzed: ekam bahūnām nighnatām pratyekam uktāt daṇḍāt dviguṇaḥ

original: utkrośantam anabhidhāvatāṃ tatsamīpavartināṃ saṃsaratāṃ ca // Vi_5.74 //
analyzed: utkrośantam an abhidhāvatām tad samīpa vartinām saṃsaratām ca

original: sarve ca puruṣapīḍākarās tadutthānavyayaṃ dadyuḥ // Vi_5.75 //
analyzed: sarve ca puruṣa pīḍā karāḥ tad utthāna vyayam dadyuḥ
go śva uṣṭra gaja apahārī eka kara pādaḥ kāryaḥ
aja avi apahārī eka karaḥ ca

original: suvarṇarajatavastrāṇāṃ pañcāśatas tv abhyadhikam apaharan vikaraḥ // Vi_5.81 //
analyzed: suvarṇa rajata vastrāṇām pañcāśataḥ tu abhyadhikam apaharan vikaraḥ
sūtra kārpāsa gomaya guḍa dadhi kṣīra takra tṛṇa lavaṇa mṛd bhasma pakṣi matsya ghṛta taila māṃsa madhu vaidala veṇu mṛd maya loha bhāṇḍānām apahartā mūlyāt triguṇam
puṣpa harita gulma vallī latā parṇānām apaharaṇe pañca kṛṣṇalam
an ukta dravyāṇām apahartā mūlya samam

original: stenāḥ sarvam apahṛtaṃ dhanikasya dāpyāḥ // Vi_5.89 //
yeṣāṃ deyaḥ panthās teṣām apathadāyī kārṣāpaṇapañcaviṃśatiṃ daṇḍyaḥ // Vi_5.91 //
analyzed: yeṣām deyaḥ panthāḥ teṣām a patha dāyī kārṣāpaṇa pañcaviṃśatim daṇḍyaḥ

original: nimantritas tathety uktvā cābhuñjānaḥ suvarṇamāṣakam // Vi_5.96 //
analyzed: nimantritaḥ tathā iti uktvā ca abhuñjānaḥ suvarṇa māṣakam

original: abhakṣyeṇa brāhmaṇasya dūṣayitā ṣoḍaśa suvarṇān // Vi_5.98 //

analyzed: a spṛśyaḥ kāmakāreṇa spṛśan spṛśyam traivarṇikam vadhyaḥ

original: gṛhe pīḍākaraṃ dravyaṃ prakṣipan paṇaśatam // Vi_5.110 //
analyzed: gṛhe pīḍākaram dravyam prakṣipan paṇa śatam

original: śūdrapravrajitānāṃ daive pitrye bhojakāś ca // Vi_5.115 //
analyzed: śūdra pravrajitānām daive pitrye bhojakāḥ ca

original: yas tayoś cāntare syāt tasyottamasāhasaḥ // Vi_5.121 //
analyzed: yaḥ tayoḥ ca antare syāt tasya uttama sāhasaḥ

original: gṛhītamūlyaṃ yaḥ paṇyaṃ kretur naiva dadyāt,
analyzed: gṛhīta mūlyam yaḥ paṇyam kretuḥ na eva dadyāt

original: krītam akrīṇato yā hāniḥ sā kretur eva syāt // Vi_5.129 //
analyzed: krītam a krīṇataḥ yā hāniḥ sā kretuḥ eva syāt

original: tarikaḥ sthalajaṃ śulkaṃ gṛhṇan daśapaṇān daṇḍyaḥ // Vi_5.131 //
analyzed: tarikaḥ sthala jam śulkam gṛhṇan daśa paṇān daṇḍyaḥ

original: brahmacārivānaprasthabhikṣugurviṇītīrthānusāriṇāṃ nāvikaḥ śaulkikaḥ śulkam ādadānaś ca // Vi_5.132 //
analyzed: brahmacāri vānaprastha bhikṣu gurviṇī tīrtha anusāriṇām nāvikaḥ śaulkikaḥ śulkam ādadānaḥ ca

original: divā paśūnāṃ vṛkādyupaghāte pāle tv anāyati pāladoṣaḥ // Vi_5.138 //
analyzed: divā paśūnām vṛka ādi upaghāte pāle tu anāyati pāla doṣaḥ

original: tatpālas tv aṣṭau māṣān daṇḍyaḥ // Vi_5.141 //
analyzed: tad pālaḥ tu aṣṭau māṣān daṇḍyaḥ
sarvatra svāmine vinaṣṭa sasya mūlyam ca

original: pathi grāme vivītānte na doṣaḥ // Vi_5.148 //
analyzed: pathi grāme vivīta ante na doṣaḥ

original: yas tūttamavarṇān dāsye niyojayet tasyottamasāhaso daṇḍaḥ // Vi_5.152 //

analyzed: bhṛtakaḥ ca apūrṇe kāle bhṛtim tyajan sakalam eva mūlyam dadyāt

original: taddoṣeṇa yad vinaśyet tat svāmine // Vi_5.156 //
analyzed: tad doṣeṇa yat vinaśyet tat svāmine

analyzed: svāmī ced bhṛtakam apūrṇe kāle jahyāt

original: yaś cānikṣiptaṃ nikṣiptam iti brūyāt // Vi_5.172 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca a nikṣiptam nikṣiptam iti brūyāt

original: sīmābhettāram uttamasāhasaṃ daṇḍayitvā punaḥ sīmāṃ kārayet // Vi_5.173 //
analyzed: sīmā bhettāram uttama sāhasam daṇḍayitvā punar sīmām kārayet

original: abhakṣyasyāvikreyasya vikrayī devapratimābhedakaś cottamasāhasaṃ daṇḍanīyaḥ // Vi_5.175 //
analyzed: abhakṣyasya avikreyasya vikrayī deva pratimā bhedakaḥ ca uttama sāhasam daṇḍanīyaḥ

original: pratiśrutasyāpradāyī tad dāpayitvā prathamasāhasaṃ daṇḍyaḥ // Vi_5.179 //
analyzed: pratiśrutasya a pradāyī tat dāpayitvā prathamasāhasam daṇḍyaḥ

analyzed: gocarma mātra adhikām bhuvam anyasya adhīkṛtām tasmāt a nirmocya anyasya yaḥ prayacchet sa vadhyaḥ

original: ūnāṃ cet ṣoḍaśa suvarṇān daṇḍyaḥ // Vi_5.183 //

analyzed: ekaḥ śnīyāt yat utpannam naraḥ saṃvatsaram phalam

original: gocarmamātrā sā kṣoṇī stokā vā yadi vā bahu // Vi_5.184 //
analyzed: gocarma mātrā sā kṣoṇī stokāḥ vā yadi vā bahu

original: yayor nikṣipta ādhis tau vivadetāṃ yadā narau /
analyzed: yayoḥ nikṣiptaḥ ādhiḥ tau vivadetām yadā narau

original: yasya bhuktiḥ phalaṃ tasya balāt kāraṃ vinā kṛtā // Vi_5.185 //
analyzed: yasya bhuktiḥ phalam tasya balāt kāram vinā kṛtā

original: sāgamena tu bhogena bhuktaṃ samyag yadā tu yat /
analyzed: sa āgamena tu bhogena bhuktam samyak yadā tu yat

original: āhartā labhate tatra nāpahāryaṃ tu tat kvacit // Vi_5.186 //
analyzed: āhartā labhate tatra na apahāryam tu tat kvacid

analyzed: tasmin prete na vācyā u sau bhuktyā prāptam hi tasya tat

original: tribhir eva tu yā bhuktā puruṣair bhūr yathāvidhi /

original: lekhyābhāve 'pi tāṃ tatra caturthaḥ samavāpnuyāt // Vi_5.188 //
analyzed: lekhya abhāve pi tām tatra caturthaḥ samavāpnuyāt

original: hastyaśvānāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ vadhe hantā na doṣabhāk // Vi_5.189 //
analyzed: hasti aśvānām tathā anyeṣām vadhe hantā na doṣa bhāj

original: guruṃ vā bālavṛddhau vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā bahuśrutam /
analyzed: gurum vā bāla vṛddhau vā brāhmaṇam vā bahu śrutam

original: prakāśaṃ vāprakāśaṃ vā manyus tan manyum ṛcchati // Vi_5.191 //
analyzed: prakāśam vā a prakāśam vā manyuḥ tat manyum ṛcchati
udyata asi viṣa agnim ca śāpa udyata karam tathā

original: ātharvaṇena hantāraṃ piśunaṃ caiva rājasu // Vi_5.192 //
analyzed: ātharvaṇena hantāram piśunam ca eva rājasu
bhāryā atikramiṇam ca eva vidyāt sapta ātatāyinaḥ

original: uddeśatas te kathito dhare daṇḍavidhir mayā /
analyzed: uddeśataḥ te kathitaḥ dhare daṇḍa vidhiḥ mayā

original: aparādheṣu cānyesu jñātvā jātiṃ dhanaṃ vayaḥ /
analyzed: aparādheṣu ca anyesu jñātvā jātim dhanam vayaḥ

original: daṇḍaṃ prakalpayed rājā saṃmantrya brāhmaṇaiḥ saha // Vi_5.195 //
analyzed: daṇḍam prakalpayet rājā saṃmantrya brāhmaṇaiḥ saha

original: daṇḍyaṃ pramocayan daṇḍyād dviguṇaṃ daṇḍam āvahet /
analyzed: daṇḍyam pramocayan daṇḍyāt dviguṇam daṇḍam āvahet

original: niyuktaś cāpy adaṇḍyānāṃ daṇḍakārī narādhamaḥ // Vi_5.196 //
analyzed: niyuktaḥ ca api a daṇḍyānām daṇḍa kārī nara adhamaḥ

original: yasya cauraḥ pure nāsti nānyastrīgo na duṣṭavāk /
analyzed: yasya cauraḥ pure nā asti na anyastrīgaḥ na duṣṭa vāc

original: na sāhasikadaṇḍaghnau sa rājā śakralokabhāk // Vi_5.197 // Vi_6
analyzed: na sāhasika daṇḍa ghnau sa rājā śakra loka bhāj vi
atha uttamarṇaḥ dhamarṇāt yathādattam artham gṛhṇīyāt

original: dvikaṃ trikaṃ catuṣkaṃ pañcakaṃ ca śataṃ varṇānukrameṇa pratimāsam // Vi_6.2 //
analyzed: dvikam trikam catuṣkam pañcakam ca śatam varṇa anukrameṇa pratimāsam

original: sarve varṇā vā svapratipannāṃ vṛddhiṃ dadyuḥ // Vi_6.3 //
analyzed: sarve varṇāḥ vā sva pratipannām vṛddhim dadyuḥ

original: daivarājopaghātād ṛte vinaṣṭam ādhim uttamarṇo dadyāt // Vi_6.6 //
analyzed: daiva rāja upaghātāt ṛte vinaṣṭam ādhim uttamarṇaḥ dadyāt

original: na sthāvaram ādhim ṛte vacanāt // Vi_6.8 //
gṛhītadhanapraveśārtham eva yat sthāvaraṃ dattaṃ tat gṛhītadhanapraveśe dadyāt // Vi_6.9 //
analyzed: gṛhīta dhana praveśa artham eva yat sthāvaram dattam tat gṛhīta dhana praveśe dadyāt

original: dīyamānaṃ prayuktam artham uttamarṇasyāgṛhṇatas tataḥ paraṃ na vardhate // Vi_6.10 //
analyzed: dīyamānam prayuktam artham uttamarṇasya a gṛhṇataḥ tatas param na vardhate

original: prayuktam arthaṃ yathā kathaṃcit sādhayan na rājño vācyaḥ syāt // Vi_6.18 //
analyzed: prayuktam artham yathā kathaṃcid sādhayan na rājñaḥ vācyaḥ syāt

original: sādhyamānaś ced rājānam abhigacchet tatsamaṃ daṇḍyaḥ // Vi_6.19 //
analyzed: sādhyamānaḥ ced rājānam abhigacchet tad samam daṇḍyaḥ

original: tadvibhāvito 'dhamarṇo rājñe dhanadaśabhāgasaṃmitaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt // Vi_6.20 //
analyzed: tad vibhāvitaḥ dhamarṇaḥ rājñe dhana daśa bhāga saṃmitam daṇḍam dadyāt
prāpta arthaḥ ca uttamarṇaḥ viṃśatitamam aṃśam

original: tasya ca bhāvanās tisro bhavanti likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ samayakriyā ca // Vi_6.23 //
analyzed: tasya ca bhāvanāḥ tisraḥ bhavanti likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ samaya kriyā ca

original: sasākṣikam āptaṃ sasākṣikam eva dadyāt // Vi_6.24 //
analyzed: sa sākṣikam āptam sa sākṣikam eva dadyāt

original: asamagradāne lekhyāsaṃnidhāne cottamarṇaḥ svalikhitaṃ dadyāt // Vi_6.26 //
analyzed: asamagra dāne lekhya asaṃnidhāne ca uttamarṇaḥ sva likhitam dadyāt

original: dhanagrāhiṇi prete prevrajite dvidaśāḥ samāḥ pravasite vā tatputrapautrair dhanaṃ deyam // Vi_6.27 //
analyzed: dhana grāhiṇi prete prevrajite dvidaśāḥ samāḥ pravasite vā tad putra pautraiḥ dhanam deyam

original: saputrasya vāpy aputrasya vā rikthagrāhī ṛṇaṃ dadyāt // Vi_6.29 //
analyzed: sa putrasya vā api aputrasya vā rikthagrāhī ṛṇam dadyāt

original: avibhaktaiḥ kṛtam ṛṇaṃ yas tiṣṭhet sa dadyāt // Vi_6.34 //
analyzed: avibhaktaiḥ kṛtam ṛṇam yaḥ tiṣṭhet sa dadyāt

original: paitṛkam ṛṇam avibhaktānāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ ca // Vi_6.35 //

analyzed: gopa śauṇḍika śailūṣa rajaka vyādha strīṇām patiḥ dadyāt

original: yo gṛhītvā ṛṇaṃ sarvaṃ śvo dāsyāmīti sāmakam /
analyzed: yaḥ gṛhītvā ṛṇam sarvam śvas dāsyāmi iti sāmakam

original: na dadyāl lobhataḥ paścāt tathā vṛddhim avāpnuyāt // Vi_6.40 //
analyzed: na dadyāt lobhataḥ paścāt tathā vṛddhim avāpnuyāt

original: ādyau tu vitathe dāpyāv itarasya sutā api // Vi_6 41 //
analyzed: ādyau tu vitathe dāpyau itarasya sutāḥ api

original: bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'rthaṃ yathākṛtam /
analyzed: bahavaḥ ced pratibhuvaḥ dadyuḥ te rtham yathākṛtam

original: arthe 'viśeṣite tv eṣu dhanikacchandataḥ kriyā // Vi_6 42 //
analyzed: arthe viśeṣite tu eṣu dhanika chandataḥ kriyā
yam artham pratibhūḥ dadyāt dhanikena upapīḍitaḥ

original: ṛṇikas taṃ pratibhuve dviguṇaṃ dātum arhati // Vi_6 43 // Vi_7
analyzed: ṛṇikaḥ tam pratibhuve dviguṇam dātum arhati vi   vi
rāja sākṣikam sa sākṣikam asākṣikam ca
rāja adhikaraṇe tad niyukta kāyastha kṛtam tad adhyakṣa kara cihnitam rāja sākṣikam

original: yatra kvacana yena kenacil likhitaṃ sākṣibhiḥ svahastacihnitaṃ sasākṣikam // Vi_7.4 //
analyzed: yatra kvacana yena kenacid likhitam sākṣibhiḥ sva hasta cihnitam sa sākṣikam
dūṣita karma duṣṭa sākṣi aṅkitam sa sākṣikam api
strī bāla asvatantra matta unmatta bhīta tāḍita kṛtam ca
deśa ācāra aviruddham vyakta adhikṛta lakṣaṇam alupta prakrama akṣaram pramāṇam

original: varṇaiś ca tatkṛtaiś cihnaiḥ patrair eva ca yuktibhiḥ /
analyzed: varṇaiḥ ca tad kṛtaiḥ cihnaiḥ patraiḥ eva ca yuktibhiḥ
saṃdigdham sādhayet lekhyam tad yukti pratirūpitaiḥ

original: yatra+ṛṇī dhaniko vāpi sākṣī vā lekhako 'pi vā /
analyzed: yatra ṛṇī dhanikaḥ vā api sākṣī vā vā

original: mriyate tatra tallekhyaṃ tatsvahastaiḥ prasādhayet // Vi_7.13 // Vi_8
analyzed: mriyate tatra tat lekhyam tad sva hastaiḥ prasādhayet
na rāja śrotriya pravrajita kitava taskara para adhīna strī bāla sāhasika ati vṛddha matta unmata abhiśasta patita kṣudh tṛṣṇā ārta vyasani rāga andhāḥ
ripu mitra artha saṃbandhi vikarma dṛṣṭa doṣa sahāyāḥ ca

original: anirdiṣṭas tu sākṣitve yaś copetya brūyāt // Vi_8.4 //
analyzed: a nirdiṣṭaḥ tu sākṣi tve yaḥ ca upetya brūyāt
steya sāhasa vāgdaṇḍa pāruṣya saṃgrahaṇeṣu sākṣiṇaḥ na parīkṣyāḥ

original: kulajā vṛttavittasaṃpannā yajvānas tapasvinaḥ putriṇo dharmajñā adhīyānāḥ satyavantas traividyavṛddhāś ca // Vi_8.8 //
analyzed: kula jāḥ vṛtta vitta saṃpannāḥ yajvānaḥ tapasvinaḥ putriṇaḥ dharma jñāḥ adhīyānāḥ satyavantaḥ traividya vṛddhāḥ ca
abhihita guṇa saṃpannaḥ ubhaya anumataḥ ekaḥ pi

original: dvayor vivadamānayor yasya pūrvavādas tasya sākṣiṇaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ // Vi_8.10 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ vivadamānayoḥ yasya pūrva vādaḥ tasya sākṣiṇaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ

original: ādharyaṃ kāryavaśād yatra pūrvapakṣasya bhavet tatra prativādino 'pi // Vi_8.11 //
analyzed: ādharyam kārya vaśāt yatra pūrvapakṣasya bhavet tatra

original: uddiṣṭasākṣiṇi mṛte deśāntaragate ca tadabhihitaśrotāraḥ pramāṇam // Vi_8.12 //
analyzed: uddiṣṭa sākṣiṇi mṛte deśa antara gate ca tad abhihita śrotāraḥ pramāṇam

original: tatpāvanāya kūśmāṇḍībhir dvijo 'gniṃ ghṛtena juhuyāt // Vi_8.16 //
analyzed: tad pāvanāya kūśmāṇḍībhiḥ dvijaḥ gnim ghṛtena juhuyāt

original: śūdra ekāhikam godaśakasya grāsaṃ dadyāt // Vi_8.17 //
svabhāvavikṛtau mukhavarṇavināśe 'saṃbaddhapralāpe ca kūṭasākṣiṇaṃ vidyāt // Vi_8.18 //
analyzed: svabhāva vikṛtau mukha varṇa vināśe saṃbaddha pralāpe ca kūṭa sākṣiṇam vidyāt

original: sākṣiṇaś cāhūya ādityodaye kṛtaśapathān pṛcchet // Vi_8.19 //
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ ca āhūya āditya udaye kṛta śapathān pṛcchet

original: ye mahāpātakināṃ lokā ye copapātakināṃ te kūṭasākṣiṇām api // Vi_8.25 //
analyzed: ye mahāpātakinām lokāḥ ye ca upapātakinām te kūṭa sākṣiṇām api
janana maraṇa antare kṛta sukṛta hāniḥ ca

original: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasram ca satyam ca tulayā dhṛtam

original: aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate // Vi_8.36 //
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasrāt hi satyam eva viśiṣyate

original: jānanto 'pi hi ye sākṣye tūṣṇīṃbhūtā udāsate /
analyzed: jānantaḥ pi hi ye sākṣye tūṣṇīṃbhūtāḥ udāsate

original: te kūṭasākṣiṇāṃ pāpais tulyā daṇḍena cāpy atha // Vi_8.37 //
analyzed: te kūṭa sākṣiṇām pāpaiḥ tulyāḥ daṇḍena ca api atha

original: evaṃ hi sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcched varṇānukramato nṛpaḥ // Vi_8.38 //
analyzed: evam hi sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchet varṇa anukramataḥ nṛpaḥ

original: yasyocuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ satyāṃ pratijñāṃ sa jayī bhavet /
analyzed: yasya ūcuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ satyām pratijñām sa jayī bhavet

original: anyathā vādino yasya dhruvas tasya parājayaḥ // Vi_8.39 //
analyzed: anyathā vādinaḥ yasya dhruvaḥ tasya parājayaḥ
bahu tvam pratigṛhṇīyāt sākṣi dvaidhe narādhipaḥ

original: sameṣu ca guṇotkṛṣṭān guṇidvaidhe dvijottamān // Vi_8.40 //
analyzed: sameṣu ca guṇa utkṛṣṭān guṇi dvaidhe dvijottamān

original: yasmin yasmin vivāde tu kūṭasākṣy anṛtaṃ vadet /
analyzed: yasmin yasmin vivāde tu kūṭa sākṣī anṛtam vadet

original: tattatkāryaṃ nivarteta kṛtaṃ cāpy akṛtaṃ bhavet // Vi_8.41 // Vi_9
analyzed: tat tat kāryam nivarteta kṛtam ca api akṛtam bhavet

original: sarveṣv evārthajāteṣu mūlyaṃ kanakaṃ kalpayet // Vi_9.4 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eva artha jāteṣu mūlyam kanakam kalpayet

original: tatra kṛṣṇalone śūdraṃ dūrvākaraṃ śāpayet // Vi_9.5 //
analyzed: tatra kṛṣṇala ūne śūdram dūrvā karam śāpayet
suvarṇa ardha ūne kośaḥ deyaḥ śūdrasya

original: tataḥ paraṃ yathārhaṃ dhaṭāgnyudakaviṣāṇām anyatamam // Vi_9.11 //
analyzed: tatas param yathārham dhaṭa agni udaka viṣāṇām anyatamam
dviguṇe rthe yathā abhihitāḥ samaya kriyāḥ vaiśyasya
anyatra āgāmi kāla samaya nibandhana kriyātaḥ

original: kośasthāne brāhmaṇaṃ sītoddhṛtamahīkaram eva śāpayet // Vi_9.17 //
analyzed: kośa sthāne brāhmaṇam sītā uddhṛta mahī karam eva śāpayet

original: prāgdṛṣṭadoṣe svalpe 'py arthe divyānām anyatamam eva kārayet // Vi_9.18 //
analyzed: prāk dṛṣṭa doṣe su alpe pi arthe divyānām anyatamam eva kārayet

original: satsu viditaṃ sac caritaṃ na mahaty arthe 'pi // Vi_9.19 //
analyzed: satsu viditam sat caritam na mahati arthe
rāja droha sāhaseṣu vinā api śīrṣa vartanāt
strī brāhmaṇa vikala asamartha rogiṇām tulā deyā

original: sā ca na vāti vāyau // Vi_9.24 //

analyzed: na kuṣṭhi asamartha lohakārāṇām agniḥ deyaḥ
na kuṣṭhi paittika brāhmaṇānām viṣam deyam

original: na śleṣmavyādhyarditānāṃ bhīrūṇāṃ śvāsakāsinām ambujīvināṃ codakam // Vi_9.29 //
analyzed: na śleṣma vyādhi arditānām bhīrūṇām śvāsa kāsinām ambu jīvinām ca udakam
na deśe vyādhi maraka upasṛṣṭe ce
sa caila snātam āhūya sūrya udaye upoṣitam
kārayet sarva divyāni deva brāhmaṇa saṃnidhau
catur hasta ucchritaḥ dvi hasta āyataḥ
tatra sāra vṛkṣa udbhavā pañca hasta āyata ubhayatas śikyā tulā

original: tāṃ ca suvarṇakārakāṃsyakārāṇām anyatamo bibhṛyāt // Vi_10.4 //
analyzed: tām ca suvarṇakāra kāṃsyakārāṇām anyatamaḥ bibhṛyāt

original: tatra caikasmin śikye puruṣaṃ divyakāriṇam āropayet,
analyzed: tatra ca ekasmin śikye puruṣam divya kāriṇam āropayet

original: pratimānapuruṣau samadhṛtau sucihnitau kṛtvā puruṣam avatārayet // Vi_10.6 //
analyzed: pratimāna puruṣau sama dhṛtau su cihnitau kṛtvā puruṣam avatārayet

original: brahmaghnāṃ ye smṛtā lokā ye lokāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇām /
analyzed: brahma ghnām ye smṛtāḥ lokāḥ ye lokāḥ kūṭa sākṣiṇām

original: tulādhārasya te lokās tulāṃ dhārayato mṛṣā // Vi_10.9 //
analyzed: tulādhārasya te lokāḥ tulām dhārayataḥ mṛṣā
dharma paryāya vacanaiḥ dhaṭaḥ iti abhidhīyase

original: tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Vi_10.10 //
analyzed: tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na viduḥ yāni mānuṣāḥ
vyavahāra abhiśastaḥ yam mānuṣaḥ tolyate tvayi

original: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi // Vi_10.11 //
analyzed: tat enam saṃśayāt asmāt dharmataḥ trātum arhasi

original: tatas tv āropayec chikye bhūya evātha taṃ naram /
analyzed: tatas tu āropayet śikye bhūyas eva atha tam naram

original: tulito yadi vardheta tataḥ śuddhaḥ sa dharmataḥ // Vi_10.12 //
analyzed: tulitaḥ yadi vardheta tatas śuddhaḥ sa dharmataḥ
śikya cheda akṣa bhaṅgeṣu bhūyas tu āropayet naram

original: evaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ jñānaṃ yato bhavati nirṇayaḥ // Vi_10.13 //
analyzed: evam niḥsaṃśayam jñānam yatas bhavati nirṇayaḥ

original: ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ tāvad antaraṃ maṇḍalasaptakaṃ kuryāt // Vi_11.2 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa aṅgulam tāvat antaram maṇḍala saptakam kuryāt

original: tataḥ prāṅmukhasya prasāritabhujadvayasya saptāśvatthapatrāṇi karayor dadyāt // Vi_11.3 //
analyzed: tatas prāc mukhasya prasārita bhuja dvayasya sapta aśvattha patrāṇi karayoḥ dadyāt

original: tāni ca karadvayasahitāni sūtreṇa veṣṭayet // Vi_11.4 //
analyzed: tāni ca kara dvaya sahitāni sūtreṇa veṣṭayet

original: tatas tatrāgnivarṇaṃ lohapiṇḍaṃ pañcāśatpalikaṃ samaṃ nyaset // Vi_11.5 //
analyzed: tatas tatra agnivarṇam loha piṇḍam pañcāśat palikam samam nyaset

original: tam ādāya nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitaṃ maṇḍaleṣu pādanyāsaṃ kurvan vrajet // Vi_11.6 //
analyzed: tam ādāya na atidrutam na ati vilambitam maṇḍaleṣu pāda nyāsam kurvan vrajet

original: tataḥ saptamaṃ maṇḍalam atītya bhūmau lohapiṇḍaṃ jahyāt // Vi_11.7 //
analyzed: tatas saptamam maṇḍalam atītya bhūmau loha piṇḍam jahyāt

original: yo hastayoḥ kvacid dagdhas tam aśuddhaṃ vinirdiṣet /
analyzed: yaḥ hastayoḥ kvacid dagdhaḥ tam aśuddham vinirdiṣet

original: na dagdhaḥ sarvathā yas tu sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ // Vi_11.8 //
analyzed: na dagdhaḥ sarvathā yaḥ tu sa viśuddhaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: bhayād vā pātayed yas tu dagdho vā na vibhāvyate /
analyzed: bhayāt vā pātayet yaḥ tu dagdhaḥ vā na vibhāvyate

original: punas taṃ hārayel lohaṃ samayasyāviśodhanāt // Vi_11.9 //
analyzed: punar tam hārayet loham samayasya aviśodhanāt
karau vimṛdita vrīheḥ tasya ādau eva lakṣayet

original: abhimantryāsya karayor lohapiṇḍaṃ tato nyaset // Vi_11.10 //
tvam agne sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi sākṣivat /
analyzed: tvam agne sarva bhūtānām antar carasi sākṣi vat

original: tvam evāgne vijānīṣe na vidur yāni mānavāḥ // Vi_11.11 //
analyzed: tvam eva agne vijānīṣe na viduḥ yāni mānavāḥ
vyavahāra abhiśastaḥ yam mānuṣaḥ śuddhim icchati

original: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi // Vi_11.12 //
analyzed: tat enam saṃśayāt asmāt dharmataḥ trātum arhasi
paṅka śaivāla duṣṭa grāha matsya jalaukā ādi varjite mbhasi

original: tatra ...nābhimagnasyārogadveṣiṇaḥ puruṣasyānyasya jānunī gṛhītvābhimantritam ambhaḥ praviśet // Vi_12.3 //
analyzed: tatra nābhi magnasya aroga dveṣiṇaḥ puruṣasya anyasya jānunī gṛhītvā abhimantritam ambhaḥ praviśet

original: tatsamakālaṃ ca nātikrūramṛdunā dhanuṣā puruṣo 'paraḥ śarakṣepaṃ kuryāt // Vi_12.4 //
analyzed: tad sama kālam ca na ati krūra mṛdunā dhanuṣā puruṣaḥ paras śara kṣepam kuryāt

original: taṃ cāparaḥ puruṣo javena śaram ānayet // Vi_12.5 //
analyzed: tam ca aparaḥ puruṣaḥ javena śaram ānayet

original: tanmadhye yo na dṛśyeta sa śuddhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: tad madhye yaḥ na dṛśyeta sa śuddhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: anyathā hy aviśuddhaḥ syād ekāṅgasyāpi darśane // Vi_12.6 //
analyzed: anyathā hi aviśuddhaḥ syāt eka aṅgasya api darśane

original: tvam ambhaḥ sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi sākṣivat /
analyzed: tvam ambhaḥ sarva bhūtānām antar carasi sākṣi vat

original: tvam evāmbho vijānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Vi_12.7 //
analyzed: tvam eva ambhaḥ vijānīṣe na viduḥ yāni mānuṣāḥ
vyavahāra abhiśataḥ yam mānuṣaḥ tvayi majjati

original: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi // Vi_12.8 //
analyzed: tat enam saṃśayāt asmāt dharmataḥ trātum arhasi

original: tasya ca yavasaptakaṃ ghṛtaplutam abhiśastāya dadyāt // Vi_13.4 //
analyzed: tasya ca yava saptakam ghṛta plutam abhiśastāya dadyāt
viṣam vega klama apetam sukhena yadi jīryate

original: viśuddhaṃ tam iti jñātvā divasānte visarjayet // Vi_13.5 //
analyzed: viśuddham tam iti jñātvā divasa ante visarjayet

original: viṣatvād viṣamatvāc ca krūraṃ tvaṃ sarvadehinām /
analyzed: viṣa tvāt viṣama tvāt ca krūram tvam sarva dehinām

original: tvam eva viṣa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ // Vi_13.6 //
analyzed: tvam eva viṣa jānīṣe na viduḥ yāni mānuṣāḥ
vyavahāra abhiśastaḥ yam mānuṣaḥ śuddhim icchati

original: tad enaṃ saṃśayād asmād dharmatas trātum arhasi // Vi_13.7 //
analyzed: tat enam saṃśayāt asmāt dharmataḥ trātum arhasi

original: ugrān devān samabhyarcya tatsnānodakāt prasṛtitrayaṃ pibet // Vi_14.2 //
analyzed: ugrān devān samabhyarcya tad snāna udakāt prasṛti trayam pibet

original: idaṃ mayā na kṛtam iti vadan sthāpitadevatābhimukhaḥ // Vi_14.3 //
analyzed: idam mayā na kṛtam iti vadan sthāpita devatā abhimukhaḥ

original: yasya paśyed dvisaptāhāt trisaptāhād athāpi vā /
analyzed: yasya paśyet dvi sapta ahāt tri sapta ahāt atha api vā

original: rogo 'gnir jñātimaraṇaṃ rājātaṅkaṃ athāpi vā // Vi_14.4 //
analyzed: rogaḥ gniḥ jñāti maraṇam rāja ātaṅkam atha api vā

original: tam aśuddhaṃ vijānīyāt tathā śuddhaṃ viparyaye /
analyzed: tam aśuddham vijānīyāt tathā śuddham viparyaye

original: divye ca śuddhaṃ puruṣaṃ sat kuryād dhārmiko nṛpaḥ // Vi_14.5 //
analyzed: divye ca śuddham puruṣam sat kuryāt dhārmikaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: svakṣetre saṃskṛtāyām utpāditaḥ svayam aurasaḥ prathamaḥ // Vi_15.2 //
analyzed: sva kṣetre saṃskṛtāyām utpāditaḥ svayam aurasaḥ prathamaḥ

original: niyuktāyāṃ sapiṇḍenottamavarṇena votpāditaḥ kṣetrajo dvitīyaḥ // Vi_15.3 //
analyzed: niyuktāyām sapiṇḍena uttama varṇena vā utpāditaḥ kṣetrajaḥ dvitīyaḥ

original: yas tv asyāḥ putraḥ sa me putro bhaved iti yā pitrā dattā sā putrikā // Vi_15.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu asyāḥ putraḥ sa me putraḥ bhavet iti yā pitrā dattā sā putrikā

original: putrikāvidhiṃ vināpi pratipāditā bhrātṛvihīnā putrikaiva // Vi_15.6 //
analyzed: putrikā vidhim vinā api pratipāditā bhrātṛ vihīnā putrikā eva
bhūyas tu a saṃskṛtā api parapūrvā
pitṛ gṛhe a saṃskṛtayā eva utpāditaḥ

original: yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate tasyāḥ putraḥ // Vi_15.16 //
sa ca mātāpitṛbhyāṃ yasya dattaḥ // Vi_15.19 //
analyzed: sa ca mātā pitṛbhyām yasya dattaḥ
anūḍhānām sva vitta anurūpeṇa saṃskāram kuryāt
patita klība acikitsya roga vikalāḥ tu a bhāga hāriṇaḥ
teṣām ca aurasāḥ putrāḥ bhāga hāriṇaḥ

original: patanīye karmaṇi kṛte tv anantarotpannāḥ // Vi_15.36 //
analyzed: patanīye karmaṇi kṛte tu anantara utpannāḥ
pratilomāsu strīṣu ca utpannāḥ ca abhāginaḥ
yaḥ ca artha haraḥ sa piṇḍa dāyī

original: ekoḍhānām apy ekasyāḥ putraḥ sarvāsāṃ putra eva // Vi_15.41 //
analyzed: eka ūḍhānām api ekasyāḥ putraḥ sarvāsām putraḥ eva
putraḥ pitṛ vitta alābhe pi piṇḍam dadyāt

original: punnāmno narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ /
analyzed: punnāmnaḥ narakāt yasmāt pitaram trāyate sutaḥ

original: tasmāt puttra iti proktaḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā // Vi_15.44 //
analyzed: tasmāt puttraḥ iti proktaḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā

original: ṛṇam asmin saṃnayaty amṛtatvaṃ ca gacchati /
analyzed: ṛṇam asmin saṃnayati amṛta tvam ca gacchati

original: pitā putrasya jātasya paśyec cej jīvato mukham // Vi_15.45 //
analyzed: pitā putrasya jātasya paśyet ced jīvataḥ mukham
putreṇa lokān jayati pautreṇa ānantyam aśnute

original: atha putrasya pautreṇa bradhnasyāpnoti viṣṭapam // Vi_15.46 //
analyzed: atha putrasya pautreṇa bradhnasya āpnoti viṣṭapam
pautra dauhitrayoḥ loke viśeṣaḥ na upapadyate

original: dauhitro 'pi hy aputraṃ taṃ saṃtārayati pautravat // Vi_15.47 //
analyzed: dauhitraḥ u pi hi aputram tam saṃtārayati pautra vat
pulkasa māgadhau kṣatriyā putrau vaiśya śūdrābhyām
caṇḍāla vaidehaka sūtāḥ ca brāhmaṇī putrāḥ śūdra viś kṣatriyaiḥ
strī raksā tat jīvanam ca vaidehakānām

original: caṇḍālānāṃ bahir grāmanivasanaṃ mṛtacailadhāraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ // Vi_16.14 //
analyzed: caṇḍālānām bahis grāma nivasanam mṛta caila dhāraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ
saṃkare jātayaḥ tu etāḥ pitṛ mātṛ pradarśitāḥ

original: pracchannā vā prakāśā vā veditavyāḥ svakarmabhiḥ // Vi_16.17 //
analyzed: pracchannāḥ vā prakāśāḥ vā veditavyāḥ sva karmabhiḥ
brāhmaṇa arthe gavā arthe vā dehatyāgaḥ n upaskṛtaḥ
strī bāla ādi avapattau ca bāhyānām siddhi kāraṇam

original: pitā cet putrān vibhajet tasya svecchā svayam upārjite 'rthe // Vi_17.1 //
analyzed: pitā ced putrān vibhajet tasya sva icchā svayam upārjite rthe

original: paitāmahe tv arthe pitṛputrayos tulyaṃ svāmitvam // Vi_17.2 //
analyzed: paitāmahe tu arthe pitṛ putrayoḥ tulyam svāmi tvam
pitṛ vibhaktāḥ vibhāga anantara utpannasya bhāgam dadyuḥ
tad abhāve brāhmaṇa dhana varjam rāja gāmi

original: saṃsṛṣṭinas tu saṃsṛṣṭī sodarasya tu sodaraḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭinaḥ tu saṃsṛṣṭī sodarasya tu sodaraḥ

original: dadyād apaharec cāṃśaṃ jātasya ca mṛtasya ca // Vi_17.17 //
analyzed: dadyāt apaharet ca aṃśam jātasya ca mṛtasya ca

original: brāhmādiṣu caturṣu vivāheṣv aprajāyām atītāyāṃ tadbhartuḥ // Vi_17.19 //
analyzed: brāhma ādiṣu caturṣu vivāheṣu aprajāyām atītāyām tad bhartuḥ

original: sarveṣv eva prasūtāyāṃ yaddhanaṃ tat duhitṛgāmi // Vi_17.21 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eva prasūtāyām yat dhanam tat duhitṛ gāmi

original: patyau jīvati yaḥ strībhir alaṃkāro dhṛto bhavet /
analyzed: patyau jīvati yaḥ strībhiḥ alaṃkāraḥ dhṛtaḥ bhavet

original: na taṃ bhajeran dāyādā bhajamānāḥ patanti te // Vi_17.22 //
analyzed: na tam bhajeran dāyādāḥ bhajamānāḥ patanti te
aneka pitṛkāṇām tu pitṛtaḥ ṃśa prakalpanā

original: yasya yat paitṛkaṃ rikthaṃ sa tad gṛhṇīta netaraḥ // Vi_17.23 //
analyzed: yasya yat paitṛkam riktham sa tat gṛhṇīta na itaraḥ

original: brāhmaṇasya caturṣu varṇeṣu cet putrā bhaveyuḥ,
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya caturṣu varṇeṣu ced putrāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: te paitṛkaṃ rikthaṃ daśadhā vibhajeyuḥ // Vi_18.1 //

analyzed: tatra brāhmaṇī putraḥ caturaḥ ṃśān ādadyāt

original: atha cet śūdravarjaṃ brāhmaṇasya putratrayaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: atha ced śūdra varjam brāhmaṇasya putra trayam bhavet
catur tri dvi bhāgīkṛtān aṃśān ādadyuḥ

original: vaiśyavarjam aṣṭadhā kṛtaṃ caturas trīn ekaṃ cādadyuḥ // Vi_18.8 //
analyzed: vaiśya varjam aṣṭadhā kṛtam caturaḥ trīn ekam ca ādadyuḥ

original: kṣatriyavarjam saptadhā kṛtaṃ caturo dvāv ekaṃ ca // Vi_18.9 //
analyzed: kṣatriya varjam saptadhā kṛtam caturaḥ dvau ekam ca

original: brāhmaṇavarjaṃ ṣaḍdhā kṛtaṃ trīn dvāv ekaṃ ca // Vi_18.10 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa varjam ṣaḍdhā kṛtam trīn dvau ekam ca

original: kṣatriyasya kṣatriyāvaiśyāśūdrāputreṣv ayam eva vibhāgaḥ // Vi_18.11 //
analyzed: kṣatriyasya kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā putreṣu ayam eva vibhāgaḥ
atha brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇa kṣatriyau putrau syātām

original: tadā saptadhā kṛtād dhanād brāhmaṇaś caturo 'ṃśān ādadyāt // Vi_18.12 //
analyzed: tadā saptadhā kṛtāt dhanāt brāhmaṇaḥ caturaḥ ṃśān ādadyāt

original: tadā ṣaḍdhā vibhaktasya caturo 'ṃśān brāhmaṇas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.14 //
analyzed: tadā ṣaḍdhā vibhaktasya caturaḥ ṃśān brāhmaṇaḥ tu ādadyāt
atha brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇa śūdrau putrau syātām

original: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vā kṣatriyavaiśyau putrau syātāṃ,
analyzed: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vā kṣatriya vaiśyau putrau syātām

original: trīn aṃśān kṣatriyas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.20 //
atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vā kṣatriyaśūdrau putrau syātāṃ,
analyzed: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vā kṣatriya śūdrau putrau syātām

original: trīn aṃśān kṣatriyas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.23 //
atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vaiśyasya vā vaiśyaśūdrau putrau syātāṃ,
analyzed: atha brāhmaṇasya kṣatriyasya vaiśyasya vā vaiśya śūdrau putrau syātām

original: dvāv aṃśau vaiśyas tv ādadyāt // Vi_18.26 //

analyzed: atha eka putrāḥ brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśyāḥ sarva harāḥ

original: dvijātīnāṃ śūdras tv ekaḥ putro 'rdhaharaḥ // Vi_18.32 //
analyzed: dvijātīnām śūdraḥ tu ekaḥ putraḥ ṛdha haraḥ
mātaraḥ putra bhāga anusāreṇa bhāga apahāriṇyaḥ

original: samānavarṇāḥ putrāḥ samān aṃśān ādadyuḥ // Vi_18.36 //
analyzed: samāna varṇāḥ putrāḥ samān aṃśān ādadyuḥ

original: yadi dvau brāhmaṇīputrau syātām ekaḥ śūdrāputraḥ,
analyzed: yadi dvau brāhmaṇī putrau syātām ekaḥ śūdrā putraḥ

original: tadā navadhā vibhaktasyārthasya brāhmaṇīputrāv aṣṭau bhāgān ādadyātām ekaṃ śūdrāputraḥ // Vi_18.38 //
analyzed: tadā navadhā vibhaktasya arthasya brāhmaṇī putrau aṣṭau bhāgān ādadyātām ekam śūdrā putraḥ

original: atha śūdrāputrāv ubhau syātām eko brāhmaṇīputraḥ,
analyzed: atha śūdrā putrau ubhau syātām ekaḥ brāhmaṇī putraḥ

original: tadā ṣaḍdhā vibhaktasyārthasya caturo 'ṃśān brāhmaṇas tv ādadyāt,
analyzed: tadā ṣaḍdhā vibhaktasya arthasya caturaḥ ṃśān brāhmaṇaḥ tu ādadyāt
anena krameṇa anyatra api aṃśa kalpanā bhavati

original: vibhaktāḥ saha jīvanto vibhajeran punar yadi /
analyzed: vibhaktāḥ saha jīvantaḥ vibhajeran punar yadi

original: samas tatra vibhāgaḥ syāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ tatra na vidyate // Vi_18.41 //
analyzed: samaḥ tatra vibhāgaḥ syāt jyaiṣṭhyam tatra na vidyate
anupaghnan pitṛ dravyam śrameṇa yat upārjayet

original: svayam īhitalabdhaṃ tan nākāmo dātum arhati // Vi_18.42 //
analyzed: svayam īhita labdham tat na akāmaḥ dātum arhati

original: paitṛkaṃ tu yadā dravyam anavāptaṃ yad āpnuyāt /
analyzed: paitṛkam tu yadā dravyam an avāptam yat āpnuyāt

original: na tat putrair bhajet sārdham akāmaḥ svayam arjitam // Vi_18.43 //
analyzed: na tat putraiḥ bhajet sārdham akāmaḥ svayam arjitam

original: vastraṃ patram alaṃkāraḥ kṛtānnam udakaṃ striyaḥ /
analyzed: vastram patram alaṃkāraḥ kṛtānnam udakam striyaḥ

original: yogakṣemaṃ pracāraś ca na vibhājyaṃ ca pustakam // Vi_18.44 //
analyzed: yogakṣemam pracāraḥ ca na vibhājyam ca pustakam

original: mṛtaṃ dvijaṃ na śūdreṇa nirhārayet // Vi_19.1 //
pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca putrā nirhareyuḥ // Vi_19.3 //
na dvijaṃ pitaram api śūdrāḥ // Vi_19.4 //
brāhmaṇam anāthaṃ ye brāhmaṇā nirharanti te svargalokabhājaḥ // Vi_19.5 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇam anātham ye brāhmaṇāḥ nirharanti te svarga loka bhājaḥ

original: nirhṛtya ca bāndhavaṃ pretaṃ saṃṣkṛtyāpradakṣiṇena citām abhigamyāpsu savāsaso nimajjanaṃ kuryuḥ // Vi_19.6 //
analyzed: nirhṛtya ca bāndhavam pretam saṃṣkṛtya a pradakṣiṇena citām abhigamya apsu sa vāsasaḥ nimajjanam kuryuḥ

original: pretasyodakanirvapaṇaṃ kṛtvaikaṃ piṇḍaṃ kuśeṣu dadyuḥ // Vi_19.7 //
analyzed: pretasya udaka nirvapaṇam kṛtvā ekam piṇḍam kuśeṣu dadyuḥ

original: privartitavāsasaś ca nimbapatrāṇi vidaśya dvāry aśmani padanyāsaṃ kṛtvā gṛhaṃ praviśeyuḥ // Vi_19.8 //
analyzed: privartita vāsasaḥ ca nimba patrāṇi vidaśya dvāri aśmani pada nyāsam kṛtvā gṛham praviśeyuḥ

original: yāvat saṃkhyam asthi puruṣasya gaṅgāmbhasi tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: yāvat saṃkhyam asthi puruṣasya gaṅgā ambhasi tiṣṭhati
tāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi svarga lokam adhitiṣṭhati

original: yāvad āśaucaṃ tāvat pretasyodakaṃ piṇḍam ekaṃ ca dadyuḥ // Vi_19.13 //
analyzed: yāvat āśaucam tāvat pretasya udakam piṇḍam ekam ca dadyuḥ

original: grāmān niṣkramyāśaucānte kṛtaśmaśrukarmāṇas tilakalkaiḥ sarṣapakalkair vā snātāḥ parivartitavāsaso gṛhaṃ praviśeyuḥ // Vi_19.18 //
analyzed: grāmāt niṣkramya āśauca ante kṛta śmaśrukarmāṇaḥ tila kalkaiḥ sarṣapa kalkaiḥ vā snātāḥ parivartita vāsasaḥ gṛham praviśeyuḥ

original: tatra śāntiṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca pūjanaṃ kuryuḥ // Vi_19.19 //
analyzed: tatra śāntim kṛtvā brāhmaṇānām ca pūjanam kuryuḥ

original: brāhmaṇābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ na mithyā jāyate kvacit // Vi_19.22 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa abhihitam vākyam na mithyā jāyate kvacid

original: yad brāhmaṇās tuṣṭatamā vadanti tad devatāḥ pratyabhinandayanti /
analyzed: yat brāhmaṇāḥ tuṣṭatamāḥ vadanti tat devatāḥ pratyabhinandayanti

original: tuṣṭeṣu tuṣṭāḥ satataṃ bhavanti pratyakṣadeveṣu parokṣadevāḥ // Vi_19.23 //
analyzed: tuṣṭeṣu tuṣṭāḥ satatam bhavanti pratyakṣa deveṣu parokṣa devāḥ
duḥkha anvitānām mṛta bāndhavānām āśvāsanam kuryuḥ adīna sattvāḥ

original: vākyais tu yair bhūmi tavābhidhāsye vākyāny ahaṃ tāni mano 'bhirāme // Vi_19.24 //
analyzed: vākyaiḥ tu yaiḥ bhūmi tava abhidhāsye vākyāni aham tāni manaḥ abhirāme

original: yad uttarāyaṇaṃ tad ahar devānām // Vi_20.1 //

analyzed: dvādaśa varṣa śatāni divyāni kali yugam

original: evaṃvidhenāhorātreṇa māsavarṣagaṇanayā sarvasyaiva brahmaṇo varṣaśatam āyuḥ // Vi_20.15 //
analyzed: evaṃvidhena ahorātreṇa māsa varṣa gaṇanayā sarvasya eva brahmaṇaḥ varṣa śatam āyuḥ

original: brahmāyuṣā ca paricchinnaḥ pauruṣo divasaḥ // Vi_20.16 //
analyzed: brahma āyuṣā ca paricchinnaḥ pauruṣaḥ divasaḥ

original: paurūṣeyāṇām ahorātrāṇām atītānāṃ saṃkhyaiva nāsti // Vi_20.19 //
analyzed: paurūṣeyāṇām ahar rātrāṇām atītānām saṃkhyā eva na asti
evam asmin nirālambe kāle satata yāyini

original: na tadbhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi sthitir yasya bhaved dhruvā // Vi_20.22 //
analyzed: na tat bhūtam prapaśyāmi sthitiḥ yasya bhavet dhruvā

original: gaṅgāyāḥ sikatā dhārās tathā varṣati vāsave /
analyzed: gaṅgāyāḥ sikatāḥ dhārāḥ tathā varṣati vāsave

original: śakyā gaṇayituṃ loke na vyatītāḥ pitāmahāḥ // Vi_20.23 //
analyzed: śakyāḥ gaṇayitum loke na vyatītāḥ pitāmahāḥ

original: sarvalokapradhānāś ca manavaś ca caturdaśa // Vi_20.24 //
analyzed: sarva loka pradhānāḥ ca manavaḥ ca caturdaśa
bahūni indra sahasrāṇi daitya indra niyutāni ca

original: vinaṣtānīha kālena manujeṣv atha kā kathā // Vi_20.25 //
analyzed: vinaṣtāni iha kālena manujeṣu atha kā kathā

original: rājarṣayaś ca bahavaḥ sarvaiḥ samuditā guṇaiḥ /
analyzed: rājarṣayaḥ ca bahavaḥ sarvaiḥ samuditāḥ guṇaiḥ

original: devā brahmarṣayaś caiva kālena nidhanaṃ gatāḥ // Vi_20.26 //
analyzed: devāḥ brahmarṣayaḥ ca eva kālena nidhanam gatāḥ
ye samarthāḥ jagati asmin sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kāraṇe

original: te 'pi kālena nīyante kālo hi duratikramaḥ // Vi_20.27 //
analyzed: te pi kālena nīyante kālaḥ hi duratikramaḥ

original: ākramya sarvaḥ kālena paralokaṃ ca nīyate /
analyzed: ākramya sarvaḥ kālena para lokam ca nīyate

original: karmapāśavaśo jantus tatra kā paridevanā // Vi_20.28 //
analyzed: karma pāśa vaśaḥ jantuḥ tatra kā paridevanā

original: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
analyzed: jātasya hi dhruvaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhruvam janma mṛtasya ca

original: arthe duṣparihārye 'smin nāsti loke sahāyatā // Vi_20.29 //
analyzed: arthe duṣparihārye smin na asti loke sahāya tā
śocantaḥ nā upakurvanti mṛtasya iha janāḥ yatas

original: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyā kāryā svaśaktitaḥ // Vi_20.30 //
analyzed: atas na roditavyam hi kriyā kāryā sva śaktitaḥ

original: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cobhau sahāyau yasya gacchataḥ /
analyzed: sukṛtam duṣkṛtam ca ubhau sahāyau yasya gacchataḥ

original: bāndhavais tasya kiṃ kāryaṃ śocadbhir atha vā na vā // Vi_20.31 //
analyzed: bāndhavaiḥ tasya kim kāryam śocadbhiḥ atha vā na vā

original: bāndhavānām aśauce tu sthitiṃ preto na vindati /
analyzed: bāndhavānām aśauce tu sthitim pretaḥ na vindati

original: atas tv abhyeti tān eva piṇḍatoyapradāyinaḥ // Vi_20.32 //
analyzed: atas tu abhyeti tān eva piṇḍa toya pradāyinaḥ

original: arvāk sapiṇdīkaraṇāt preto bhavati yo mṛtaḥ /
analyzed: arvāk sapiṇdīkaraṇāt pretaḥ bhavati yaḥ mṛtaḥ
preta loka gatasya annam sa udakumbham prayacchata
pitṛ loka gataḥ ca annam śrāddhe bhuṅkte svadhā samam
pitṛ loka gatasya asya tasmāt śrāddham prayacchata
deva tve yātanā sthāne tiryagyonau tathā eva ca

original: mānuṣye ca tathāpnoti śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ svabāndhavaiḥ // Vi_20.35 //
analyzed: mānuṣye ca tathā āpnoti śrāddham dattam sva bāndhavaiḥ

original: pretasya śrāddhakartuś ca puṣṭiḥ śrāddhe kṛte dhruvam /
analyzed: pretasya śrāddha kartuḥ ca puṣṭiḥ śrāddhe kṛte dhruvam

original: tasmāc chrāddhaṃ sadā kāryaṃ śokaṃ tyaktvā nirarthakam // Vi_20.36 //
analyzed: tasmāt śrāddham sadā kāryam śokam tyaktvā nirarthakam

original: etāvad eva kartavyaṃ sadā pretasya bandhubhiḥ /
analyzed: etāvat eva kartavyam sadā pretasya bandhubhiḥ

original: nopakuryān naraḥ śocan pretasyātmana eva ca // Vi_20.37 //
analyzed: na upakuryāt naraḥ śocan pretasya ātmanaḥ eva ca

original: dṛṣṭvā lokam anākrandaṃ mriyamāṇāṃś ca bāndhavān /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lokam an ākrandam mriyamāṇān ca bāndhavān

original: dharmam ekaṃ sahāyārthaṃ varayadhvaṃ sadā narāḥ // Vi_20.38 //
analyzed: dharmam ekam sahāya artham varayadhvam sadā narāḥ

original: mṛto 'pi bāndhavaḥ śakto nānugantuṃ naraṃ mṛtam /
analyzed: mṛtaḥ u pi bāndhavaḥ śaktaḥ na anugantum naram mṛtam

original: jāyāvarjaṃ hi sarvasya yāmyaḥ panthā virudhyate // Vi_20.39 //
analyzed: jāyā varjam hi sarvasya yāmyaḥ panthāḥ virudhyate

original: dharma eko 'nuyāty enaṃ yatra kvacana gāminam /
analyzed: dharmaḥ ekaḥ nuyāti enam yatra kvacana gāminam

original: nanv asāre nṛloke 'smin dharmaṃ kuruta mā ciram // Vi_20.40 //
analyzed: nanu asāre nṛ loke smin dharmam kuruta mā ciram

original: śvaḥ kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam /
analyzed: śvas kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe ca āparāhṇikam

original: na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vākṛtam // Vi_20.41 //
analyzed: na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtam vā asya na vā a kṛtam
kṣetra āpaṇa gṛha āsaktam anyatra gata mānasam

original: vṛkīvoraṇam āsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati // Vi_20.42 //
analyzed: vṛkī iva uraṇam āsādya mṛtyuḥ ādāya gacchati

original: na kālasya priyaḥ kaścid dveṣyaś cāsya na vidyate /
analyzed: na kālasya priyaḥ kaścid dveṣyaḥ ca asya na vidyate

original: āyuṣye karmaṇi kṣīṇe prasahya harate janam // Vi_20.43 //
analyzed: āyuṣye karmaṇi kṣīṇe prasahya harate janam
na aprāpta kālaḥ mriyate viddhaḥ śara śataiḥ api

original: kuśāgreṇāpi saṃṣpṛṣṭaḥ prāptakālo na jīvati // Vi_20.44 //
analyzed: kuśa agreṇa api saṃṣpṛṣṭaḥ prāpta kālaḥ na jīvati

original: nauśadhāni na mantrāś ca na homā na punar japāḥ /
analyzed: nauśadhāni na mantrāḥ ca na homāḥ na punar japāḥ

original: trāyante mṛtyunopetaṃ jarayā vāpi mānavam // Vi_20.45 //
analyzed: trāyante mṛtyunā upetam jarayā vā api mānavam
āgāminam anartham hi pravidhāna śataiḥ api

original: na nivārayituṃ śaktas tatra kā paridevanā // Vi_20.46 //
analyzed: na nivārayitum śaktaḥ tatra kā paridevanā
yathā dhenu sahasreṣu vatsaḥ vindati mātaram

original: tathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma kartāraṃ vindate dhruvam // Vi_20.47 //
analyzed: tathā pūrva kṛtam karma kartāram vindate dhruvam
avyakta ādīni bhūtāni vyakta madhyāni ca api atha

original: avyaktanidhanāny eva tatra kā paridevanā // Vi_20.48 //
analyzed: avyakta nidhanāni eva tatra kā paridevanā

original: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā /
analyzed: dehinaḥ u smin yathā dehe kaumāram yauvanam jarā

original: tahtā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati // Vi_20.49 //
analyzed: deha antara prāptiḥ dhīraḥ tatra na muhyati

original: gṛhṇātīha yathā vastraṃ tyaktvā pūrvadhṛtaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: gṛhṇāti iha yathā vastram tyaktvā pūrva dhṛtam naraḥ

original: gṛhṇāty evaṃ navaṃ dehī dehaṃ karmanibandhanam // Vi_20.50 //
analyzed: gṛhṇāti evam navam dehī deham karma nibandhanam

original: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ /
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ // Vi_20.51 //
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
acchedyaḥ yam a dāhyaḥ yam a kledyaḥ śoṣyaḥ eva ca

original: nityaḥ satatagaḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ // Vi_20.52 //
analyzed: nityaḥ satata gaḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ yam sanātanaḥ
avyaktaḥ yam acintyaḥ yam avikāryaḥ yam ucyate

original: tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitum arhatha // Vi_20.53 //
analyzed: tasmāt evam viditvā enam na anuśocitum arhatha

original: athāśaucavyapagame susnātaḥ suprakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ svācāntas tv evaṃvidhān eva brāhmaṇān yathāśakti udaṅmukhān gandhamālyavastrālaṃkārādibhiḥ  #
analyzed: atha aśauca vyapagame su snātaḥ su prakṣālita pāṇi pādaḥ su ācāntaḥ tu evaṃvidhān eva brāhmaṇān yathāśakti udak mukhān gandha mālya vastra alaṃkāra ādibhiḥ

original: ucchiṣṭasaṃnidhāv ekam eva tannāmagotrābhyāṃ piṇḍaṃ nirvapet // Vi_21.3 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa saṃnidhau ekam eva tad nāma gotrābhyām piṇḍam nirvapet

original: bhuktavatsu brāhmaṇeṣu dakṣiṇayābhipūjiteṣu pretanāmagotrābhyāṃ dattākṣayyodakaḥ caturaṅgulapṛthvīḥ tāvadantarāḥ tāvadadhaḥkhātāḥ vitastyāyatāḥ  #
analyzed: bhuktavatsu brāhmaṇeṣu dakṣiṇayā abhipūjiteṣu preta nāma gotrābhyām datta akṣayya udakaḥ catur aṅgula pṛthvīḥ tāvat antarāḥ tāvat adhas khātāḥ vitasti āyatāḥ  /

original: karṣūsamīpe cāgnitrayam upasamādhāya paristīrya tatraikaikasmin āhutitrayaṃ juhuyāt // Vi_21.5 //
analyzed: karṣū samīpe ca agnitrayam upasamādhāya paristīrya tatra ekaikasmin āhuti trayam juhuyāt

original: sthānatraye ca prāgvat piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_21.9 //
analyzed: sthāna traye ca prāgvat piṇḍa nirvapaṇam kuryāt

original: annadadhighṛtamadhumāṃsaiḥ karṣūtrayaṃ pūrayitvā etat ta iti japet // Vi_21.10 //
analyzed: anna dadhi ghṛta madhu māṃsaiḥ karṣū trayam pūrayitvā etat te iti japet

original: saṃvatsarānte pretāya tatpitre tatpitāmahāya tatprapitāmahāya ca brāhmaṇān devapūrvān bhojayet // Vi_21.12 //
analyzed: saṃvatsara ante pretāya tad pitre tad pitāmahāya tad prapitāmahāya ca brāhmaṇān deva pūrvān bhojayet

original: atrāgnaukaraṇam āvāhanaṃ pādyaṃ ca kuryāt // Vi_21.13 //
analyzed: atra agnaukaraṇam āvāhanam pādyam ca kuryāt

original: saṃsṛjatu tvā pṛthivī samānī ca iti ca pretapādyapātre pitṛpādyapātratraye yojayet // Vi_21.14 //
analyzed: saṃsṛjatu tvā pṛthivī samānī ca iti ca preta pādya pātre pitṛ pādya pātra traye yojayet

original: brāhmaṇāṃś ca svācāntān dattadakṣiṇāṃś cānuvrajya visarjayet // Vi_21.16 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān ca su ācāntān datta dakṣiṇān ca anuvrajya visarjayet

original: tataḥ pretapiṇḍaṃ pādyapātrodakavat piṇḍatraye nidadhyāt // Vi_21.17 //
analyzed: tatas preta piṇḍam pādya pātra udaka vat piṇḍa traye nidadhyāt
karṣū traya saṃnikrṣe pi evam eva

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāt // Vi_21.19 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam māsikārthavat dvādaśa aham śrāddham kṛtvā trayodaśe hni vā kuryāt
mantra varjam hi śūdrāṇām dvādaśe hni

original: tadā māsikārthe dinam ekaṃ vardhayet // Vi_21.21 //
analyzed: tadā māsika arthe dinam ekam vardhayet

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ strīṇāṃ kāryam evaṃ tathā bhavet /
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam strīṇām kāryam evam tathā bhavet

original: yāvaj jīvaṃ tathā kuryāc chrāddhaṃ tu prativatsaram // Vi_21.22 //
analyzed: yāvat jīvam tathā kuryāt śrāddham tu prativatsaram

original: tasyāpy annaṃ sodakumbhaṃ dadyād varṣaṃ dvijanmane // Vi_21.23 //
analyzed: tasya api annam sa udakumbham dadyāt varṣam dvijanmane

original: brāhmaṇasya sapiṇḍānāṃ jananamaraṇayor daśāham āśaucam // Vi_22.1 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya sapiṇḍānām janana maraṇayoḥ daśa aham āśaucam

original: sapiṇḍatā ca puruṣe saptame vinivartate // Vi_22.5 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍa tā ca puruṣe saptame vinivartate
āśauce homa dāna pratigraha svādhyāyāḥ nivartante

original: brāhmaṇādīnām aśauce yaḥ sakṛd evānnam atti tasya tāvad āśaucaṃ yāvat teṣām // Vi_22.8 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādīnām aśauce yaḥ sakṛt eva annam atti tasya tāvat āśaucam yāvat teṣām

original: savarṇasyāśauce dvijo bhuktvā sravantīm āsādya tannimagnas triraghamarṣaṇaṃ japtvottīrya gāyatryaṣṭasahasraṃ japet // Vi_22.10 //
analyzed: sa varṇasya āśauce dvijaḥ bhuktvā sravantīm āsādya tad nimagnaḥ tris aghamarṣaṇam japtvā uttīrya gāyatrī aṣṭa sahasram japet

original: kṣatriyāśauce brāhmaṇas tv etad evopoṣitaḥ kṛtvā śudhyati // Vi_22.11 //
analyzed: kṣatriya āśauce brāhmaṇaḥ tu etat eva upoṣitaḥ kṛtvā śudhyati
vaiśya āśauce brāhmaṇaḥ tri rātra upoṣitaḥ ca

original: brāhmaṇāśauce rājanyaḥ kṣatriyāśauce vaiśyaś ca sravantīm āsādya gāyatrīśatapañcakaṃ japet // Vi_22.14 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa āśauce rājanyaḥ kṣatriya āśauce vaiśyaḥ ca sravantīm āsādya gāyatrī śata pañcakam japet

original: vaiśyaś ca brāhmaṇāśauce gāyatryaṣṭaśataṃ japet // Vi_22.15 //
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ ca brāhmaṇa āśauce gāyatrī aṣṭaśatam japet

original: śūdrāśauce dvijo bhuktvā prājāpatyaṃ caret // Vi_22.16 //
analyzed: śūdra āśauce dvijaḥ bhuktvā prājāpatyam caret

original: śūdraś ca dvijāśauce snānam ācaret // Vi_22.17 //
analyzed: śūdraḥ ca dvija āśauce snānam ācaret

original: śūdraḥ śūdrāśauce snātaḥ pañcagavyaṃ pibet // Vi_22.18 //
analyzed: śūdraḥ śūdra āśauce snātaḥ pañcagavyam pibet

original: patnīnāṃ dāsānām ānulomyena svāminas tulyam āśaucam // Vi_22.19 //
analyzed: patnīnām dāsānām ānulomyena svāminaḥ tulyam āśaucam

original: hīnavarṇānām adhikavarṇeṣu sapiṇḍeṣu tadaśaucavyapagame śuddhiḥ // Vi_22.21 //
analyzed: hīna varṇānām adhika varṇeṣu sapiṇḍeṣu tad aśauca vyapagame śuddhiḥ
brāhmaṇasya kṣatri viś śūdreṣu sapiṇḍeṣu ṣaṣ rātra tri rātra eka rātraiḥ
kṣatriyasya viś śūdrayoḥ ṣaṣ rātra tri rātrābhyām

original: jātamṛte mṛtajāte vā kulasya sadyaḥ śaucam // Vi_22.26 //
analyzed: jāta mṛte mṛta jāte vā kulasya sadyas śaucam

original: adantajāte bāle prete sadya eva // Vi_22.27 //
analyzed: a danta jāte bāle prete sadyas eva

original: dantajāte tv akṛtacūḍe tv ahorātreṇa // Vi_22.29 //
analyzed: danta jāte tu a kṛta cūḍe tu ahar rātreṇa
kṛtacūḍe tu a saṃskṛte tri rātreṇa
saṃskṛtāsu strīṣu na āśaucam pitṛ pakṣe
tad prasava maraṇe ced pitṛ gṛhe syātām
tadā eka rātram tri rātram ca
janana āśauca madhye yadi aparam janana āśaucam syāt
maraṇa āśauca madhye jñāti maraṇe pi evam

original: śrutvā deśāntarastho jananamaraṇe āśaucaśeṣeṇa śudhyet // Vi_22.39 //
analyzed: śrutvā deśa antara sthaḥ janana maraṇe āśauca śeṣeṇa śudhyet
vyatīte śauce saṃvatsara antar tu eka rātreṇa

original: ācārye mātāmahe ca vyatīte trirātreṇa // Vi_22.42 //
analyzed: ācārye mātāmahe ca vyatīte tri rātreṇa

original: anauraseṣu putreṣu jāteṣu ca mṛteṣu ca /
analyzed: anauraseṣu putreṣu jāteṣu ca mṛteṣu ca

original: parapūrvāsu bhāryāsu prasūtāsu mṛtāsu ca // Vi_22.43 //

analyzed: ācārya patnī putra upādhyāya mātula śvaśura śvaśurya saha adhyāyi śiṣyeṣu atīteṣu eka rātreṇa
bhṛgu agni anāśaka ambu saṃgrāma vidyut nṛpa hatānām na āśaucam
na rāja ājñā kāriṇām tad icchayā
na deva pratiṣṭhā vivāhayoḥ pūrva saṃbhṛtayoḥ
ātmatyāginaḥ patitāḥ ca na āśauca udaka bhājaḥ

original: patitasya dāsī mṛte 'hni padā apāṃ ghaṭam apavarjayet // Vi_22.57 //
analyzed: patitasya dāsī mṛte hni padā apām ghaṭam apavarjayet

original: udbandhanamṛtasya yaḥ pāśaṃ chindyāt sa taptakṛcchreṇa śudhyati // Vi_22.58 //
analyzed: udbandhana mṛtasya yaḥ pāśam chindyāt sa taptakṛcchreṇa śudhyati

original: sarvasyaiva pretasya bāndhavaiḥ sahāśrupātaṃ kṛtvā snānena // Vi_22.61 //
analyzed: sarvasya eva pretasya bāndhavaiḥ saha aśrupātam kṛtvā snānena
a kṛte sthisaṃcaye sa caila snānena

original: dvijaḥ śūdrapretānugamanaṃ kṛtvā sravantīm āsādya tannimagnaḥ triraghamarṣaṇaṃ japtvottīrya gāyatryaṣṭasahasraṃ japet // Vi_22.63 //
analyzed: dvijaḥ śūdra preta anugamanam kṛtvā sravantīm āsādya tad nimagnaḥ tris aghamarṣaṇam japtvā uttīrya gāyatrī aṣṭa sahasram japet

original: śūdraḥ pretānugamanaṃ kṛtvā snānam ācaret // Vi_22.65 //
analyzed: śūdraḥ preta anugamanam kṛtvā snānam ācaret

original: citādhūmasevane sarve varṇāḥ snānam ācareyuḥ // Vi_22.66 //
analyzed: citā dhūma sevane sarve varṇāḥ snānam ācareyuḥ

original: maithune duḥsvapne rudhiropagatakaṇṭhe vamanavirekayoś ca // Vi_22.67 //
analyzed: maithune duḥsvapne rudhira upagata kaṇṭhe vamana virekayoḥ ca

original: śavaspṛśaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā rajasvalācaṇḍālayūpāṃś ca // Vi_22.69 //
analyzed: śava spṛśam ca spṛṣṭvā rajasvalā caṇḍāla yūpān ca
bhakṣya varjam pañcanakha śavam tad asthi sneham ca

original: sarveṣv eteṣu snāneṣu vastraṃ nāprakṣālitaṃ bibhṛyāt // Vi_22.71 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eteṣu snāneṣu vastram na a prakṣālitam bibhṛyāt

original: rajasvalā hīnavarṇāṃ rajasvalāṃ spṛṣṭvā na tāvad aśnīyāt yāvan na śuddhā // Vi_22.73 //
analyzed: rajasvalā hīna varṇām rajasvalām spṛṣṭvā na tāvat aśnīyāt yāvat na śuddhā

original: savarṇām adhikavarṇāṃ vā spṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ snātvā śudhyati // Vi_22.74 //
analyzed: savarṇām adhika varṇām vā spṛṣṭvā sadyas snātvā śudhyati

original: kṣutvā suptvā bhuktvā bhojanādhyayanepsuḥ pītvā snātvā niṣṭhīvya vāsaḥ paridhāya rathyām ākramya mūtrapurīṣaṃ kṛtvā pañcanakhāsthy asnehaṃ  #
analyzed: kṣutvā suptvā bhuktvā bhojana adhyayana īpsuḥ pītvā snātvā niṣṭhīvya vāsaḥ paridhāya rathyām ākramya mūtra purīṣam kṛtvā pañcanakha asthi asneham

original: nābher adhastāt prabāhuṣu ca kāyikair malaiḥ surābhir madyaiś copahato mṛttoyais tadaṅgaṃ prakṣālya śudhyet // Vi_22.77 //
analyzed: nābheḥ adhastāt prabāhuṣu ca kāyikaiḥ malaiḥ surābhiḥ madyaiḥ ca upahataḥ mṛd toyaiḥ tad aṅgam prakṣālya śudhyet

original: anyatropahato mṛttoyais tadaṅgaṃ prakṣālya snānena // Vi_22.78 //
analyzed: anyatra upahataḥ mṛd toyaiḥ tad aṅgam prakṣālya snānena

original: vaktropahatas tv upoṣya snātvā pañcagavyena // Vi_22.79 //
analyzed: vaktra upahataḥ tu upoṣya snātvā pañcagavyena

original: vasā śukram asṛṅ majjā mūtraṃ viṭ karṇaviṇnakhāḥ /
analyzed: vasā śukram asṛk majjā mūtram viṣ karṇaviś nakhāḥ

original: śleṣmāśru dūṣikā svedo dvādaśaite nṛṇāṃ malāḥ // Vi_22.81 //
analyzed: śleṣmā aśru dūṣikā svedaḥ dvādaśā ete nṛṇām malāḥ

original: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
analyzed: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā

original: yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijātibhiḥ // Vi_22.82 //
analyzed: yathā eva ekā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijātibhiḥ
amedhyāni daśa etāni madyāni brāhmaṇasya ca

original: rājanyaś caiva vaiśyaś ca spṛṣṭvaitāni na duṣyataḥ // Vi_22.84 //
analyzed: rājanyaḥ ca eva vaiśyaḥ ca spṛṣṭvā etāni na duṣyataḥ

original: guroḥ pretasya śiṣyas tu pitṛmedhaṃ samācaran /
analyzed: guroḥ pretasya śiṣyaḥ tu pitṛ medham samācaran

original: pretāhāraiḥ samaṃ tatra daśarātreṇa śudhyati // Vi_22.85 //
analyzed: preta āhāraiḥ samam tatra daśa rātreṇa śudhyati

original: ācāryaṃ svam upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ gurum /
analyzed: ācāryam svam upādhyāyam pitaram mātaram gurum

original: nirhṛtya tu vratī pretān na vratena viyujyate // Vi_22.86 //
analyzed: nirhṛtya tu vratī pretāt na vratena viyujyate

original: ādiṣṭī nodakaṃ kuryād ā vratasya samāpanāt /
analyzed: ādiṣṭī na udakam kuryāt ā vratasya samāpanāt

original: samāpte tūdakaṃ kṛtvā trirātreṇaiva śudhyati // Vi_22.87 //
analyzed: samāpte tu udakam kṛtvā tri rātreṇa eva śudhyati
jñānam tapaḥ gniḥ āhāraḥ mṛd manaḥ vāri upāñjanam

original: vāyuḥ karmārkakālau ca śuddhikartṝṇi dehinām // Vi_22.88 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ karma arka kālau ca śuddhi kartṝṇi dehinām

original: sarveṣām eva śaucānām annaśaucaṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: sarveṣām eva śaucānām anna śaucam param smṛtam

original: yo 'nne śuciḥ sa hi śucir na mṛdvāriśuciḥ śuciḥ // Vi_22.89 //
analyzed: yaḥ nne śuciḥ sa hi śuciḥ na mṛd vāri śuciḥ śuciḥ
kṣāntyā śudhyanti vidvāṃsaḥ dānena akārya kāriṇaḥ
pracchanna pāpāḥ japyena tapasā veda vittamāḥ

original: mṛttoyaiḥ śudhyate śodhyaṃ nadī vegena śudhyati /
analyzed: mṛd toyaiḥ śudhyate śodhyam nadī vegena śudhyati

original: rajasā strī manoduṣṭā saṃnyāsena dvijottamāḥ // Vi_22.91 //
analyzed: rajasā strī manaḥ duṣṭā saṃnyāsena dvijottamāḥ

original: adbhir gātrāṇi śudhyanti manaḥ satyena śudhyati /
analyzed: adbhiḥ gātrāṇi śudhyanti manaḥ satyena śudhyati

original: vidyātapobhyāṃ bhūtātmā buddhir jñānena śudhyati // Vi_22.92 //
analyzed: vidyā tapobhyām bhūta ātmā buddhiḥ jñānena śudhyati

original: eṣa śaucasya te proktaḥ śārīrasya vinirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa śaucasya te proktaḥ śārīrasya vinirṇayaḥ

original: nānāvidhānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ śuddheḥ śṛṇu vinirṇayam // Vi_22.93 //
śārīrair malaiḥ surābhir madyair vā yad upahataṃ tad atyantopahatam // Vi_23.1 //
analyzed: śārīraiḥ malaiḥ surābhiḥ madyaiḥ vā yat upahatam tat atyanta upahatam

original: atyantopahataṃ sarvaṃ lohabhāṇḍam agnau prakṣiptaṃ śudhyet // Vi_23.2 //
analyzed: atyanta upahatam sarvam loha bhāṇḍam agnau prakṣiptam śudhyet

original: maṇimayam aśmamayam abjaṃ ca saptarātraṃ mahīnikhananena // Vi_23.3 //
analyzed: maṇi mayam aśma mayam ap jam ca sapta rātram mahī nikhananena

original: atyantopahatasya vastrasya yat prakṣālitaṃ sad virajyate tac chindyāt // Vi_23.6 //
analyzed: atyanta upahatasya vastrasya yat prakṣālitam sat virajyate tat chindyāt
sauvarṇa rājata abja maṇi mayānām nirlepānām adbhiḥ śuddhiḥ
yajña karmaṇi yajña pātrāṇām pāṇinā saṃmārjanena
sphya śūrpa śakaṭa musala ulūkhalānām prokṣaṇena
dhānya ajina rajju tāntava vaidala sūtra kārpāsa vāsasām ca
tāmra rīti trapu sīsa mayānām amla udakena

original: guḍādīnām ikṣuvikārāṇāṃ prabhūtānāṃ gṛhanihitānāṃ vāryagnidānena // Vi_23.31 //
analyzed: guḍa ādīnām ikṣu vikārāṇām prabhūtānām gṛha nihitānām vāri agni dānena

original: dravyavat kṛtaśaucānāṃ devatārcānāṃ bhūyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpanena // Vi_23.34 //
analyzed: dravya vat kṛta śaucānām devatā arcānām bhūyas pratiṣṭhāpanena

original: asiddhasyānnasya yanmātram upahataṃ tanmātraṃ parityajya śeṣasya kaṇḍanaprakṣālane kuryāt // Vi_23.35 //
analyzed: a siddhasya annasya yat mātram upahatam tad mātram parityajya śeṣasya kaṇḍana prakṣālane kuryāt

original: droṇābhyadhikam siddham annam upahataṃ na duṣyati // Vi_23.36 //
analyzed: droṇa abhyadhikam siddham annam upahatam na duṣyati

original: tasyopahatamātram apāsya gāyatryābhimantritaṃ suvarṇāmbhaḥ prakṣipet bastasya ca pradarśayed agneś ca // Vi_23.37 //
analyzed: tasya upahata mātram apāsya gāyatryā abhimantritam suvarṇa ambhaḥ prakṣipet bastasya ca pradarśayet agneḥ ca

original: dūṣitaṃ keśakīṭaiś ca mṛtprakṣepeṇa śudhyati // Vi_23.38 //
analyzed: dūṣitam keśa kīṭaiḥ ca mṛd prakṣepeṇa śudhyati

original: yāvan nāpaity amedhyāktād gandho lepaś ca tatkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat na apaiti amedhya aktāt gandhaḥ lepaḥ ca tad kṛtaḥ

original: tāvan mṛdvāri deyaṃ syāt sarvāsu dravyaśuddhiṣu // Vi_23.39 //
analyzed: tāvat mṛd vāri deyam syāt sarvāsu dravya śuddhiṣu

original: ajāśvaṃ mukhato medhyaṃ na gaur na narajā malāḥ /
analyzed: aja aśvam mukhataḥ medhyam na gauḥ na nara jāḥ malāḥ
panthānaḥ ca viśudhyanti soma sūrya aṃśu mārutaiḥ
rathyā kardama toyāni spṛṣṭāni antya śva vāyasaiḥ
mārutena eva śudhyanti pakva iṣṭakā citāni ca

original: prāṇinām atha sarveṣāṃ mṛdbhir adbhiś ca kārayet /
analyzed: prāṇinām atha sarveṣām mṛdbhiḥ adbhiḥ ca kārayet

original: atyantopahatānāṃ ca śaucaṃ nityam atandritam // Vi_23.42 //
analyzed: atyanta upahatānām ca śaucam nityam atandritam

original: bhūmiṣṭham udakaṃ puṇyaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ yatra gor bhavet /
analyzed: bhūmiṣṭham udakam puṇyam vaitṛṣṇyam yatra goḥ bhavet

original: avyāptaṃ ced amedhyena tadvad eva śilāgatam // Vi_23.43 //
analyzed: a vyāptam ced amedhyena tadvat eva śilā gatam

original: apaḥ samuddharet sarvāḥ śeṣaṃ vastreṇa śodhayet // Vi_23.44 //
analyzed: apaḥ samuddharet sarvāḥ śeṣam vastreṇa śodhayet
vahni prajvālanam kuryāt kūpe pakva iṣṭakā cite
pañcagavyam nyaset paścāt nava toya samudbhave

original: kūpavat kathitā śuddhir mahatsu ca na dūṣaṇam // Vi_23.46 //
analyzed: kūpa vat kathitā śuddhiḥ mahatsu ca na dūṣaṇam

original: adṛṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktaṃ yac ca vācā praśasyate // Vi_23.47 //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭam adbhiḥ nirṇiktam yat ca vācā praśasyate

original: nityaṃ śuddhaḥ kāruhastaḥ paṇyaṃ yac ca prasāritam /
analyzed: nityam śuddhaḥ kāru hastaḥ paṇyam yat ca prasāritam

original: brāhamaṇāntaritaṃ bhaikṣyam ākarāḥ sarva eva ca // Vi_23.48 //
analyzed: brāhamaṇa antaritam bhaikṣyam ākarāḥ sarve eva ca

original: nityam āsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuniḥ phalapātane /
analyzed: nityam āsyam śuci strīṇām śakuniḥ phala pātane

original: prasrave ca śucir vatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // Vi_23.49 //
analyzed: prasrave ca śuciḥ vatsaḥ śvā mṛga grahaṇe śuciḥ

original: śvabhir hatasya yan māṃsaṃ śuci tat parikīrtitam /
analyzed: śvabhiḥ hatasya yat māṃsam śuci tat parikīrtitam

original: kravyādbhiś ca hatasyānyaiś caṇḍālādyaiś ca dasyubhiḥ // Vi_23.50 //
analyzed: kravyādbhiḥ ca hatasya anyaiḥ caṇḍāla ādyaiḥ ca dasyubhiḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ nābher yāni khāni tāni medhyāni nirdiśet /
analyzed: ūrdhvam nābheḥ yāni khāni tāni medhyāni nirdiśet

original: yāny adhastāny amedhyāni dehāc caiva malāś cyutāḥ // Vi_23.51 //
analyzed: yāni adhastāni amedhyāni dehāt ca eva malāḥ cyutāḥ

original: rajo bhūr vāyur agniś ca mārjāraś ca sadā śuciḥ // Vi_23.52 //
analyzed: rajaḥ bhūḥ vāyuḥ agniḥ ca mārjāraḥ ca sadā śuciḥ

original: nocchiṣṭaṃ kurvate mukhyā vipruṣo 'ṅge na yānti yāḥ /
analyzed: na ucchiṣṭam kurvate mukhyāḥ vipruṣaḥ ṅge na yānti yāḥ

original: na śmaśrūṇi gatāny āsyaṃ na dantāntaraveṣṭitam // Vi_23.53 //
analyzed: na śmaśrūṇi gatāni āsyam na danta antara veṣṭitam

original: spṛśanti bindavaḥ pādau ya ācāmayataḥ parān /

original: bhaumikais te samā jñeyā na tair aprayato bhavet // Vi_23.54 //
analyzed: bhaumikaiḥ te samāḥ jñeyāḥ na taiḥ aprayataḥ bhavet

original: anidhāyaiva tad dravyam ācāntaḥ śucitām iyāt // Vi_23.55 //
analyzed: a nidhāya eva tat dravyam ācāntaḥ śuci tām iyāt
mārjana upāñjanaiḥ veśma prokṣaṇena eva pustakam

original: dāhena ca bhuvaḥ śuddhir vāsenāpy atha vā gavām /
analyzed: dāhena ca bhuvaḥ śuddhiḥ vāsena api atha vā gavām

original: gāvaḥ pavitramaṅgalyaṃ goṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // Vi_23.57 //
analyzed: gāvaḥ pavitra maṅgalyam goṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ sarpiḥ kṣīraṃ dadhi ca rocanā // Vi_23.58 //
analyzed: go mūtram gomayam sarpiḥ kṣīram dadhi ca rocanā

original: ṣaḍaṅgam etat paramaṃ maṅgalyaṃ paramaṃ gavām /
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgam etat paramam maṅgalyam paramam gavām
śṛṅgodakam gavām puṇyam sarva agha viniṣūdanam
gavām kaṇḍūyanam ca eva sarva kalmaṣa nāśanam

original: gavāṃ hi tīrthe vasatīha gaṅgā puṣṭis tathāsāṃ rajasi pravṛddhā /
analyzed: gavām hi tīrthe vasati iha gaṅgā puṣṭiḥ tathā āsām rajasi pravṛddhā

original: lakṣmīḥ karīṣe praṇatau ca dharmas tāsāṃ praṇāmaṃ satataṃ ca kuryāt // Vi_23.61 //

original: na sagotrāṃ na samānārṣapravarāṃ bhāryāṃ vindeta // Vi_24.9 //
analyzed: na sagotrām na samāna ārṣa pravarām bhāryām vindeta

analyzed: dvayoḥ sa kāmayoḥ mātā pitṛ rahitaḥ yogaḥ gāndharvaḥ

analyzed: brāhmeṇa vivāhena kanyām dadat brahma lokam gamayati

analyzed: pūrva abhāve prakṛti sthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ iti

analyzed: mṛte bhartari brahmacaryam tadanu ārohaṇam vā

analyzed: āyuḥ sā harate bhartuḥ narakam ca eva gacchati

analyzed: svargam gacchati aputrā api yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ

analyzed: samāna varṇāyāḥ abhāve tu anantarayā eva āpdi ca

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ trayo 'py ete yathākālam asaṃskṛtāḥ /

original: yady asya vihitaṃ carma yat sūtraṃ yā ca mekhalā /

original: apsu prāsya vinaṣṭāni gṛhṇītānyāni mantravat // Vi_27.29 //

original: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ japet tiṣṭhan paścimām āsīnaḥ // Vi_28.3 //

original: tasya ca vyatyastakaraḥ pādāv upaspṛśet // Vi_28.15 //
analyzed: tasya ca vyatyasta karaḥ pādau upaspṛśet

original: svaṃ ca nāmāsyābhivādanānte bhoḥśabdāntaṃ nivedayet // Vi_28.17 //
analyzed: svam ca nāma asya abhivādana ante bhoḥ śabda antam nivedayet

analyzed: tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ bhuñjānaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ ca na asya abhibhāṣaṇam kuryāt

analyzed: āsīnasya sthitaḥ kuryāt abhigacchan tu gacchataḥ

analyzed: tasya ca cakṣuḥ viṣaye na yathā iṣṭa āsanaḥ syāt

original: na cāsya kevalaṃ nāma brūyāt // Vi_28.24 //
analyzed: na ca asya kevalam nāma brūyāt

original: yatrāsya nindāparivādau syātāṃ na tatra tiṣṭhet // Vi_28.26 //
analyzed: yatra asya nindā parivādau syātām na tatra tiṣṭhet

original: guror gurau saṃnihite guruvad varteta // Vi_28.29 //
analyzed: guroḥ gurau saṃnihite guru vat varteta

original: anirdiṣṭaś ca guruṇā svān gurun nābhivādayet // Vi_28.30 //
analyzed: a nirdiṣṭaḥ ca guruṇā svān gurun na abhivādayet

original: bāle samānavayasi vādhyāpake guruputre guruvad varteta // Vi_28.31 //

original: evaṃ vedaṃ vedau vedān vā svīkuryāt // Vi_28.34 //
analyzed: evam vedam vedau vedān vā svīkuryāt

analyzed: yaḥ tu an adhīta vedaḥ nyatra śramam kuryāt asau sa saṃtānaḥ śūdra tvam eti

original: mātur agre vijananaṃ dvitīyaṃ mauñjibandhanam // Vi_28.37 //

analyzed: tatra asya mātā sāvitrī bhavati pitā tu ācāryaḥ ācārthaḥ

original: prāṅ mauñjībandhanād dvijaḥ śūdrasamo bhavati // Vi_28.40 //
analyzed: prāk mauñjībandhanāt dvijaḥ śūdra samaḥ bhavati

original: brahmacāriṇā muṇḍena jaṭilena vā bhāvyam // Vi_28.41 //

analyzed: tatas guru kule eva vā janmanaḥ śeṣam nayet

original: evaṃ carati yo vipro brahmacaryam atandritaḥ /
