original: saptāgāraṃ cared bhaikṣaṃ svakarma parikīrtayan // Vi_28.49 //
analyzed: sapta agāram caret bhaikṣam sva karma parikīrtayan

original: upaspṛśaṃs triṣavaṇam abdena sa viśudhyati // Vi_28.50 //
svapne siktvā brahmacārī dvijaḥ śukram akāmataḥ /
analyzed: svapne siktvā brahmacārī dvijaḥ śukram akāmataḥ

original: snātvārkam arcayitvā triḥ punar mām ity ṛcaṃ japet // Vi_28.51 //
analyzed: snātvā arkam arcayitvā tris punar mām iti ṛcam japet
a kṛtvā bhaikṣa caraṇam a samiddhya ca pāvakam
anāturaḥ sapta rātram avakīrṇi vratam caret

original: taṃ ced abhyudiyāt sūryaḥ śayānaṃ kāmakārataḥ /
analyzed: tam ced abhyudiyāt sūryaḥ śayānam kāmakārataḥ

original: nimloced vāpy+avijñānāj japann upavased dinam // Vi_28.53 //
analyzed: nimlocet vā api avijñānāt japan upavaset dinam

original: yas tūpanīya vratādeśaṃ kṛtvā vedam adhyāpayet tam ācāryaṃ vidyāt // Vi_29.1 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu upanīya vratādeśam kṛtvā vedam adhyāpayet tam ācāryam vidyāt

original: yas tv enaṃ mūlyenādhyāpayet tam upādhyāyam ekadeśaṃ vā // Vi_29.2 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu enam mūlyena adhyāpayet tam upādhyāyam ekadeśam vā

original: yo yasya yajñnakarmāṇi kuryāt tam ṛtvijaṃ vidyāt // Vi_29.3 //
analyzed: yaḥ yasya yajñna karmāṇi kuryāt tam ṛtvijam vidyāt

original: adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati /
analyzed: adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaḥ ca adharmeṇa pṛcchati

original: tayor anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati // Vi_29.7 //
analyzed: tayoḥ anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣam vā adhigacchati

original: dharmārthau yatra na syātāṃ śuśrūṣā vāpi tadvidhā /
analyzed: dharma arthau yatra na syātām śuśrūṣā vā api tadvidhā

original: tatra vidyā na vaktavyā śubhaṃ bījam ivoṣare // Vi_29.8 //
analyzed: tatra vidyā na vaktavyā śubham bījam iva ūṣare

original: vidyā ha vai brahmaṇam ājagāma gopāya mā śevadhiṣṭe 'ham asti /
analyzed: vidyā ha vai brahmaṇam ājagāma gopāya mā ham asti

original: asūyakāyānṛjave 'yatāya na māṃ brūyā avīryavatī tathā syām // Vi_29.9 //
analyzed: asūyakāya anṛjave yatāya na mām brūyāḥ a vīryavatī tathā syām

original: yam eva vidyāḥ śucim apramattaṃ medhāvinaṃ brahmacaryopapannam /
analyzed: yam eva vidyāḥ śucim apramattam medhāvinam brahmacarya upapannam

original: yas te na druhyet katamac ca nāha tasmai māṃ brūyā nidhipāya brahman // Vi_29.10 //
analyzed: yaḥ te na druhyet katamat ca na āha tasmai mām brūyāḥ nidhipāya brahman

original: śrāvaṇyāṃ prauṣṭhapadyāṃ vā chandāṃsy upākṛtyārdhapañcamān māsān adhīyīta // Vi_30.1 //
analyzed: śrāvaṇyām prauṣṭhapadyām vā chandāṃsi upākṛtya ardhapañcamān māsān adhīyīta

original: tatas teṣām utsargaṃ bahiḥ kuryāt // Vi_30.2 //

analyzed: utsarjana upākarmaṇoḥ madhye vedāṅga adhyayanam kuryāt
na adhīyīta ahorātram caturdaśī aṣṭamīṣu ca
na bhū kaṃpa ulkā pāta digdāheṣu
na hasti aśva uṣṭra nau go yāneṣu
na rāja śrotriya go brāhmaṇa vyasane
abhiyuktaḥ u pi anadhyāyeṣu adhyayanam pariharet
yasmāt anadhyāya adhītam na iha amutra phala pradam
tad adhyayanena āyuṣaḥ kṣayaḥ guru śiṣyayoḥ ca

original: tasmād anadhyāyavarjaṃ guruṇā brahmalokakāmena vidyā satśiṣyakṣetreṣu vaptavyā // Vi_30.31 //
analyzed: tasmāt anadhyāya varjam guruṇā brahma loka kāmena vidyā sat śiṣya kṣetreṣu vaptavyā

original: śiṣyeṇa brahmārambhāvasānayor guroḥ pādopasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kāryam // Vi_30.32 //
analyzed: śiṣyeṇa brahma ārambha avasānayoḥ guroḥ pāda upasaṃgrahaṇam kāryam

original: tatra ca yad ṛco 'dhīte tenāsyājyena pitṝṇāṃ tṛptir bhavati // Vi_30.34 //
analyzed: tatra ca yat ṛcaḥ dhīte tena asya ājyena pitṝṇām tṛptiḥ bhavati
yat purāṇa itihāsa vedāṅga dharma śāstrāṇi adhīte tena asya annena

original: yaś ca vidyām āsādyāsmin loke tayā jīvet,
analyzed: yaḥ ca vidyām āsādya asmin loke tayā jīvet

original: na sā tasya paraloke phalapradā bhavet // Vi_30.39 //
analyzed: na sā tasya para loke phala pradā bhavet

original: yaś ca vidyayā yaśaḥ pareṣāṃ hanti // Vi_30.40 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca vidyayā yaśaḥ pareṣām hanti

original: ananujñātaś cānyasmād adhīyānān na vidyām ādadyāt // Vi_30.41 //
analyzed: an anujñātaḥ ca anyasmāt adhīyānāt na vidyām ādadyāt

original: tadādānam asya brahmasteyaṃ narakāya bhavati // Vi_30.42 //
analyzed: tad ādānam asya brahmasteyam narakāya bhavati

original: laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vāpi tathādhyātmikam eva vā /
analyzed: laukikam vaidikam vā api tathā ādhyātmikam eva vā

original: ādadīta yato jñānaṃ na taṃ druhyet kadācana // Vi_30.43 //
analyzed: ādadīta yatas jñānam na tam druhyet kadācana
utpādaka brahma dātroḥ garīyān brahma daḥ pitā

original: brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ceha ca śāśvatam // Vi_30.44 //
analyzed: brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ca iha ca śāśvatam

original: kāmān mātā pitā cainaṃ yad utpādayato mithaḥ /
analyzed: kāmāt mātā pitā ca enam yat utpādayataḥ mithas

original: saṃbhūtiṃ tasya tāṃ vidyād yad yonāv iha jāyate // Vi_30.45 //
analyzed: saṃbhūtim tasya tām vidyāt yat yonau iha jāyate

original: ācāryas tv asya yāṃ jātiṃ vidhivad vedapāragaḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ tu asya yām jātim vidhivat vedapāragaḥ

original: utpādayati sāvitryā sā satyā sājarāmarā // Vi_30.46 //
analyzed: utpādayati sāvitryā sā satyā sā ajarā amarā

original: ya āvṛṇoty avitathena karṇāv aduḥkhaṃ kurvann amṛtaṃ saṃprayacchan /
analyzed: yaḥ āvṛṇoti avitathena karṇau aduḥkham kurvan amṛtam saṃprayacchan

original: taṃ manyeta pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca tasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānan // Vi_30.47 //
analyzed: tam manyeta pitaram mātaram ca tasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānan

original: teṣāṃ nityam eva śuśrūṣuṇā bhavitavyam // Vi_31.3 //
yat te brūyus tat kuryāt // Vi_31.4 //
na tair ananujñātaḥ kiṃcid api kuryāt // Vi_31.6 //
analyzed: na taiḥ an anujñātaḥ kiṃcid api kuryāt

original: eta eva trayo vedā eta eva trayaḥ surāḥ /
analyzed: ete eva trayaḥ veda ete eva trayaḥ surāḥ

original: eta eva trayo lokā eta eva trayo 'gnayaḥ // Vi_31.7 //
analyzed: ete eva trayaḥ lokāḥ ete eva trayaḥ gnayaḥ

original: pitā gārhaptyo 'gniḥ dakṣināgnir mātā gurur āhavanīyaḥ // Vi_31.8 //
analyzed: pitā gārhaptyaḥ gniḥ mātā guruḥ āhavanīyaḥ

original: sarve tasyādṛtā dharmā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ /
analyzed: sarve tasya ādṛtāḥ dharmāḥ yasya ete trayaḥ ādṛtāḥ

original: anādṛtyās tu yasyaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥ // Vi_31.9 //
analyzed: an ādṛtyāḥ tu yasya ete sarvāḥ tasya aphalāḥ kriyāḥ

original: imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛbhaktyā pitṛbhaktyā tu madhyamam /
analyzed: imam lokam mātṛ bhaktyā pitṛ bhaktyā tu madhyamam

original: guruśuśrūṣayā tv eva brahmalokaṃ samāśnute // Vi_31.10 //
analyzed: guru śuśrūṣayā tu eva brahma lokam samāśnute
rāja ṛtvij śrotriya adharma pratiṣedhi upādhyāya pitṛvya mātāmaha mātula śvaśura jyeṣṭha bhrātṛ saṃbandhinaḥ ca ācārya vat

original: mātṛṣvasā pitṛṣvasā jyeṣṭhā svasā ca // Vi_32.3 //

analyzed: śvaśura pitṛvya mātula ṛtvijām kanīyasām pratyutthānam eva abhivādanam

original: hīnavarṇānāṃ gurupatnīnāṃ dūrād abhivādanaṃ na pādopasparśanam // Vi_32.5 //
analyzed: hīna varṇānām guru patnīnām dūrāt abhivādanam na pāda upasparśanam
guru patnīnām gotra utsādana añjana keśa saṃyamana pāda prakṣālana ādīni na kuryāt

original: asaṃstutāpi parapatnī bhaginīti vācyā putrīti māteti vā // Vi_32.7 //
analyzed: a saṃstutā api para patnī bhaginī iti vācyā putrī iti mātā iti vā

original: na ca gurūṇāṃ tvam iti brūyāt // Vi_32.8 //
analyzed: na ca gurūṇām tvam iti brūyāt

original: tadatikrame nirāhāro divasānte taṃ prasādyāśnīyāt // Vi_32.9 //
analyzed: tad atikrame nirāhāraḥ divasa ante tam prasādya aśnīyāt

original: na ca guruṇā saha vigṛhya kathāḥ kuryāt // Vi_32.10 //
analyzed: na ca guruṇā saha vigṛhya kathāḥ kuryāt
guru patnī tu yuvatiḥ na abhivādyā iha pādayoḥ
pūrṇa viṃśati varṣeṇa guṇa doṣau vijānatā

original: kāmaṃ tu gurupatnīnāṃ yuvatīnāṃ yuvā bhuvi /
analyzed: kāmam tu guru patnīnām yuvatīnām yuvā bhuvi

original: vidhivad vandanaṃ kuryād asāv aham iti bruvan // Vi_32.14 //
analyzed: vidhivat vandanam kuryāt asau aham iti bruvan
viproṣya pāda grahaṇam anvaham ca abhivādanam

original: gurudāreṣu kurvīta satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // Vi_32.15 //
analyzed: guru dāreṣu kurvīta satām dharmam anusmaran

original: vittaṃ bandhur vayaḥ karma vidyā bhavati pañcamī /
analyzed: vittam bandhuḥ vayaḥ karma vidyā bhavati pañcamī

original: etāni mānasthānāni garīyo yad yad uttaram // Vi_32.16 //
analyzed: etāni mānasthānāni garīyaḥ yat yat uttaram

original: brāhmaṇaṃ daśavarṣaṃ ca śatavarṣaṃ ca bhūmipam /
analyzed: brāhmaṇam daśa varṣam ca śata varṣam ca bhūmipam

original: pitāputrau vijānīyād brāhmaṇas tu tayoḥ pitā // Vi_32.17 //
analyzed: pitāputrau vijānīyāt brāhmaṇaḥ tu tayoḥ pitā

original: viprāṇāṃ jñānato jyaiṣṭhyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu vīryataḥ /
analyzed: viprāṇām jñānataḥ jyaiṣṭhyam kṣatriyāṇām tu vīryataḥ

original: vaiśyānāṃ dhānyadhanataḥ śūdrāṇām eva janmataḥ // Vi_32.18 //
analyzed: vaiśyānām dhānya dhanataḥ śūdrāṇām eva janmataḥ

original: atha puruṣasya kāmakrodhalobhākhyaṃ riputrayaṃ sughoraṃ bhavati // Vi_33.1 //
analyzed: atha puruṣasya kāma krodha lobha ākhyam ripu trayam su ghoram bhavati
tena ayam ākrāntaḥ tipātaka mahāpātaka anupātaka upapātakeṣu pravartate
jāti bhraṃśa kareṣu saṃkarīkaraṇeṣu a pātrīkaraṇeṣu
trividham narakasya idam dvāram nāśanam ātmanaḥ

original: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ jyayet // Vi_33.6 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ tasmāt etat trayam jyayet

original: mātṛgamanaṃ duhitṛgamanaṃ snuṣāgamanam ity atipātakāni // Vi_34.1 //
analyzed: mātṛ gamanam duhitṛ gamanam snuṣā gamanam iti atipātakāni

original: na hy anyā niṣkṛtis teṣāṃ vidyate hi kathaṃcana // Vi_34.2 //
analyzed: na hi anyā niṣkṛtiḥ teṣām vidyate hi kathaṃcana

original: brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ brāhmaṇasuvarṇaharaṇaṃ gurudāragamanam iti mahāpātakāni // Vi_35.1 //
analyzed: brahmahatyā surā pānam brāhmaṇa suvarṇa haraṇam guru dāra gamanam iti mahāpātakāni

original: yaunasrauvamukhyaiḥ saṃbandhais tu sadya eva // Vi_35.5 //
analyzed: yauna srauva mukhyaiḥ saṃbandhaiḥ tu sadyas eva
aśvamedhena śuddhyā eyuḥ mahāpātakinaḥ tu ime
pṛthivyām sarva tīrthānām tathā anusaraṇena ca

original: yāgasthasya kṣatriyasya vaiśyasya ca rajasvalāyāś cāntarvatnyāś cātrigotrāyāś cāvijñātasya garbhasya śaraṇāgatasya ca ghātanaṃ brahmahatyāsamānīti
analyzed: yāga sthasya kṣatriyasya vaiśyasya ca rajasvalāyāḥ ca antarvatnyāḥ ca atri gotrāyāḥ ca a vijñātasya garbhasya śaraṇa āgatasya ca ghātanam brahmahatyā samāni iti

original: kauṭasākṣyaṃ suhṛdvadha ity etau surāpānasamau // Vi_36.2 //
analyzed: kauṭa sākṣyam suhṛd vadhaḥ iti etau surā pāna samau
brāhmaṇasya bhūmi apaharaṇam nikṣepa apaharaṇam suvarṇa steya samam
pitṛvya mātāmaha mātula śvaśura nṛpa patnī abhigamanam guru dāra gamana samam
śrotriya ṛtvij upādhyāya mitra patnī abhigamanam ca

original: svasuḥ sakhyāḥ sagotrāya uttamavarṇāyāḥ kumāryā antyajāyā rajasvalāyāḥ śaraṇāgatāyāḥ *pravrajitāyā nikṣiptāyāś ca [pravrajitāyāḥ ni] // Vi_36.7
analyzed: svasuḥ sakhyāḥ sagotrāya uttama varṇāyāḥ kumāryāḥ antyajāyāḥ rajasvalāyāḥ śaraṇa āgatāyāḥ pravrajitāyāḥ nikṣiptāyāḥ ca pravrajitāyāḥ ni
agni pitṛ mātṛ suta dārāṇām ca
druma gulma vallī latā oṣadhīnām hiṃsā

original: upapātakinas tv ete kuryuś cāndrāyaṇaṃ narāḥ /
analyzed: upapātakinaḥ tu ete kuryuḥ cāndrāyaṇam narāḥ

original: parākaṃ ca tathā kuryur yajeyur gosavena vā // Vi_37.36 //
analyzed: parākam ca tathā kuryuḥ yajeyuḥ gosavena vā
jāti bhraṃśa karam karma kṛtvā anyatamam icchayā

original: caret sāṃtapanaṃ kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyam anicchayā // Vi_38.7 //
analyzed: caret sāṃtapanam kṛcchram prājāpatyam an icchayā

original: kṛcchrātikṛcchram atha vā prāyaścittaṃ tu kārayet // Vi_39.2 //
analyzed: kṛcchrātikṛcchram atha vā prāyaścittam tu kārayet

original: ninditebhyo ghanādānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ kusīdajīvanam asatyabhāṣaṇaṃ śūdrasevanam ity apātrīkaraṇam // Vi_40.1 //
analyzed: ninditebhyaḥ ghana ādānam vāṇijyam kusīda jīvanam asatya bhāṣaṇam śūdra sevanam iti apātrīkaraṇam

original: śītakṛcchreṇa vā bhūyo mahāsāṃtapanena vā // Vi_40.2 //
pakṣiṇāṃ jalacarāṇāṃ jalajānāṃ ca ghātanam // Vi_41.1 //
analyzed: pakṣiṇām jala carāṇām jala jānām ca ghātanam

original: kṛcchrātikṛcchram atha vā prāyaścittaṃ viśodhanam // Vi_41.5 //

analyzed: prakīrṇa pātake jñātvā guru tvam atha lāghavam

original: prāyaścittaṃ budhaḥ kuryād brāhmaṇānumato yathā // Vi_42.2 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam budhaḥ kuryāt brāhmaṇa anumataḥ yathā

original: eteṣv akṛtaprāyaścittā atipātakinaḥ paryāyeṇa kalpaṃ pacyante // Vi_43.23 //
analyzed: eteṣu a kṛta prāyaścittāḥ atipātakinaḥ paryāyeṇa kalpam pacyante
prakīrṇa pātakinaḥ ca bahūn varṣa pūgān

original: yāmyaṃ panthānam āsādya duḥkham aśnanti dāruṇam // Vi_43.32 //
analyzed: yāmyam panthānam āsādya duḥkham aśnanti dāruṇam

original: yamasya puruṣair ghoraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇā yatas tataḥ /
analyzed: yamasya puruṣaiḥ ghoraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇāḥ yatas tatas

original: sakṛcchreṇānukāreṇa nīyamānāś ca te yathā // Vi_43.33 //
analyzed: sa kṛcchreṇa anukāreṇa nīyamānāḥ ca te yathā
śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiḥ kravyādaiḥ kāka kaṅka baka ādibhiḥ

original: agnituṇḍair bhakṣyamāṇā bhujaṅgair vṛścikais tathā // Vi_43.34 //
analyzed: agni tuṇḍaiḥ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ bhujaṅgaiḥ vṛścikaiḥ tathā

original: agninā dahyamānāś ca tudyamānāś ca kaṇṭakaiḥ /
analyzed: agninā dahyamānāḥ ca tudyamānāḥ ca kaṇṭakaiḥ

original: krakacaiḥ pāṭyamānāś ca pīḍyamānāś ca tṛṣṇayā // Vi_43.35 //
analyzed: krakacaiḥ pāṭyamānāḥ ca pīḍyamānāḥ ca tṛṣṇayā

original: kṣudhayā vyathamānāś ca ghorair vyāghragaṇais tathā /
analyzed: kṣudhayā vyathamānāḥ ca ghoraiḥ vyāghra gaṇaiḥ tathā
pūya śoṇita gandhena mūrchamānāḥ pade pade
para anna pānam lipsantaḥ tādyamānāḥ ca kiṃkaraiḥ
kāka kaṅka baka ādīnām bhīmānām sadṛśa ānanaiḥ

original: kvacit tailena kvāthyante tāḍyante musalaiḥ kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid tailena kvāthyante tāḍyante musalaiḥ kvacid

original: āyasīṣu ca vaṭyante śilāsu ca tathā kvacit // Vi_43.38 //
analyzed: āyasīṣu ca śilāsu ca tathā kvacid

original: kvacid vāntam athāśnanti kvacit pūyam asṛk kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid vāntam atha aśnanti kvacid pūyam asṛj kvacid

original: kvacid viṣṭhāṃ kvacin māṃsaṃ pūyagandhi sudāruṇam // Vi_43.39 //
analyzed: kvacid viṣṭhām kvacid māṃsam pūya gandhi su dāruṇam

original: krimibhir bhakṣyamāṇāś ca vahnituṇḍaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ // Vi_43.40 //
analyzed: krimibhiḥ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ ca vahni tuṇḍaiḥ su dāruṇaiḥ
kvacid śītena bādhyante kvacid ca amedhya madhya gāḥ

original: parasparam athāśnanti kvacit pretāḥ sudāruṇāḥ // Vi_43.41 //
analyzed: parasparam atha aśnanti kvacid pretāḥ su dāruṇāḥ

original: kvacid bhūtena tāḍyante lambamānās tathā kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid bhūtena tāḍyante lambamānāḥ tathā kvacid

original: kvacit kṣipyanti bānaughair utkṛtyante tathā kvacit // Vi_43.42 //
analyzed: kvacid kṣipyanti bāna oghaiḥ utkṛtyante tathā kvacid
kaṇṭeṣu datta pādāḥ ca bhujaṅga ābhoga veṣṭitāḥ

original: pīḍyamānās tathā yantraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇāś ca jānubhiḥ // Vi_43.43 //
analyzed: pīḍyamānāḥ tathā yantraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇāḥ ca jānubhiḥ
bhagna pṛṣṭha śiraḥ grīvāḥ sūcī kaṇṭhāḥ su dāruṇāḥ
kūṭāgāra pramāṇaiḥ ca śarīraiḥ yātanā kṣamaiḥ
evam pātakinaḥ pāpam anubhūya su duḥkhitāḥ

original: tiryagyonau prapadyante duḥkhāni vividhāni ca // Vi_43.45 //
atha pāpātmanāṃ narakeṣv anubhūtaduḥkhānāṃ tiryagyonayo bhavanti // Vi_44.1 //
analyzed: atha pāpa ātmanām narakeṣu anubhūta duḥkhānām tiryagyonayaḥ bhavanti
kṛta jāti bhraṃśa karāṇām jalacara yonayaḥ
kṛta a pātrīkaraṇa karmaṇām paśu yonayaḥ
kṛta malinīkaraṇa karmaṇām manuṣyeṣu a spṛśya yonayaḥ

original: prakīrṇakeṣu prakīrṇā hiṃsrāḥ kravyādā bhavanti // Vi_44.10 //
yad vā tad vā paradravyam apahṛtya balān naraḥ /
analyzed: yat vā tat vā para dravyam apahṛtya balāt naraḥ

original: avaśyam yāti tiryaktvaṃ jagdhvā caivāhutaṃ haviḥ // Vi_44.44 //
analyzed: avaśyam yāti tiryaktvam jagdhvā ca eva āhutam haviḥ

original: striyo 'py etena kalpena hṛtvā doṣam avāpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: striyaḥ api etena kalpena hṛtvā doṣam avāpnuyuḥ

original: eteṣām eva jantūnāṃ bhāryātvam upayānti tāḥ // Vi_44.45 //
analyzed: eteṣām eva jantūnām bhāryā tvam upayānti tāḥ

original: narakābhibhūtaduḥkhānāṃ tiryaktvam uttīrṇānāṃ mānuṣyeṣu lakṣaṇāni bhavanti // Vi_45.1 //
analyzed: naraka abhibhūta duḥkhānām tiryaktvam uttīrṇānām mānuṣyeṣu lakṣaṇāni bhavanti
evam karma viśeṣeṇa jāyante lakṣaṇa anvitāḥ
roga anvitāḥ tathā andhāḥ ca kubja khañja eka locanāḥ

original: vāmanā badhirā mūkā durbalāś ca tathāpare /
analyzed: vāmanāḥ badhirāḥ mūkāḥ durbalāḥ ca tathā apare

original: pratyahaṃ ca triṣavaṇaṃ snānam ācaret // Vi_46.3 //
tryahaṃ sāyaṃ tryahaṃ prātas tryaham ayācitam aśnīyāt /
analyzed: tri aham sāyam tri aham prātar tri aham a yācitam aśnīyāt

original: tryaham uṣṇāḥ pibed apas tryaham uṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ tryaham uṣṇaṃ payas tryahaṃ ca nāśnīyād eṣa taptakṛcchraḥ // Vi_46.11 //
analyzed: tri aham uṣṇāḥ pibet apaḥ tri aham uṣṇam ghṛtam tri aham uṣṇam payaḥ tri aham ca na aśnīyāt eṣa taptakṛcchraḥ

original: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakāny ekadivasam aśnīyāt /
analyzed: go mūtram gomayam kṣīram dadhi sarpiḥ kuśa udakāni eka divasam aśnīyāt
go mūtra ādibhiḥ pratyaham abhyastaiḥ mahāsāṃtapanam
piṇyāka ācāma takra udaka saktūnām upavāsa antaritaḥ abhyavahāraḥ tulāpuruṣaḥ
kuśa palāśa udumbara padma śaṅkhapuṣpī vaṭa brāhmī suvarcalā patraiḥ kvathitasya ambhasaḥ pratyekam pānena parṇakṛcchraḥ
kṛcchrāṇi etāni sarvāṇi kurvīta kṛta vāpanaḥ
nityam triṣavaṇa snāyī adhas śāyī jita indriyaḥ
strī śūdra patitānām ca varjayet ca ati bhāṣaṇam

original: pavitrāṇi japen nityaṃ juhuyāc caiva śaktitaḥ // Vi_46.25 //
analyzed: pavitrāṇi japet nityam juhuyāt ca eva śaktitas

original: yasyāmāvāsyā madhye bhavati sa pipīlikāmadhyaḥ // Vi_47.5 //
analyzed: yasya amāvāsyā madhye bhavati sa pipīlikāmadhyaḥ

original: aṣṭau grāsān pratidivasaṃ māsam aśnīyāt sa yaticāndrāyaṇaḥ // Vi_47.7 //
analyzed: aṣṭau grāsān pratidivasam māsam aśnīyāt sa yaticāndrāyaṇaḥ

original: sāyaṃ prātaś caturaś caturaḥ sa śiśucāndrāyaṇaḥ // Vi_47.8 //
analyzed: sāyam prātar caturaḥ caturaḥ sa śiśucāndrāyaṇaḥ

original: yathā kathaṃcit ṣaṣṭyonāṃ triśatīṃ māsenāśnīyāt sa sāmānyacāndrāyaṇaḥ // Vi_47.9 //
analyzed: yathā kathaṃcid ṣaṣṭyā ūnām triśatīm māsena aśnīyāt sa sāmānyacāndrāyaṇaḥ

original: vratam etat purā bhūmi kṛtvā saptarṣayo 'malāḥ /
analyzed: vratam etat purā bhūmi kṛtvā saptarṣayaḥ malāḥ

original: prāptavantaḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ brahmā rudras tathaiva ca // Vi_47.10 //
analyzed: prāptavantaḥ param sthānam brahmā rudraḥ tathā eva ca

original: atha karmabhir ātmakṛtair gurum ātmānaṃ manyetātmārthe prasṛtiyāvakaṃ śrapayet // Vi_48.1 //
analyzed: atha karmabhiḥ ātma kṛtaiḥ gurum ātmānam manyet ātma arthe prasṛti yāvakam śrapayet
a śṛtam śrapyamāṇam śṛtam ca abhimantrayet

original: brahmā devānāṃ padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣir viprāṇāṃ mahiṣo mṛgāṇām /
analyzed: brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣiḥ viprāṇām mahiṣaḥ mṛgāṇām

original: śyeno gṛdhrāṇāṃ svadhitir vanānāṃ somaḥ pavitram atyeti rebhan // Vi_48.6 //
analyzed: śyenaḥ gṛdhrāṇām svadhitiḥ vanānām somaḥ pavitram atyeti rebhan

original: śṛtaṃ ca tam aśnīyāt pātre niṣicya // Vi_48.7 //
analyzed: śṛtam ca tam aśnīyāt pātre niṣicya

original: ye devā manojātā monojuṣaḥ sudakṣā dakṣapitaras te naḥ pāntu te no 'vantu tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhety ātmani juhuyāt // Vi_48.8 //
analyzed: ye devāḥ manaḥ jātāḥ monaḥ juṣaḥ su dakṣāḥ dakṣapitaraḥ te naḥ pāntu te naḥ vantu tebhyaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā iti ātmani juhuyāt

original: snātāḥ pītā bhavata yūyam āpo 'smākam udare yavāḥ,
analyzed: snātāḥ pītāḥ bhavata yūyam āpaḥ smākam udare yavāḥ

original: tā asmabhyam anamīvā ayakṣmā anāgasaḥ santu devīr amṛtāṃ ṛtāvṛdha iti // Vi_48.10 //
analyzed: tāḥ asmabhyam anamīvāḥ ayakṣmāḥ anāgasaḥ santu devīḥ amṛtām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ iti

original: saptarātraṃ pītvā mahāpātakinām anyatamaṃ punāti // Vi_48.13 //
analyzed: sapta rātram pītvā mahāpātakinām anyatamam punāti

original: dvādaśarātreṇa pūrvapuruṣakṛtam api pāpaṃ nirdahati // Vi_48.14 //
analyzed: dvādaśa rātreṇa pūrvapuruṣa kṛtam api pāpam nirdahati
go nihāra muktānām yavānām ekaviṃśati rātram ca
yavaḥ si dhānyarājaḥ si vāruṇaḥ madhu saṃyutaḥ

original: nirṇodaḥ sarvapāpānāṃ pavitram ṛṣibhir dhṛtam // Vi_48.17 //
analyzed: nirṇodaḥ sarva pāpānām pavitram ṛṣibhiḥ dhṛtam

original: ghṛtaṃ yavā madhu yavā āpo vā amṛtaṃ yavāḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtam yavāḥ madhu yavāḥ āpaḥ vai amṛtam yavāḥ

original: sarve punīta me pāpaṃ yan me kiṃcana duṣkṛtam // Vi_48.18 //
analyzed: sarve punīta me pāpam yat me kiṃcana duṣkṛtam
vācā kṛtam karma kṛtam manasā durvicintitam

original: alakṣmīṃ kālakarṇīṃ ca nāśayadhvaṃ yavā mama // Vi_48.19 //
analyzed: alakṣmīm kālakarṇīm ca nāśayadhvam yavāḥ mama
śva sūkara avalīḍham ca ucchiṣṭa upahatam ca yat

original: mātāpitror aśuśrūṣāṃ tat punīdhvaṃ yavā mama // Vi_48.20 //
analyzed: mātā pitroḥ a śuśrūṣām tat punīdhvam yavāḥ mama
gaṇa annam gaṇikā annam ca śūdra annam śrāddha sūtakam

original: caurasyānnaṃ navaśrāddhaṃ punīdhvaṃ ca yavā mama // Vi_48.21 //
analyzed: caurasya annam navaśrāddham punīdhvam ca yavāḥ mama

original: bāladhūrtam adharmaṃ ca rājadvārakṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: bāla dhūrtam adharmam ca rāja dvāra kṛtam ca yat
suvarṇa stainyam avrātyam ayājyasya ca yājanam

original: brāhmaṇānāṃ parīvādaṃ punīdhvaṃ ca yavā mama // Vi_48.22 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām parīvādam punīdhvam ca yavāḥ mama

original: mārgaśīrṣaśuklaikādaśyām upoṣito dvādaśyāṃ bhagavantaṃ śrīvāsudevam arcayet // Vi_49.1 //
analyzed: mārgaśīrṣa śukla ekādaśyām upoṣitaḥ dvādaśyām bhagavantam śrī vāsudevam arcayet
puṣpa dhūpa anulepana dīpa naivedyaiḥ vahni brāhmaṇa tarpaṇaiḥ ca

original: vratam etat saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā pāpebhyaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_49.3 //
analyzed: vratam etat saṃvatsaram kṛtvā pāpebhyaḥ pūtaḥ bhavati

original: yāvaj jīvaṃ kṛtvā śvetadvīpam āpnoti // Vi_49.4 //
ubhayapakṣadvādaśīṣv evaṃ saṃvatsareṇa svargalokam āpnoti // Vi_49.5 //
analyzed: ubhaya pakṣa dvādaśīṣu evam saṃvatsareṇa svarga lokam āpnoti
brahma bhūtam amāvāsyām paurṇamāsyām tathā eva ca

original: yogabhūtaṃ paricaran keśavaṃ mahad āpnuyāt // Vi_49.8 //
analyzed: yoga bhūtam paricaran keśavam mahat āpnuyāt
dṛśyete sahitau yasyām divi candra bṛhaspatī

original: paurṇamāsī tu mahatī proktā saṃvatsare tu sā // Vi_49.9 //
analyzed: paurṇamāsī tu mahatī proktā saṃvatsare tu sā
tasyām dāna upavāsa ādyam akṣayam parikīrtitam

original: tathaiva dvādaśī śuklā yā syāc chravaṇasaṃyutā // Vi_49.10 //
analyzed: tathā eva dvādaśī śuklā yā syāt śravaṇa saṃyutā

original: svakarma cācakṣāṇo grāme grāme bhaikṣyam ācaret // Vi_50.3 //
analyzed: sva karma ca ācakṣāṇaḥ grāme grāme bhaikṣyam ācaret

original: nṛpativadhe mahāvratam eva dviguṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_50.11 //
analyzed: nṛpati vadhe mahā vratam eva dviguṇam kuryāt

original: māsam ekaṃ kṛtavāpano gavām anugamanaṃ kuryāt // Vi_50.16 //
analyzed: māsam ekam kṛta vāpanaḥ gavām anugamanam kuryāt

original: tāsāṃ śītāditrāṇam akṛtvā nātmanaḥ kuryāt // Vi_50.21 //
analyzed: tāsām śīta ādi trāṇam a kṛtvā na ātmanaḥ kuryāt
etat go vratam go vadhe kuryāt

original: gajaṃ hatvā pañca nīlavṛṣabhān dadyāt // Vi_50.25 //
analyzed: gajam hatvā pañca nīla vṛṣabhān dadyāt

original: hatvā mūṣakamārjāranakulamaṇḍūkaḍuṇḍubhājagarāṇām anyatamam upoṣitaḥ kṛsaraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayitvā lohadaṇḍaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt // Vi_50.31 //
analyzed: hatvā mūṣaka mārjāra nakula maṇḍūka ḍuṇḍubha ajagarāṇām anyatamam upoṣitaḥ kṛsaram brāhmaṇam bhojayitvā loha daṇḍam dakṣiṇām dadyāt
godhā ulūka kāka jhaṣa vadhe tri rātram upavaset

original: haṃsabakabalākāmadguvānaraśyenabhāsacakravākānām anyatamaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇāya gāṃ dadyāt // Vi_50.33 //
analyzed: haṃsa baka balākā madgu vānara śyena bhāsa cakravākānām anyatamam hatvā brāhmaṇāya gām dadyāt
kravyāda mṛga vadhe payasvinīm gām dadyāt
an ukta mṛga vadhe tri rātram payasā varteta

original: pūrṇe cānasy anasthnāṃ tu śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret // Vi_50.46 //
analyzed: pūrṇe ca anasi anasthnām tu śūdra hatyā vratam caret

original: kiṃcid eva tu viprāya dadyād asthimatāṃ vadhe /
analyzed: kiṃcid eva tu viprāya dadyāt asthimatām vadhe

original: anashthnāṃ caiva hiṃsāyāṃ prāṇāyāmena śudhyati // Vi_50.47 //
analyzed: anashthnām ca eva hiṃsāyām prāṇāyāmena śudhyati

original: phaladānāṃ tu vṛkṣāṇāṃ chedane japyam ṛkśatam /
analyzed: phala dānām tu vṛkṣāṇām chedane japyam ṛk śatam

original: gulmavallīlatānāṃ ca puṣpitānāṃ ca vīrudhām // Vi_50.48 //
analyzed: gulma vallī latānām ca puṣpitānām ca vīrudhām
annādya jānām sattvānām rasa jānām ca sarvaśas
phala puṣpa udbhavānām ca ghṛta prāśaḥ viśodhanam

original: kṛṣṭajānām oṣadhīnāṃ jātānāṃ ca svayaṃ vane /
analyzed: kṛṣṭa jānām oṣadhīnām jātānām ca svayam vane

original: vṛthālambhe 'nugacched gāṃ dinam ekam payovrataḥ // Vi_50.50 //
analyzed: vṛthā ālambhe nugacchet gām dinam ekam payovrataḥ

original: surāpaḥ sarvakarmavarjitaḥ kaṇān varṣam aśnīyāt // Vi_51.1 //
analyzed: surā paḥ sarva karma varjitaḥ kaṇān varṣam aśnīyāt

original: malānāṃ madyānāṃ cānyatamasya prāśane cāndrāyaṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_51.2 //
analyzed: malānām madyānām ca anyatamasya prāśane cāndrāyaṇam kuryāt
laśuna palāṇḍu gṛñjana etad gandhi viḍvarāha grāma kukkuṭa vānara go māṃsa bhakṣaṇe ca

original: sarveṣv eteṣu dvijānāṃ prāyaścittānte bhūyaḥ saṃskāraṃ kuryāt // Vi_51.4 //
analyzed: sarveṣu eteṣu dvijānām prāyaścitta ante bhūyaḥ saṃskāram kuryāt
vapana mekhalā daṇḍa bhaikṣya caryā vratāni punaḥsaṃskāra karmaṇi varjanīyāni
śaśaka śalyaka godhā khaḍga kūrma varjam pañcanakha māṃsa aśane sapta rātram upavaset

original: gaṇagaṇikāstenagāyanānnāni bhuktvā saptarātraṃ payasā varteta // Vi_51.7 //
analyzed: gaṇa gaṇikā stena gāyana annāni bhuktvā sapta rātram payasā varteta
vārdhuṣika kadarya dīkṣita baddha nigaḍa abhiśasta ṣaṇḍhānām ca
puṃścalī dāmbhika cikitsaka lubdhaka krūra ugra ucchiṣṭa bhojinām ca
a vīra strī suvarṇakāra sapatna patitānām ca
piśuna anṛta vādi kṣata dharma ātma rasa vikrayiṇām ca
karmakāra niṣāda raṅga avatāri vaiṇa śastra vikrayiṇām ca
śva jīvi śauṇḍika tailika caila nirṇejakānām ca

original: bhrūṇaghnāvekṣitam udakyāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ patatriṇāvalīḍhaṃ śunā saṃspṛṣṭaṃ gavāghrātaṃ ca // Vi_51.17 //
analyzed: bhrūṇa ghna avekṣitam udakyā saṃspṛṣṭam patatriṇā avalīḍham śunā saṃspṛṣṭam gavā āghrātam ca
pāṭhīna rohita rājīva siṃhatuṇḍa śakula varjam sarva matsya māṃsa aśane tri rātram upavaset
sarva jala ja māṃsa aśane ca

original: āpaḥ surābhāṇḍasthāḥ pītvā saptarātraṃ śaṅkhapuṣpīśṛtaṃ payaḥ pibet // Vi_51.23 //
analyzed: āpaḥ surā bhāṇḍa sthāḥ pītvā sapta rātram śaṅkhapuṣpī śṛtam payaḥ pibet
madya bhāṇḍa sthāḥ ca pañca rātram

original: somapaḥ surāpasyāghrāya gandham udakamagnas trir aghamarṣaṇaṃ japtvā ghṛtaprāśanam ācaret // Vi_51.25 //
analyzed: soma paḥ surā pasya āghrāya gandham udaka magnaḥ tris aghamarṣaṇam japtvā ghṛtaprāśanam ācaret
khara uṣṭra kāka māṃsa aśane cāndrāyaṇam kuryāt
prāśya a jñātam sūnā stham śuṣka māṃsam ca
kravyāda mṛga pakṣi māṃsa aśane taptakṛcchram
kalaviṅka plava cakravāka haṃsa rajju dāla sārasa dātyūha śuka sārikā baka balākā kokila khañjarīṭa aśane tri rātram upavaset
tittiri kapiñjala lāvaka vartikā mayūra varjam sarva pakṣi māṃsa aśane ca ahar rātram

original: kīṭāśane dinam ekaṃ brahmasuvarcalāṃ pibet // Vi_51.32 //
analyzed: kīṭa aśane dinam ekam brahmasuvarcalām pibet

original: yavagodhūmapayovikāraṃ snehāktaṃ śuktaṃ khāṇḍavaṃ ca varjayitvā yat paryuṣitaṃ tat prāśyopavaset // Vi_51.35 //
analyzed: yava godhūma payaḥ vikāram sneha aktam śuktam khāṇḍavam ca varjayitvā yat paryuṣitam tat prāśya upavaset
vraścana amedhya prabhavān lohitān ca vṛkṣa niryāsān
śālūka vṛthā kṛsara saṃyāva pāyasa apūpa śaṣkulī devānnāni havīṃṣi ca
go ajā mahiṣī varjam sarva payāṃsi ca
brahmacarya āśramī śrāddha bhojane tri rātram upavaset
biḍāla kāka nakula ākhu ucchiṣṭa bhakṣaṇe brahmasuvarcalām pibet

original: śvocchiṣṭāśane dinam ekam upoṣitaḥ pañcagavyaṃ pibet // Vi_51.47 //
analyzed: śva ucchiṣṭa aśane dinam ekam upoṣitaḥ pañcagavyam pibet
pañcanakha viṣ mūtra aśane sapta rātram
āmaśrāddha aśane tri rātram payasā varteta
brāhmaṇaḥ śūdra ucchiṣṭa aśane sapta rātram
brāhmaṇa ucchiṣṭa aśane tu eka aham
rājanyaḥ śūdra ucchiṣṭa āśī pañca rātram
caṇḍāla annam bhuktvā tri rātram upavaset

original: asaṃskṛtān paśūn mantrair nādyād vipraḥ kathaṃcana /
analyzed: a saṃskṛtān paśūn mantraiḥ na adyāt vipraḥ kathaṃcana

original: mantrais tu saṃskṛtān adyāc chāśvataṃ vidhim āsthitaḥ // Vi_51.59 //
analyzed: mantraiḥ tu saṃskṛtān adyāt śāśvatam vidhim āsthitaḥ
yāvanti paśu romāṇi tāvat kṛtvā iha māraṇam

original: vṛthā paśughnaḥ prāpnoti pretya ceha ca niṣkṛtim // Vi_51.60 //
analyzed: vṛthā paśu ghnaḥ prāpnoti pretya ca iha ca niṣkṛtim

original: yajñārthaṃ paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā /
analyzed: yajña artham paśavaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā

original: yajño hi bhūtyai sarvasya tasmād yajñe vadho 'vadhaḥ // Vi_51.61 //
analyzed: yajñaḥ hi bhūtyai sarvasya tasmāt yajñe vadhaḥ vadhaḥ

original: na tādṛśaṃ bhavaty eno mṛgahantur dhanārthinaḥ /
analyzed: na tādṛśam bhavati enaḥ mṛga hantuḥ dhana arthinaḥ

original: yādṛśaṃ bhavati pretya vṛthā māṃsāni khādataḥ // Vi_51.62 //
analyzed: yādṛśam bhavati pretya vṛthā māṃsāni khādataḥ

original: oṣadhyaḥ paśavo vṛkṣās tiryañcaḥ pakṣiṇas tathā /
analyzed: oṣadhyaḥ paśavaḥ vṛkṣāḥ tiryañcaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ tathā

original: yajñārthaṃ nidhanam prāptāḥ prāpnuvanty ucchritīḥ punaḥ // Vi_51.63 //
analyzed: yajña artham nidhanam prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti ucchritīḥ punar
madhuparke ca yajñe ca pitṛ daivata karmaṇi

original: atraiva paśavo hiṃsyā nānyatreti kathaṃcana // Vi_51.64 //
analyzed: atra eva paśavaḥ hiṃsyāḥ na anyatra iti kathaṃcana
yajña artheṣu paśūn hiṃsan veda tattva artha vid dvijaḥ

original: ātmānaṃ ca paśūṃś caiva gamayaty uttamāṃ gatim // Vi_51.65 //
analyzed: ātmānam ca paśūn ca eva gamayati uttamām gatim

original: gṛhe gurāv araṇye vā nivasann ātmavān dvijaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhe gurau araṇye vā nivasan ātmavān dvijaḥ

original: nāvedavihitāṃ hiṃsām āpady api samācaret // Vi_51.66 //
analyzed: na a veda vihitām hiṃsām āpadi api samācaret
yā veda vihitā hiṃsā niyatā asmin carācare

original: ahiṃsām eva tāṃ vidyād vedād dharmo hi nirbabhau // Vi_51.67 //
analyzed: ahiṃsām eva tām vidyāt vedāt dharmaḥ hi nirbabhau
yaḥ hiṃsakāni bhūtāni hinasti ātma sukha icchayā

original: sa jīvaṃś ca mṛtaś caiva na kvacit sukham edhate // Vi_51.68 //
analyzed: sa jīvan ca mṛtaḥ ca eva na kvacid sukham edhate
yaḥ bandhana vadha kleśān prāṇinām na cikīrṣati

original: sa sarvasya hitaprepsuḥ sukham atyantam aśnute // Vi_51.69 //
analyzed: sa sarvasya hita prepsuḥ sukham atyantam aśnute

original: yad dhyāyati yat kurute ratiṃ badhnāti yatra ca /
analyzed: yat dhyāyati yat kurute ratim badhnāti yatra ca

original: tad evāpnoty ayatnena yo hinasti na kiṃcana // Vi_51.70 //
analyzed: tat eva āpnoti ayatnena yaḥ hinasti na kiṃcana

original: nākṛtvā prāṇināṃ hiṃsāṃ māṃsam utpadyate kvacit /
analyzed: na a kṛtvā prāṇinām hiṃsām māṃsam utpadyate kvacid

original: na ca prāṇivadhaḥ svargyas tasmān māṃsaṃ vivarjayet // Vi_51.71 //
analyzed: na ca prāṇi vadhaḥ svargyaḥ tasmāt māṃsam vivarjayet

original: samutpattiṃ ca māṃsasya vadhabandhau ca dehinām /
analyzed: samutpattim ca māṃsasya vadha bandhau ca dehinām

original: na bhakṣayati yo māṃsaṃ vidhiṃ hitvā piśācavat /
analyzed: na bhakṣayati yaḥ māṃsam vidhim hitvā piśāca vat

original: sa loke priyatāṃ yāti vyādhibhiś ca na pīḍyate // Vi_51.73 //
analyzed: sa loke priya tām yāti vyādhibhiḥ ca na pīḍyate

original: saṃskartā copahartā ca khādakaś ceti ghātakāḥ // Vi_51.74 //
analyzed: saṃskartā ca upahartā ca khādakaḥ ca iti ghātakāḥ
sva māṃsam para māṃsena yaḥ vardhayitum icchati

original: anabhyarcya pitṝn devān na tato 'nyo 'sty apuṇyakṛt // Vi_51.75 //
analyzed: an abhyarcya pitṝn devān na tatas sti apuṇya kṛt

original: varṣe varṣe 'śvamedhena yo yajeta śataṃ samāḥ /
analyzed: varṣe varṣe śvamedhena yaḥ yajeta śatam samāḥ

original: māṃsāni ca na khāded yas tayoḥ puṇyaphalaṃ samam // Vi_51.76 //
analyzed: māṃsāni ca na khādet yaḥ tayoḥ puṇya phalam samam
phala mūla aśanaiḥ divyaiḥ muni annānām ca bhojanaiḥ

original: na tat phalam avāpnoti yan māṃsaparivarjanāt // Vi_51.77 //
analyzed: na tat phalam avāpnoti yat māṃsa parivarjanāt

original: māṃ sa bhakṣayitāmutra yasya māṃsam ihādmy aham /
analyzed: mām sa bhakṣayitā amutra yasya māṃsam iha admi aham

original: etan māṃsasya māṃsatvaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ // Vi_51.78 //
analyzed: etat māṃsasya māṃsa tvam pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: suvarṇasteyakṛd rājñe karmācakṣāṇo musalam arpayet // Vi_52.1 //
analyzed: suvarṇa steya kṛt rājñe karma ācakṣāṇaḥ musalam arpayet

original: vadhāt tyāgād vā prayato bhavati // Vi_52.2 //

analyzed: dhānya dhana apahārī ca kṛcchram abdam
manuṣya strī kūpa kṣetra vāpīnām apahāre cāndrāyaṇam
bhakṣya bhojya yāna śayyā āsana puṣpa mūla phalānām pañcagavya pānam
tṛṇa kāṣṭha druma śuṣka anna guḍa vastra carma āmiṣāṇām tri rātram upavaset
maṇi muktā pravāla tāmra rajata ayaḥ kāṃsyānām dvādaśa aham kaṇān aśnīyāt
kārpāsa kīṭaja ūrṇā ādi apaharaṇe tri rātram payasā varteta
dviśapha ekaśapha apaharaṇe dvi rātram upavaset
pakṣi gandha oṣadhi rajju vaidalānām apaharaṇe dinam upavaset
dattvā eva apahṛtam dravyam dhanikasya api upāyataḥ

original: yad yat parebhyas tv ādadyāt puruṣas tu niraṅkuśaḥ /
analyzed: yat yat parebhyaḥ tu ādadyāt puruṣaḥ tu niraṅkuśaḥ

original: tena tena vihīnaḥ syād yatra yatrābhijāyate // Vi_52.15 //
analyzed: tena tena vihīnaḥ syāt yatra yatra abhijāyate

original: jīvitaṃ dharmakāmau ca dhane yasmāt pratiṣṭhitau /
analyzed: jīvitam dharma kāmau ca dhane yasmāt pratiṣṭhitau
tasmāt sarva prayatnena dhana hiṃsām vivarjayet
prāṇi hiṃsā paraḥ yaḥ tu dhana hiṃsā paraḥ tathā

original: mahad duḥkham avāpnoti dhanahiṃsāparas tayoḥ // Vi_52.17 //
analyzed: mahat duḥkham avāpnoti dhana hiṃsā paraḥ tayoḥ

original: athāgamyāgamane mahāvratavidhānenābdaṃ cīravāsā vane prājāpatyaṃ kuryāt // Vi_53.1 //
analyzed: atha agamyā gamane mahāvrata vidhānena abdam cīra vāsāḥ vane prājāpatyam kuryāt

original: puṃsy ayonāv ākāśe 'psu divā goyāne ca savāsāḥ snānam ācaret // Vi_53.4 //
analyzed: puṃsi ayonau ākāśe psu divā goyāne ca sa vāsāḥ snānam ācaret

original: sakṛd duṣṭā ca strī yat puruṣasya paradāre tadvrataṃ kuryāt // Vi_53.8 //
analyzed: sakṛt duṣṭā ca strī yat puruṣasya para dāre tad vratam kuryāt
yat karoti eka rātreṇa vṛṣalī sevanāt dvijaḥ

original: tad bhaikṣyabhug japan nityaṃ tribhir varṣair vyapohati // Vi_53.9 //
analyzed: tat bhaikṣya bhuj japan nityam tribhiḥ varṣaiḥ vyapohati

original: yaḥ pāpātmā yena saha saṃyujyate sa tasyaiva prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt // Vi_54.1 //
analyzed: yaḥ pāpa ātmā yena saha saṃyujyate sa tasya eva prāyaścittam kuryāt

original: mṛtapañcanakhāt kūpād atyantopahatāc codakaṃ pītvā brāhamaṇas trirātram upavaset // Vi_54.2 //
analyzed: mṛta pañcanakhāt kūpāt atyanta upahatāt ca udakam pītvā brāhamaṇaḥ tri rātram upavaset

original: sarve cānte vratasya pañcagavyaṃ pibeyuḥ // Vi_54.6 //
analyzed: sarve ca ante vratasya pañcagavyam pibeyuḥ

original: pañcagavyaṃ pibec chūdro brāhmaṇas tu surāṃ pibet /
analyzed: pañcagavyam pibet śūdraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tu surām pibet

original: ubhau tau narakaṃ yāto mahārauravasaṃjñitam // Vi_54.7 //
analyzed: ubhau tau narakam yātaḥ mahāraurava saṃjñitam

original: parvānārogyavarjam ṛtāv avagacchan patnīṃ trirātram upavaset // Vi_54.8 //
analyzed: parva anārogya varjam ṛtau avagacchan patnīm tri rātram upavaset

original: anudakamūtrapurīṣakaraṇe sacailaṃ snānaṃ mahāvyāhṛtihomaś ca // Vi_54.10 //
analyzed: anudaka mūtra purīṣa karaṇe sa cailam snānam mahāvyāhṛti homaḥ ca
sūryābhyudita nirmuktaḥ sa caila snātaḥ sāvitrī aṣṭaśatam āvartayet

original: śvasṛgālaviḍvarāhakharavānaravāyasapuṃścalībhir daṣṭaḥ sravantīm āsādya ṣoḍaśa prāṇāyāmān kuryāt // Vi_54.12 //
analyzed: śva sṛgāla viḍvarāha khara vānara vāyasa puṃścalībhiḥ daṣṭaḥ sravantīm āsādya ṣoḍaśa prāṇāyāmān kuryāt

original: vedāgnyutsādī triṣavaṇasnāyy adhaḥśāyī saṃvatsaraṃ sakṛdbhaikṣyeṇa varteta // Vi_54.13 //
analyzed: veda agni utsādī triṣavaṇa snāyī adhas śāyī saṃvatsaram sakṛt bhaikṣyeṇa varteta

original: samutkarṣānṛte guroś cālīkanirbandhe tadākṣepaṇe ca māsaṃ payasā varteta // Vi_54.14 //
analyzed: samutkarṣa anṛte guroḥ ca alīka nirbandhe tad ākṣepaṇe ca māsam payasā varteta

original: nāstiko nāstikavṛttiḥ kṛtaghnaḥ kūṭavyavahārī brāhmaṇavṛttighnaś caite saṃvatsaraṃ bhaikṣyeṇa varteran // Vi_54.15 //
analyzed: nāstikaḥ nāstika vṛttiḥ kṛtaghnaḥ kūṭa vyavahārī brāhmaṇa vṛtti ghnaḥ ca ete saṃvatsaram bhaikṣyeṇa varteran

original: parivittiḥ parivettā ca yayā ca parividyate dātā yājakaś ca cāndrāyaṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_54.16 //
analyzed: parivittiḥ parivettā ca yayā ca parividyate dātā yājakaḥ ca cāndrāyaṇam kuryāt
prāṇi bhū puṇya soma vikrayī taptakṛcchram
ārdra auṣadhi gandha puṣpa phala mūla carma vetra vidala tuṣa kapāla keśa bhasma asthi gorasa piṇyāka tila taila vikrayī prājāpatyam
ślaiṣma jatu madhūcchiṣṭa śaṅkha śukti trapu sīsa kṛṣṇaloha audumbara khaḍga pātra vikrayī cāndrāyaṇam kuryāt
rakta vastra raṅga ratna gandha guḍa madhu rasa ūrṇā vikrayī tri rātram upavaset
māṃsa lavaṇa lākṣā kṣīra vikrayī cāndrāyaṇam kuryāt

original: uṣṭreṇa khareṇa vā gatvā nagnaḥ snātvā suptvā bhuktvā prāṇāyāmatrayam kuryāt // Vi_54.23 //
analyzed: uṣṭreṇa khareṇa vā gatvā nagnaḥ snātvā suptvā bhuktvā prāṇāyāma trayam kuryāt

original: māsaṃ goṣṭhe payaḥ pītvā mucyate 'satpratigrahāt // Vi_54.24 //
analyzed: māsam goṣṭhe payaḥ pītvā mucyate sat pratigrahāt
a yājya yājanam kṛtvā pareṣām antyakarma ca

original: abhicāram ahīnaṃ ca tribhiḥ kṛcchrair vyapohati // Vi_54.25 //
analyzed: abhicāram ahīnam ca tribhiḥ kṛcchraiḥ vyapohati
yeṣām dvijānām sāvitrī na anūcyeta yathāvidhi

original: tāṃś cārayitvā trīn kṛcchrān yathāvidhy upanāyayet // Vi_54.26 //
analyzed: tān cārayitvā trīn kṛcchrān yathāvidhi upanāyayet

original: prāyaścittaṃ cikīrṣanti vikarmasthās tu ye dvijāḥ /
analyzed: prāyaścittam cikīrṣanti vikarma sthāḥ tu ye dvijāḥ

original: brāhmaṇyāc ca parityaktās teṣām apy etad ādiśet // Vi_54.27 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇyāt ca parityaktāḥ teṣām api etat ādiśet
yat garhitena arjayanti karmaṇā brāhmaṇāḥ dhanam

original: tasyotsargeṇa śudhyanti japyena tapasā tathā // Vi_54.28 //
analyzed: tasya utsargeṇa śudhyanti japyena tapasā tathā
snātaka vrata lope ca prāyaścittam abhojanam
enasvibhiḥ nirṇiktaiḥ na artham kiṃcid samācaret

original: kṛtanirṇejanāṃś caitān na jugupseta dharmavit // Vi_54.31 //
analyzed: kṛta nirṇejanān ca etān na jugupseta dharma vid

original: bālaghnāṃś ca kṛtaghnāṃś ca viśuddhān api dharmataḥ /
analyzed: bāla ghnān ca kṛtaghnān ca viśuddhān api dharmataḥ

original: śaraṇāgatahantṝṃś ca strīhantṝṃś ca na saṃvaset // Vi_54.32 //
analyzed: śaraṇa āgata hantṝn ca strī hantṝn ca na saṃvaset

original: aśītir yasya varṣāṇi bālo vāpy ūnaṣoḍaśaḥ /
analyzed: aśītiḥ yasya varṣāṇi bālaḥ vā api ūna ṣoḍaśaḥ

original: prāyaścittārdham arhanti striyo rogiṇa eva ca // Vi_54.33 //
analyzed: prāyaścitta ardham arhanti striyaḥ rogiṇaḥ eva ca
an ukta niṣkṛtīnām tu pāpānām apanuttaye

original: śaktiṃ cāvekṣya pāpaṃ ca prāyaścittaṃ prakalpyet // Vi_54.34 //
analyzed: śaktim ca avekṣya pāpam ca prāyaścittam prakalpyet

original: sravantīm āsādya snātaḥ pratyahaṃ ṣoḍaśa prāṇāyāmān salakṣaṇān kṛtvaikakālaṃ haviṣyāśī māsena brahmahā pūto bhavati // Vi_55.2 //
analyzed: sravantīm āsādya snātaḥ pratyaham ṣoḍaśa prāṇāyāmān sa lakṣaṇān kṛtvā ekakālam haviṣya āśī māsena brahma hā pūtaḥ bhavati

original: vratenāghamarṣaṇena ca surāpaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_55.4 //
analyzed: vratena aghamarṣaṇena ca surā paḥ pūtaḥ bhavati
gāyatrī daśa sāhasra japena suvarṇa steya kṛt
tri rātra upoṣitaḥ puruṣasūkta japa homābhyām guru talpa gaḥ
yathā aśvamedhaḥ kratu rāj sarva pāpa apanodakaḥ
tathā aghamarṣaṇam sūktam sarva pāpa apanodakam
prāṇāyāmam dvijaḥ kuryāt sarva pāpa apanuttaye

original: dahyante sarvapāpāni prāṇāyāmair dvijasya tu // Vi_55.8 //
analyzed: dahyante sarva pāpāni prāṇāyāmaiḥ dvijasya tu
sa vyāhṛtim sa praṇavām gāyatrīm śirasā saha

original: triḥ paṭhed āyataprāṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa ucyate // Vi_55.9 //
analyzed: tris paṭhet āyata prāṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: akāraṃ cāpy ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: akāram ca api ukāram ca makāram ca prajāpatiḥ

original: vedatrayān niraduhad bhūr bhuvaḥ svar itīti ca // Vi_55.10 //
analyzed: veda trayāt niraduhat bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti iti ca

original: tribhya eva tu vedebhyaḥ pādaṃ pādam adūduhat /
analyzed: tribhyaḥ eva tu vedebhyaḥ pādam pādam adūduhat

original: tad ity ṛco 'syāḥ sāvitryāḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ // Vi_55.11 //
analyzed: tat iti ṛcaḥ syāḥ sāvitryāḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ

original: etad akṣaram etāṃ ca japan vyāhṛtipūrvikām /
analyzed: etat akṣaram etām ca japan vyāhṛti pūrvikām

original: saṃdhyayor vedavid vipro vedapuṇyena yujyate // Vi_55.12 //
analyzed: saṃdhyayoḥ veda vid vipraḥ veda puṇyena yujyate

original: sahasrakṛtvas tv abhyasya bahir etat trikaṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: sahasra kṛtvas tu abhyasya bahis etat trikam dvijaḥ

original: mahato 'py enaso māsāt tvacevāhir vimucyate // Vi_55.13 //
analyzed: mahataḥ pi enasaḥ māsāt tvacā iva ahiḥ vimucyate
etad traya visaṃyuktaḥ kāle ca kriyayā svayā
vipra kṣatriya viś jātiḥ garhaṇām yāti sādhuṣu

original: tripadā caiva gāyatrī vijñeyā brāhmaṇo mukham // Vi_55.15 //
analyzed: tripadā ca eva gāyatrī vijñeyā brāhmaṇaḥ mukham

original: yo 'dhīte 'hany ahany etāṃ trīṇi varṣāṇy atandritaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ dhīte hani ahani etām trīṇi varṣāṇi atandritaḥ

original: sa brahma param abhyeti vāyubhūtaḥ khamūrtimān // Vi_55.16 //
analyzed: sa brahma param abhyeti vāyu bhūtaḥ kha mūrtimān

original: ekākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma prāṇāyāmāḥ paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: ekākṣaram param brahma prāṇāyāmāḥ param tapaḥ

original: sāvitryās tu paraṃ nānyan maunāt satyaṃ viśiṣyate // Vi_55.17 //
analyzed: sāvitryāḥ tu param na anyat maunāt satyam viśiṣyate
kṣaranti sarvāḥ vaidikyaḥ juhoti yajati kriyāḥ

original: akṣaraṃ tv akṣaraṃ jñeyaṃ brahmā caiva prajāpatiḥ // Vi_55.18 //
analyzed: akṣaram tu akṣaram jñeyam brahmā ca eva prajāpatiḥ

original: upāṃśuḥ syāc chataguṇaḥ sahasro mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ // Vi_55.19 //
analyzed: upāṃśuḥ syāt śataguṇaḥ sahasraḥ mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ
ye pākayajñāḥ catvāraḥ vidhi yajña samanvitāḥ

original: te sarve japayajñasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Vi_55.20 //
analyzed: te sarve japa yajñasya kalām na arhanti ṣoḍaśīm

original: japyenaiva tu saṃsidhyed brāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: japyena eva tu saṃsidhyet brāhmaṇaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate // Vi_55.21 //
analyzed: kuryāt anyat na vā kuryāt maitraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ ucyate
atha atha sarva veda pavitrāṇi bhavanti

original: yeṣāṃ japyaiś ca homaiś ca dvijātayaḥ pāpebhyaḥ pūyante // Vi_56.2 //
analyzed: yeṣām japyaiḥ ca homaiḥ ca dvijātayaḥ pāpebhyaḥ pūyante

original: trīṇy ājyadohāni rathantaraṃ ca agnivrataṃ vāmadevyaṃ bṛhac ca /
analyzed: trīṇi ājyadohāni rathantaram ca agnivratam vāmadevyam bṛhat ca

original: etāni gītāni punāti jantūn jātismaratvaṃ labhate yadīcchet // Vi_56.27 //
analyzed: etāni gītāni punāti jantūn jātismara tvam labhate yadi icchet
tri puruṣam mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ ca aśuddhāḥ
sarve eva a bhojyāḥ ca a pratigrāhyāḥ
a pratigrāhyebhyaḥ ca pratigraha prasaṅgam varjayet

original: pratigraheṇa brāhmaṇānāṃ brāhmaṃ tejaḥ praṇaśyati // Vi_57.7 //
dravyāṇāṃ vāvijñāya pratigrahavidhiṃ yaḥ pratigrahaṃ kuryāt sa dātrā saha nimajjati // Vi_57.8 //
analyzed: dravyāṇām vā a vijñāya pratigraha vidhim yaḥ pratigraham kuryāt sa dātrā saha nimajjati

original: pratigrahasamarthaś ca yaḥ pratigrahaṃ varjayet sa dātṛlokam avāpnoti // Vi_57.9 //
analyzed: pratigraha samarthaḥ ca yaḥ pratigraham varjayet sa dātṛ lokam avāpnoti
edha udaka mūla phala abhaya āmiṣa madhu śayyā āsana gṛha puṣpa dadhi śākan ca abhyudyatān na nirṇudet

original: grāhyāṃ prajāpatir mene api duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ // Vi_57.11 //
analyzed: grāhyām prajāpatiḥ mene api duṣkṛta karmaṇaḥ

original: nāśnanti pitaras tasya daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca /
analyzed: na aśnanti pitaraḥ tasya daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca

original: na ca havyaṃ vahaty agnir yas tām abhyavamanyate // Vi_57.12 //
analyzed: na ca havyam vahati agniḥ yaḥ tām abhyavamanyate
gurūn bhṛtyān ujjihīrṣuḥ arciṣyan pitṛ devatāḥ

original: sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyān na tu tṛpyet svayaṃ tataḥ // Vi_57.13 //
analyzed: sarvatas pratigṛhṇīyāt na tu tṛpyet svayam tatas

original: eteṣv api ca kāryeṣu samarthas tatpratigrahe /
analyzed: eteṣu api ca kāryeṣu samarthaḥ tad pratigrahe

original: nādadyāt kulaṭāṣaṇḍha- patitebhyas tathā dviṣaḥ // Vi_57.14 //
analyzed: na ādadyāt kulaṭā ṣaṇḍha patitebhyaḥ tathā dviṣaḥ

original: guruṣu tv abhyatīteṣu vinā vā tair gṛhe vasan /
analyzed: guruṣu tu abhyatīteṣu vinā vā taiḥ gṛhe vasan

original: ātmano vṛttim anvicchan gṛhṇīyāt sādhutaḥ sadā // Vi_57.15 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vṛttim anvicchan gṛhṇīyāt sādhutaḥ sadā
ardhikaḥ kula mitram ca dāsa gopāla nāpitāḥ

original: ete śūdreṣu bhojyānnā yaś cātmānaṃ nivedayet // Vi_57.16 //
analyzed: ete śūdreṣu bhojya annāḥ yaḥ ca ātmānam nivedayet

original: śuklenārthena yad+aurdhvadehikaṃ karoti tenāsya devatvam āsādayati // Vi_58.3 //
analyzed: śuklena arthena yat aurdhvadehikam karoti tena asya deva tvam āsādayati
eka antarita vṛtti upāttam ca kṛṣṇam

original: kramāgataṃ prītidāyaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
analyzed: krama āgatam prīti dāyam prāptam ca saha bhāryayā

original: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ dhanaṃ śuklam udāhṛtam // Vi_58.9 //
kṛtopakārād āptaṃ ca śabalaṃ samudāhṛtam // Vi_58.10 //
analyzed: kṛta upakārāt āptam ca śabalam samudāhṛtam
pārśvika dyūta caurya āpta pratirūpaka sāhasaiḥ

original: vyājenopārjitaṃ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // Vi_58.11 //
analyzed: vyājena upārjitam yat ca tat kṛṣṇam samudāhṛtam

original: yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yat kiṃcit kurute naraḥ /
analyzed: yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yat kiṃcid kurute naraḥ

original: tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca // Vi_58.12 //
analyzed: tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalam pretya ca iha ca
gṛha āśramī vaivāhika agnau pākayajñān kuryāt
candra arka saṃnikarṣa viprakarṣayoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta

original: yajñārthaṃ bhikṣitam avāptam arthaṃ sakalam eva vitaret // Vi_59.11 //
analyzed: yajña artham bhikṣitam avāptam artham sakalam eva vitaret
arcita bhikṣā dānena go dāna phalam āpnoti
bhikṣu abhāve grāsa mātram gavām dadyāt

original: bhukte 'py anne vidyamāne na bhikṣukaṃ pratyācakṣīta // Vi_59.17 //
analyzed: bhukte pi anne vidyamāne na bhikṣukam pratyācakṣīta

original: kaṇḍanī peṣaṇī cullī udakumbha upaskara iti pañca sūnā gṛhasthasya // Vi_59.18 //
analyzed: kaṇḍanī peṣaṇī cullī uda kumbha upaskaraḥ iti pañca sūnāḥ gṛhasthasya
tad niṣkṛti artham ca brahma deva bhūta pitṛ nara yajñān kuryāt
devatā atithi bhṛtyānām pitṝṇām ātmanaḥ ca yaḥ

original: na nirvapati pañcānām ucchvasan na sa jīvati // Vi_59.25 //
analyzed: na nirvapati pañcānām ucchvasan na sa jīvati

original: brahmacārī yatir bhikṣur jīvanty ete gṛhāśramāt /
analyzed: brahmacārī yatiḥ bhikṣuḥ jīvanti ete gṛha āśramāt

original: tasmād abhyāgatān etān gṛhastho nāvamānayet // Vi_59.26 //
analyzed: tasmāt abhyāgatān etān gṛhasthaḥ na avamānayet

original: gṛhastha eva yajate gṛhasthas tapyate tapaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhasthaḥ eva yajate gṛhasthaḥ tapyate tapaḥ

original: pradadāti gṛhasthaś ca tasmāc chreṣṭho gṛhāśramī // Vi_59.27 //
analyzed: pradadāti gṛhasthaḥ ca tasmāt śreṣṭhaḥ gṛhāśramī

original: ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā bhūtāny atithayas tathā /
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ bhūtāni atithayaḥ tathā

original: āśāsate kuḍumbibhyas tasmāc chreṣṭho gṛhāśramī // Vi_59.28 //

analyzed: trivarga sevām satata anna dānam sura arcanam brāhmaṇa pūjanam ca

original: svādhyāyasevāṃ pitṛtarpaṇaṃ ca kṛtvā gṛhī śakrapadaṃ prayāti // Vi_59.29 //
analyzed: svādhyāya sevām pitṛ tarpaṇam ca kṛtvā gṛhī śakra padam prayāti

original: brāhme muhūrte utthāya mūtrapurīṣotsargaṃ kuryāt // Vi_60.1 //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte utthāya mūtra purīṣa utsargam kuryāt

original: dakṣiṇābhimukho rātrau divā codaṅmukhaḥ saṃdhyayoś ca // Vi_60.2 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ rātrau divā ca udak mukhaḥ saṃdhyayoḥ ca
na prati anila anala indu arka strī guru brāhmaṇānām

original: loṣṭeṣṭakāparimṛṣṭagudo gṛhītaśiśnaś cotthāyādbhir mṛdbhiś coddhṛtābhir gandhalepakṣayakaraṃ śaucaṃ kuryāt // Vi_60.24 //
analyzed: loṣṭa iṣṭakā parimṛṣṭa gudaḥ gṛhīta śiśnaḥ ca utthāya adbhiḥ mṛdbhiḥ ca uddhṛtābhiḥ gandha lepa kṣaya karam śaucam kuryāt

original: ekā liṅge gude tisras tathaikatra kare daśa /
analyzed: ekā liṅge gude tisraḥ tathā ekatra kare daśa

original: ubhayoḥ sapta dātavyā mṛdas tisras tu pādayoḥ // Vi_60.25 //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ sapta dātavyāḥ mṛdaḥ tisraḥ tu pādayoḥ

original: triguṇaṃ tu vanasthānāṃ yatīnāṃ tu caturguṇam // Vi_60.26 //
analyzed: triguṇam tu vanasthānām yatīnām tu caturguṇam
na eva śleṣmātaka ariṣṭa vibhītaka dhava dhanvana jam
na ca bandhūka nirguṇḍī śigru tilva tinduka jam
na ca kovidāra śamī pīlu pippala iṅguda guggulu jam
na pāribhadraka amlikā mocaka śālmalī śaṇa jam
adyāt ca udak mukhaḥ prāc mukhaḥ vā
vaṭa asana arka khadira karañja badara sarja nimba arimeda apāmārga mālatī kakubha bilvānām anyatamam
kanīnī agra sama sthaulyam sa kūrcam dvādaśa aṅgulam

original: prātarbhūtvā ca yatavāg bhakṣayed dantadhāvanam // Vi_61.16 //
analyzed: prātar bhūtvā ca yata vāc bhakṣayet dantadhāvanam

original: prakṣālya bhaṅktvā taj jahyāc chucau deśe prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: prakṣālya bhaṅktvā tat jahyāt śucau deśe prayatnataḥ

original: amāvāsyāṃ na cāśnīyād dantakāṣṭhaṃ kadācana // Vi_61.17 //
analyzed: amāvāsyām na ca aśnīyāt dantakāṣṭham kadācana

original: atha dvijātīnāṃ kanīnikāmūle prājāpatyaṃ nāma tīrtham // Vi_62.1 //
analyzed: atha dvijātīnām kanīnikā mūle prājāpatyam nāma tīrtham

original: anagnyuṣṇābhir aphenilābhiḥ aśūdraikakarāvarjitābhir akṣārābhir adbhiḥ śucau deśe svāsīno 'ntarjānu prāṅmukhaś codaṅmukho vā tanmanāḥ sumanāś  #
analyzed: an agni uṣṇābhiḥ a phenilābhiḥ a śūdra eka kara āvarjitābhiḥ akṣārābhiḥ adbhiḥ śucau deśe su āsīnaḥ ntarjānu prāc mukhaḥ ca udak mukhaḥ vā tanmanāḥ sumanāḥ

original: khāny adbhir mūrdhānaṃ hṛdayaṃ spṛśet // Vi_62.8 //

analyzed: hṛd kaṇṭha tālu gābhiḥ ca yathāsaṃkhyam dvijātayaḥ

original: śudhyeran strī ca śūdraś ca sakṛt spṛṣṭābhir antataḥ // Vi_62.9 //
analyzed: śudhyeran strī ca śūdraḥ ca sakṛt spṛṣṭābhiḥ antatas
na satatam bāla vyādhita ārtaiḥ vāhanaiḥ

original: yavasodake vāhanānām adattvā ātmanaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇāpanodanaṃ na kuryāt // Vi_63.17 //
analyzed: yavasa udake vāhanānām a dattvā ātmanaḥ kṣudh tṛṣṇā apanodanam na kuryāt
na keśa tuṣa kapāla asthi bhasma aṅgārān
agni brāhmaṇa gaṇikā pūrṇa kumbha ādarśa chatra dhvaja patākā śrīvṛkṣa vardhamāna nandyāvartān ca
tālavṛnta cāmara aśva gaja aja go dadhi kṣīra madhu siddhārthakān ca
vīṇā candana āyudha ārdra gomaya phala puṣpa ārdra śāka gorocanā dūrvā prarohān ca
uṣṇīṣa alaṃkāra maṇi kanaka rajata vastra āsana yāna āmiṣān ca
bhṛṅgāra uddhṛta urvarā baddha eka paśu kumārī mīnān ca dṛṣṭvā prayāyāt iti
atha matta unmatta vyaṅgān dṛṣṭvā nivarteta
vānta virikta muṇḍa jaṭila vāmanān ca
taila guḍa śuṣka gomaya indhana tṛṇa palāśa bhasma aṅgārān ca
lavaṇa klība āsava napuṃsaka kārpāsa rajju nigaḍa mukta keśān ca

original: vīnācandanārdraśākoṣṇīṣālaṃkaraṇakumārīs tu prasthānakāle abhinandayed iti // Vi_63.38 //
analyzed: vīnā candana ārdra śāka uṣṇīṣa alaṃkaraṇa kumārīḥ tu prasthāna kāle abhinandayet iti
deva brāhmaṇa guru babhru dīkṣitānām chāyām na ākrāmet
niṣṭhyūta vānta rudhira viṣ mūtra snāna udakāni ca

original: na devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś codakam apradāya // Vi_63.44 //
analyzed: na devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ ca udakam a pradāya
vṛddha bhāri nṛpa snāta strī rogi vara cakriṇām

original: panthā deyā nṛpas tv eṣāṃ mānyaḥ snātaś ca bhūpateḥ // Vi_63.50 //
analyzed: panthāḥ deyā nṛpaḥ tu eṣām mānyaḥ snātaḥ ca bhūpateḥ

original: ācaret pañca piṇḍān uddhṛtyāpas tad āpadi // Vi_64.2 //
analyzed: ācaret pañca piṇḍān uddhṛtya apaḥ tat āpadi
prātaḥsnāna śīlaḥ ruṇa tāmrām prācīm ālokya snāyāt
na a prakṣālitam pūrva dhṛtam vasanam bibhṛyāt

original: snāta eva soṣṇīṣe dhaute vāsasī bibhṛyāt // Vi_64.14 //
analyzed: snātaḥ eva sa uṣṇīṣe dhaute vāsasī bibhṛyāt

original: na mlecchāntyajapatitaiḥ saha saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_64.15 //
analyzed: na mleccha antyaja patitaiḥ saha saṃbhāṣaṇam kuryāt

original: mṛttoyaiḥ kṛtamalāpakaṛṣo 'psu nimajjyopaviśyāpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhir hiraṇyavarṇeti catasṛbhir idam āpaḥ pravahateti ca tīrtham abhimantrayet
analyzed: mṛd toyaiḥ kṛta mala apakaṛṣaḥ upsu nimajjya upaviśya apaḥ hi stha iti tisṛbhiḥ hiraṇya varṇā iti catasṛbhiḥ idam āpaḥ pravahata iti ca tīrtham abhimantrayet

original: tato 'psu nimagnas trir aghamarṣaṇaṃ japet // Vi_64.19 //
analyzed: tatas u psu nimagnaḥ tris aghamarṣaṇam japet

original: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti vā // Vi_64.20 //
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam iti vā

original: yuñjate mana ity anuvākaṃ vā // Vi_64.22 //
snātaś cārdravāsā devapitṛtarpaṇam ambhaḥstha eva kuryāt // Vi_64.24 //
analyzed: snātaḥ ca ārdra vāsāḥ deva pitṛ tarpaṇam ambhaḥ sthaḥ eva kuryāt

original: akṛtvā devapitṛtarpaṇaṃ snānaśāṭīṃ na pīḍayet // Vi_64.26 //
analyzed: a kṛtvā deva pitṛ tarpaṇam snāna śāṭīm na pīḍayet

original: puruṣasūktena pratyṛcaṃ puruṣāya puṣpāni dadyāt // Vi_64.28 //
ādāv eva daivena tīrthena devānāṃ tarpaṇaṃ kuryāt // Vi_64.30 //
analyzed: ādau eva daivena tīrthena devānām tarpaṇam kuryāt
