original: snātaś ca pavitrāṇi yathāśakti japet // Vi_64.36 //
snāto 'dhikārī bhavati daive pitrye ca karmaṇi /
analyzed: snātaḥ dhikārī bhavati daive pitrye ca karmaṇi

original: pavitrāṇāṃ tathā japye dāne ca vidhibodhite // Vi_64.40 //
analyzed: pavitrāṇām tathā japye dāne ca vidhi bodhite
ap mātreṇa abhiṣiktasya naśyante iti dhāraṇā

original: yāmyaṃ hi yātanāduḥkhaṃ nityasnāyī na paśyati /
analyzed: yāmyam hi yātanā duḥkham nitya snāyī na paśyati

original: nityasnānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto narāḥ // Vi_64.42 //
analyzed: nitya snānena pūyante ye pi pāpa kṛtaḥ narāḥ

original: athātaḥ susnātaḥ suprakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ svācānto devatārcāyāṃ sthale vā bhagavantam anādinidhanaṃ vāsudevam abhyarcayet // Vi_65.1 //
analyzed: atha atas su snātaḥ su prakṣālita pāṇi pādaḥ su ācāntaḥ devatā arcāyām sthale vā bhagavantam an ādi nidhanam vāsudevam abhyarcayet

original: aśvinoḥ prāṇas tau ta iti jīvādānaṃ dattvā yuñjate mana ity anuvākenāvāhanaṃ kṛtvā jānubhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasā ca namaskāraṃ kuryāt // Vi_65.2
analyzed: aśvinoḥ prāṇaḥ tau te iti jīvādānam dattvā yuñjate manaḥ iti anuvākena āvāhanam kṛtvā jānubhyām pāṇibhyām śirasā ca namaskāram kuryāt  /

original: āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhir arghyaṃ nivedayet // Vi_65.3 //
analyzed: āpaḥ hi stha iti tisṛbhiḥ arghyam nivedayet

original: śaṃ na āpo dhanvanyā ity ācamanīyam // Vi_65.5 //
analyzed: śam naḥ āpaḥ dhanvanyāḥ iti ācamanīyam

original: rathe akṣeṣu vrṣabhasya vāje ity anulepanālaṃkārau // Vi_65.7 //
analyzed: rathe akṣeṣu vṛṣabhasya vāje iti anulepana alaṃkārau

original: cāmaraṃ vyajanaṃ mātrāṃ chatraṃ yānāsane tathā /
analyzed: cāmaram vyajanam mātrām chatram yāna āsane tathā

original: sāvitreṇaiva tat sarvaṃ devāya vinivedayet // Vi_65.14 //
analyzed: sāvitreṇa eva tat sarvam devāya vinivedayet

original: evam abhyarcya tu japet sūktaṃ vai pauruṣaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: evam abhyarcya tu japet sūktam vai pauruṣam tatas

original: tenaiva cājyaṃ juhuyād yadīcchec chāśvataṃ padam // Vi_65.15 //
analyzed: tena eva ca ājyam juhuyāt yadi icchet śāśvatam padam

original: na naktaṃ gṛhītenodakena devapitṛkarma kuryāt // Vi_66.1 //
analyzed: na naktam gṛhītena udakena deva pitṛ karma kuryāt
cadana mṛgamada dāru karpūra kuṅkuma jātīphala varjam anulepanam na dadyāt

original: kaṇṭakijam api śuklaṃ sugandhikaṃ tu dadyāt // Vi_66.8 //
analyzed: kaṇṭaki jam api śuklam sugandhikam tu dadyāt

original: raktam api kuṅkumaṃ jalajaṃ ca dadyāt // Vi_66.9 //
analyzed: raktam api kuṅkumam jalajam ca dadyāt

original: na ghṛtatailaṃ vinā kiṃcana dīpārthe // Vi_66.11 //
analyzed: na ghṛta tailam vinā kiṃcana dīpa arthe
na bhakṣye api ajā mahiṣī kṣīre

original: prayataś ca śucir bhūtvā sarvam eva nivedayet /
analyzed: prayataḥ ca śuciḥ bhūtvā sarvam eva nivedayet
tad manāḥ su manāḥ bhūtvā tvarā krodha vivarjitaḥ

original: athāgniṃ parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya pariṣicya sarvataḥ pākād agram uddhṛtya juhuyāt // Vi_67.1 //
analyzed: atha agnim parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya pariṣicya sarvatas pākāt agram uddhṛtya juhuyāt

original: vāsudevāya saṃkarṣaṇāya pradyumnāyāniruddhāya puruṣāya satyāyācyutāya vāsudevāya // Vi_67.2 //
analyzed: vāsudevāya saṃkarṣaṇāya pradyumnāya aniruddhāya puruṣāya satyāya acyutāya vāsudevāya

original: nandini subhage sumaṅgali bhadraṃkarīti svaśriṣv abhipradakṣiṇam // Vi_67.8 //
analyzed: nandini subhage su maṅgali bhadraṃkari iti su aśriṣu abhipradakṣiṇam

original: sthūṇāyāṃ dhruvāyāṃ śriyai hiraṇyakeśyai vanaspatibhyaś ca // Vi_67.9 //
analyzed: sthūṇāyām dhruvāyām śriyai hiraṇya keśyai vanaspatibhyaḥ ca

original: upari śaraṇe vaiśravaṇāya rājñe bhūtebhyaś ca // Vi_67.14 //
analyzed: upari śaraṇe vaiśravaṇāya rājñe bhūtebhyaḥ ca
indrāya indra puruṣebhyaḥ ca iti pūrva ardhe
varuṇāya varuṇa puruṣebhyaḥ iti paśca ardhe
somāya soma puruṣebhyaḥ iti uttara ardhe

original: sthaṇḍile divācarebhyo bhūtebhya iti divā // Vi_67.21 //
tato *dakṣiṇāgreṣu darbheṣu pitre pitāmahāya prapitāmahāya mātre pitāmahyai prapitāmahyai nāmagotrābhyāṃ ca piṇḍanirvāpaṇaṃ kuryāt [dakṣiṇagreṣu]
analyzed: tatas dakṣiṇa agreṣu darbheṣu pitre pitāmahāya prapitāmahāya mātre pitāmahyai prapitāmahyai nāma gotrābhyām ca piṇḍa nirvāpaṇam kuryāt dakṣiṇa agreṣu
piṇḍānām ca anulepana puṣpa dhūpa naivedya ādi dadyāt

original: atithipūjane ca paraṃ yatnam ātiṣṭheta // Vi_67.28 //
analyzed: atithi pūjane ca param yatnam ātiṣṭheta

original: anāśitam atithiṃ gṛhe na vāsayet // Vi_67.30 //
analyzed: an āśitam atithim gṛhe na vāsayet

original: yathā varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ prabhur yathā strīṇāṃ bhartā tathā gṛhasthasyātithiḥ // Vi_67.31 //
analyzed: yathā varṇānām brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ yathā strīṇām bhartā tathā gṛhasthasya atithiḥ
atithiḥ yasya bhagna āśaḥ gṛhāt pratinivartate

original: tasmāt sukṛtam ādāya duṣkṛtaṃ tu prayacchati // Vi_67.33 //
analyzed: tasmāt sukṛtam ādāya duṣkṛtam tu prayacchati

original: ekarātraṃ hi nivasann atithir brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eka rātram hi nivasan atithiḥ brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: anityaṃ hi sthito yasmāt tasmād atithir ucyate // Vi_67.34 //
analyzed: anityam hi sthitaḥ yasmāt tasmāt atithiḥ ucyate
na eka grāmīṇam atithim vipram sāṃgatikam tathā

original: upasthitaṃ gṛhe vindyād bhāryā yatrāgnayo 'pi vā // Vi_67.35 //
yadi tv atithidharmeṇa kṣatriyo gṛham āgataḥ /
analyzed: yadi tu atithi dharmeṇa kṣatriyaḥ gṛham āgataḥ

original: bhuktavatsu ca vipresu kāmaṃ tam api bhojayet // Vi_67.36 //
analyzed: bhuktavatsu ca vipresu kāmam tam api bhojayet
vaiśya śūdrau api prāptau kuṭumbe tithi dharmiṇau

original: bhojayet saha bhṛtyais tāv ānṛśaṃsyaṃ prayojayan // Vi_67.37 //
analyzed: bhojayet saha bhṛtyaiḥ tau ānṛśaṃsyam prayojayan

original: itarān api sakhyādīn saṃprītyā gṛham āgatān /
analyzed: itarān api sakhi ādīn saṃprītyā gṛham āgatān

original: prakṛtānnaṃ yathāśakti bhojayet saha bhāryayā // Vi_67.38 //
analyzed: prakṛta annam yathāśakti bhojayet saha bhāryayā

original: svavāsinīṃ kumārīṃ ca rogiṇīṃ gurviṇīṃ tathā /
analyzed: svavāsinīm kumārīm ca rogiṇīm gurviṇīm tathā
atithibhyaḥ gre eva etān bhojayet a vicārayan

original: adattvā yas tu etebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ bhuṅkte 'vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: a dattvā yaḥ tu etebhyaḥ pūrvam bhuṅkte vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: bhuñjāno na sa jānāti śvagṛdhrair jagdhim ātmanaḥ // Vi_67.40 //
analyzed: bhuñjānaḥ na sa jānāti śva gṛdhraiḥ jagdhim ātmanaḥ

original: bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu sveṣu bhṛtyeṣu caiva hi /
analyzed: bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu sveṣu bhṛtyeṣu ca eva hi

original: bhuñjīyātāṃ tataḥ paścād avaśiṣṭaṃ tu daṃpatī // Vi_67.41 //
analyzed: bhuñjīyātām tatas paścāt avaśiṣṭam tu daṃpatī

original: devān pitṝn manuṣyāṃś ca bhṛtyān gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ /
analyzed: devān pitṝn manuṣyān ca bhṛtyān gṛhyāḥ ca devatāḥ

original: pūjayitvā tataḥ paścād gṛhasthaḥ śeṣabhug bhavet // Vi_67.42 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā tatas paścāt gṛhasthaḥ śeṣa bhuj bhavet

original: aghaṃ sa kevalaṃ bhuṅkte yaḥ pacaty ātmakāraṇāt /
analyzed: agham sa kevalam bhuṅkte yaḥ pacati ātma kāraṇāt

original: yajñaśiṣṭāśanaṃ hy etat satām annaṃ vidhīyate // Vi_67.43 //
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭa aśanam hi etat satām annam vidhīyate

original: na cāpnoti gṛhī lokān yathā tv atithipūjanāt // Vi_67.44 //
analyzed: na ca āpnoti gṛhī lokān yathā tu atithi pūjanāt

original: sāyaṃ prātas tv atithaye pradadyād āsanodake /
analyzed: sāyam prātar tu atithaye pradadyāt āsana udake

original: annaṃ caiva yathāśaktyā satkṛtya vidhipūrvakam // Vi_67.45 //
analyzed: annam ca eva yathāśaktyā satkṛtya vidhi pūrvakam
pratiśrayam tathā śayyām pāda abhyaṅgam sa dīpakam
pratyeka dānena āpnoti go pradāna samam phalam

original: amuktayor astaṃ gatayoḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā cāpare 'hni // Vi_68.3 //
analyzed: amuktayoḥ astam gatayoḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca apare hni

original: pravasitāgnihotrī yadāgnihotraṃ kṛtaṃ manyate tadāśnīyāt // Vi_68.6 //
analyzed: pravasita agnihotrī yadā agnihotram kṛtam manyate tadā aśnīyāt

original: yadā kṛtaṃ manyeta vaiśvadevam api // Vi_68.7 //
parvaṇi ca yadā kṛtaṃ manyeta parva // Vi_68.8 //
analyzed: parvaṇi ca yadā kṛtam manyeta parva

original: lavaṇaṃ ca yatra dadyāt tan nāśnīyāt // Vi_68.24 //
analyzed: lavaṇam ca yatra dadyāt tat na aśnīyāt
na kovidāra vaṭa pippala śāṇa śākam
na an ārdra kara mukhaḥ ca
anyatra dadhi madhu sarpiḥ payaḥ saktu pala modakebhyaḥ

original: nāśnīyād bhāryayā sārdhaṃ nākāśe na tathotthitaḥ /
analyzed: na aśnīyāt bhāryayā sārdham na ākāśe na tathā utthitaḥ

original: bahūnāṃ prekṣamāṇānāṃ naikasmin bahavas tathā // Vi_68.46 //
analyzed: bahūnām prekṣamāṇānām na ekasmin bahavaḥ tathā
śūnya ālaye vahni gṛhe devāgāre kathaṃcana

original: piben nāñjalinā toyaṃ nātisauhityam ācaret // Vi_68.47 //
analyzed: pibet na añjalinā toyam na ati sauhityam ācaret

original: na tṛtīyam athāśnīta na cāpathyaṃ kathaṃcana /
analyzed: na tṛtīyam atha aśnīta na ca apathyam kathaṃcana

original: nātiprage nātisāyaṃ na sāyaṃ prātar āśitaḥ // Vi_68.48 //
analyzed: na atiprage na atisāyam na sāyam prātar āśitaḥ

original: na bhāvaduṣṭam aśnīyān na bhāṇḍe bhāvadūṣite /
analyzed: na bhāva duṣṭam aśnīyāt na bhāṇḍe bhāva dūṣite

original: śayānaḥ prauḍhapādaś ca kṛtvā caivāvasakthikām // Vi_68.49 //
analyzed: śayānaḥ prauḍha pādaḥ ca kṛtvā ca eva avasakthikām
na aṣṭamī caturdaśī pañcadaśīṣu striyam upeyāt

original: na hīnāṅgīṃ nādhikāṅgīṃ tathaiva ca vayo 'dhikām /
analyzed: na hīna aṅgīm na adhika aṅgīm tathā eva ca vayaḥ dhikām

original: nopeyād gurviṇīṃ nārīṃ dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ // Vi_69.17 //
analyzed: na upeyāt gurviṇīm nārīm dīrgham āyuḥ jijīviṣuḥ
na dhānya go guru hutāśana surāṇām upari

original: nocchiṣṭo na divā supyāt saṃdhyayor na ca bhasmani /
analyzed: na ucchiṣṭaḥ na divā supyāt saṃdhyayoḥ na ca bhasmani

original: deśe na ca aśucau nārdre na ca parvatamastake // Vi_70.17 //
analyzed: deśe na ca aśucau na ārdre na ca parvata mastake

original: na ca hīnādhikāṅgān mūrkhān dhanahīnān avahaset // Vi_71.2 //
analyzed: na ca hīna adhika aṅgān mūrkhān dhana hīnān avahaset

original: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ syāt // Vi_71.9 //
analyzed: sati vibhave na jīrṇa malavat vāsāḥ syāt

original: na nirgandhogragandhi raktaṃ ca mālyaṃ bibhṛyāt // Vi_71.11 //
analyzed: na nirgandha ugra gandhi raktam ca mālyam bibhṛyāt
na ca ādarśa jala madhya stham
na ca viṣama sthaḥ vṛṣa ādi yuddham
vastra upānaha mālya upavītāni anya dhṛtāni na dhārayet

original: na saṃhatābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śira udaraṃ ca kaṇḍūyet // Vi_71.53 //
analyzed: na saṃhatābhyām pāṇibhyām śiraḥ udaram ca kaṇḍūyet
agni deva brāhmaṇa saṃnidhau dakṣiṇam pāṇim uddharet

original: na parakṣetre carantīṃ gām ācakṣīta // Vi_71.61 //
analyzed: na para kṣetre carantīm gām ācakṣīta

original: nātmānam avajānīyād dīrgham āyur jijīviṣuḥ // Vi_71.76 //
analyzed: na ātmānam avajānīyāt dīrgham āyuḥ jijīviṣuḥ

original: taṃ veṇudalena rajjvā vā pṛṣṭhe // Vi_71.82 //
analyzed: tam veṇu dalena rajjvā vā pṛṣṭhe
deva brāhmaṇa śāstra mahātmanām parivādam pariharet
śruti smṛti uditam dharmyam sādhubhiḥ ca niṣevitam

original: tam ācāraṃ niṣeveta dharmakāmo jitendriyaḥ // Vi_71.90 //
analyzed: tam ācāram niṣeveta dharma kāmaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: ācārāl labhate cāyur ācārād īpsitāṃ gatim /
analyzed: ācārāt labhate ca āyuḥ ācārāt īpsitām gatim

original: ācārād dhanam akṣayyam ācārād dhanty alakṣaṇam // Vi_71.91 //
analyzed: ācārāt dhanam akṣayyam ācārāt dhanti alakṣaṇam
sarva lakṣana hīnaḥ pi yaḥ sat ācāravān naraḥ

original: śraddhadhāno 'nasūyaś ca śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati // Vi_71.93 //
analyzed: śraddhadhānaḥ nasūyaḥ ca śatam varṣāṇi jīvati
na a dāntasya kriyā kācid samṛdhyati

original: damaḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ maṅgalyaṃ paramaṃ damaḥ /
analyzed: damaḥ pavitram paramam maṅgalyam paramam damaḥ

original: damena sarvam āpnoti yat kiṃcin manasecchati // Vi_72.5 //
analyzed: damena sarvam āpnoti yat kiṃcid manasā icchati
daśārdha yuktena rathena yātaḥ manaḥ vaśena ārya pathā anuvartinā

original: taṃ ced rathaṃ nāpaharanti vājinas tathāgataṃ nāvajayanti śatravaḥ // Vi_72.6 //
analyzed: tam ced ratham na apaharanti vājinaḥ tathāgatam na avajayanti śatravaḥ

original: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat /
analyzed: āpūryamāṇam acala pratiṣṭham samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat

original: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī // Vi_72.7 //
analyzed: tadvat kāmāḥ yam praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma kāmī

original: atha śrāddhepsuḥ pūrvedyur brāhmaṇān āmantrayet // Vi_73.1 //
analyzed: atha śrāddha īpsuḥ pūrvedyus brāhmaṇān āmantrayet

original: dvitīye 'hni śuklapakṣasya pūrvāhṇe kṛṣṇapakṣasyāparāhṇe viprān susnātān svācāntān yathābhūyo vayaḥkrameṇa kuśottareṣv āsaneṣūpaveśayet //
analyzed: dvitīye hni śuklapakṣasya pūrvāhṇe kṛṣṇapakṣasya aparāhṇe viprān su snātān su ācāntān yathābhūyas vayaḥ krameṇa kuśa uttareṣu āsaneṣu upaveśayet

original: dvau daive prāṅmukhau trīṃś ca pitrye udaṅmukhān // Vi_73.3 //
analyzed: dvau daive prāc mukhau trīn ca pitrye udak mukhān

original: āmaśrāddheṣu kāmyeṣu ca prathamapañcakenāgniṃ hutvā // Vi_73.5 //
analyzed: āmaśrāddheṣu kāmyeṣu ca prathama pañcakena agnim hutvā

original: āgrahāyaṇyā ūrdhvaṃ kṛṣṇāṣṭakāsu ca krameṇaiva prathamamadhyamottamapañcakaiḥ // Vi_73.8 //
analyzed: āgrahāyaṇyāḥ ūrdhvam kṛṣṇa aṣṭakāsu ca krameṇa eva prathama madhyama uttama pañcakaiḥ

original: apayantv asurā iti dvābhyāṃ tilaiḥ yātudhānānāṃ visarjanaṃ kṛtvā // Vi_73.11 //
analyzed: apayantu asurāḥ iti dvābhyām tilaiḥ yātudhānānām visarjanam kṛtvā

original: eta pitaraḥ sarvāṃs tān agra ā me yantv etad vaḥ pitara ity āvāhanaṃ kṛtvā,
analyzed: eta pitaraḥ sarvān tān agre ā me yantu etat vaḥ pitaraḥ iti āvāhanam kṛtvā

original: kuśatilamiśreṇa gandhodakena yās tiṣṭhanty amṛtā vāg iti yan me māteti ca pādyaṃ nivedya,
analyzed: kuśa tila miśreṇa gandha udakena yāḥ tiṣṭhanti amṛtā vāc iti yat me mātā iti ca pādyam nivedya

original: arghyaṃ kṛtvā nivedya cānulepanaṃ kṛtvā kuśatilavastrapuṣpālaṃkāradhūpadīpair yathāśaktyā viprān samabhyarcya ghṛtaplutam annam ādāya ādityā  #
analyzed: arghyam kṛtvā nivedya ca anulepanam kṛtvā kuśa tila vastra puṣpa alaṃkāra dhūpa dīpaiḥ yathāśaktyā viprān samabhyarcya ghṛta plutam annam ādāya ādityā

original: agnau karavāṇīty uktvā tac ca vipraiḥ kurv ity ukte āhutitrayaṃ dadyāt // Vi_73.12 //
analyzed: agnau karavāṇi iti uktvā tat ca vipraiḥ kuru iti ukte āhuti trayam dadyāt

original: ye māmakāḥ pitara etad vaḥ pitaro 'yaṃ yajña iti ca havir anumantraṇaṃ kṛtvā yathopapanneṣu
analyzed: ye māmakāḥ pitaraḥ etat vaḥ pitaraḥ yam yajñe iti ca haviḥ anumantraṇam kṛtvā yathā upapanneṣu

original: pātreṣu viśeṣād rajatamayeṣv annaṃ namo viśvebhyo devebhya ity annam ādau prāṅmukhayor
analyzed: pātreṣu viśeṣāt rajata mayeṣu annam namaḥ viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ iti annam ādau prāc mukhayoḥ

original: pitre pitāmahāya prapitāmahāya ca nāmagotrābhyām udaṅmukheṣu // Vi_73.14 //
analyzed: pitre pitāmahāya prapitāmahāya ca nāma gotrābhyām udak mukheṣu

original: tad adatsu brāhmaṇeṣu yan me prakāmād ahorātrair yad vaḥ kravyād iti japet // Vi_73.15 //
analyzed: tat adatsu brāhmaṇeṣu yat me prakāmāt ahar rātraiḥ yat vaḥ kravyāt iti japet
itihāsa purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇi ca iti

original: ucchiṣṭasaṃnidhau dakṣināgreṣu kuśeṣu pṛthivī darvir akṣitā ity ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ pitre nidadhyāt // Vi_73.17 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa saṃnidhau dakṣinā agreṣu kuśeṣu pṛthivī darviḥ akṣitā iti ekam piṇḍam pitre nidadhyāt

original: antarikṣaṃ darvir akṣitā ity dvitīyaṃ piṇḍaṃ pitāmahāya // Vi_73.18 //
analyzed: antarikṣam darviḥ a kṣitā iti dvitīyam piṇḍam pitāmahāya

original: dyaur darvir akṣitā iti tṛtīyaṃ prapitāmahāya // Vi_73.19 //
analyzed: dyauḥ darviḥ a kṣitā iti tṛtīyam prapitāmahāya

original: ye atra pitaraḥ pretā iti vāso deyam // Vi_73.20 //
analyzed: ye atra pitaraḥ pretāḥ iti vāsaḥ deyam

original: vīrānnaḥ pitaro dhatta ity annam // Vi_73.21 //
analyzed: vīrān naḥ pitaraḥ dhatta iti annam

original: atra pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgam iti darbhamūle karāvagharṣaṇam // Vi_73.22 //
analyzed: atra pitaraḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam iti darbha mūle kara avagharṣaṇam

original: ūrjaṃ vahantīr ity anena sodakena pradakṣiṇaṃ piṇḍānāṃ vikiraṇaṃ kṛtvā arghapuṣpadhūpālepanānnādibhakṣyabhojyāni nivedayet // Vi_73.23 //
analyzed: ūrjam vahantīḥ iti anena sa udakena pradakṣiṇam piṇḍānām vikiraṇam kṛtvā argha puṣpa dhūpa ālepana anna ādi bhakṣya bhojyāni nivedayet
udaka pātram madhu ghṛta tilaiḥ saṃyuktam ca

original: mā me kṣeṣthety annaṃ satṛṇam abhyukṣyānnavikiram ucchiṣṭāgrataḥ kṛtvā,
analyzed: mā me kṣeṣtha iti annam sa tṛṇam abhyukṣya anna vikiram ucchiṣṭa agratas kṛtvā

original: tṛptā bhavantaḥ saṃpannam iti ca pṛṣṭvā udaṅmukheṣv ācamanam ādau dattvā,
analyzed: tṛptāḥ bhavantaḥ saṃpannam iti ca pṛṣṭvā udak mukheṣu ācamanam ādau dattvā

original: tataś ca suprokṣitam iti śrāddhadeśaṃ saṃprokṣya,
analyzed: tatas ca su prokṣitam iti śrāddha deśam saṃprokṣya

original: tataḥ prāṅmukhāgrato yan me rāma iti pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pratyetya ca,
analyzed: tatas prāc mukha agratas yat me rāmaḥ iti pradakṣiṇam kṛtvā pratyetya ca

original: devāś ca pitaraś cety abhijapet // Vi_73.26 //
analyzed: devāḥ ca pitaraḥ ca iti abhijapet

original: akṣayyodakaṃ ca nāmagotrābhyāṃ dattvā viśve devāḥ prīyantām iti prāṅmukhebhyas tataḥ prāñjalir idaṃ tanmanāḥ sumanā yāceta // Vi_73.27 //
analyzed: akṣayya udakam ca nāma gotrābhyām dattvā viśve devāḥ prīyantām iti prāc mukhebhyaḥ tatas prāñjaliḥ idam tad manāḥ sumanāḥ yāceta

original: dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ saṃtatir eva ca /
analyzed: dātāraḥ naḥ bhivardhantām vedāḥ saṃtatiḥ eva ca

original: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamad bahu deyaṃ ca no 'stv iti // Vi_73.28 //
analyzed: śraddhā ca naḥ mā vyagamat bahu deyam ca naḥ stu iti

original: annaṃ ca no bahu bhaved atithīṃś ca labhemahi /
analyzed: annam ca naḥ bahu bhavet atithīn ca labhemahi

original: yācitāraś ca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kaṃcana // Vi_73.30 //
analyzed: yācitāraḥ ca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kaṃcana

original: vāje vāja ity ca tato brāhmaṇāṃś ca visarjayet /
analyzed: vāje vāje iti ca tatas brāhmaṇān ca visarjayet

original: aṣṭakāsu daivapūrvaṃ śākamāṃsāpūpaiḥ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvānvaṣṭakāsv aṣṭakāvad vahnau hutvā
analyzed: aṣṭakāsu daiva pūrvam śāka māṃsa apūpaiḥ śrāddham kṛtvā anvaṣṭakāsu aṣṭakā vat vahnau hutvā

original: daivapūrvam eva mātre pitāmahyai prapitāmahyai ca pūrvavad brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā dakṣiṇābhiś
analyzed: daiva pūrvam eva mātre pitāmahyai prapitāmahyai ca pūrvavat brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā dakṣiṇābhiḥ
tad mūle prāc udak agni upasamādhānam kṛtvā piṇḍa nirvapaṇam
karṣū traya mūle puruṣāṇām karṣū traya mūle strīṇām
puruṣa karṣū trayam sa annena udakena pūrayet
strī karṣū trayam sa annena payasā

original: dadhnā māṃsena payasā pratyekaṃ karṣūtrayam // Vi_74.7 //
analyzed: dadhnā māṃsena payasā pratyekam karṣū trayam

original: pūrayitvā japed etad bhavadbhyo bhavatībyo 'stu cākṣayam // Vi_74.8 //
analyzed: pūrayitvā japet etat bhavadbhyaḥ bhavatībyoḥ stu ca akṣayam

original: sa yeṣāṃ pitā kuryāt teṣāṃ kuryāt // Vi_75.1 //
analyzed: sa yeṣām pitā kuryāt teṣām kuryāt

original: pitari pitāmahe ca jīvati yeṣāṃ pitāmahaḥ // Vi_75.2 //
analyzed: pitari pitāmahe ca jīvati yeṣām pitāmahaḥ

original: pitari pitāmahe prapitāmahe ca jīvati naiva kuryāt // Vi_75.3 //
analyzed: pitari pitāmahe prapitāmahe ca jīvati na eva kuryāt

original: yasya pitā pretaḥ syāt sa pitre piṇḍaṃ nidhāya pitāmahāt paraṃ dvābhyāṃ dadyāt // Vi_75.4 //
analyzed: yasya pitā pretaḥ syāt sa pitre piṇḍam nidhāya pitāmahāt param dvābhyām dadyāt

original: yasya pitā pitāmahaś ca pretau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ piṇḍau dattvā pitāmahapitāmahāya dadyāt // Vi_75.5 //
analyzed: yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ ca pretau syātām sa tābhyām piṇḍau dattvā pitāmaha pitāmahāya dadyāt

original: yasya pitāmahaḥ pretaḥ syāt sa tasmai piṇḍaṃ nidhāya prapitāmahāt paraṃ dvābhyāṃ dadyāt // Vi_75.6 //
analyzed: yasya pitāmahaḥ pretaḥ syāt sa tasmai piṇḍam nidhāya prapitāmahāt param dvābhyām dadyāt

original: mātāmahānām apy evaṃ śrāddhaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: mātāmahānām api evam śrāddham kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
mantra ūheṇa yathānyāyam śeṣāṇām mantra varjitam

original: amāvāsyās tisro 'ṣṭakās tisro 'nvaṣṭakā māghī prauṣṭhapady ūrdhvaṃ kṛṣṇatrayodaśī vrīhiyavapākau ceti // Vi_76.1 //
analyzed: amāvāsyāḥ tisraḥ ṣṭakāḥ tisraḥ nvaṣṭakāḥ māghī prauṣṭhapadī ūrdhvam kṛṣṇa trayodaśī vrīhi yava pākau ca iti

original: etāṃs tu śrāddhakālān vai nityān āha prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: etān tu śrāddha kālān vai nityān āha prajāpatiḥ

original: śrāddham eteṣv akurvāṇo narakaṃ pratipadyate // Vi_76.2 //
analyzed: śrāddham eteṣu a kurvāṇaḥ narakam pratipadyate

original: etāṃs tu śrāddhakālān vai kāmyān āha prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: etān tu śrāddha kālān vai kāmyān āha prajāpatiḥ

original: śrāddham eteṣu yad dattaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate // Vi_77.7 //
analyzed: śrāddham eteṣu yat dattam tat ānantyāya kalpate

original: saṃdhyārātryor na kartavyaṃ śrāddhaṃ khalu vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: saṃdhyā rātryoḥ na kartavyam śrāddham khalu vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: tayor api ca kartavyaṃ yadi syād rāhudarśanam // Vi_77.8 //
analyzed: tayoḥ api ca kartavyam yadi syāt rāhu darśanam

original: satatam āditye 'hni śrāddhaṃ kurvann ārogyam āpnoti // Vi_78.1 //
analyzed: satatam āditye hni śrāddham kurvan ārogyam āpnoti
śastra hatānām śrāddha karmaṇi caturdaśī śastā

original: api jāyeta so 'smākaṃ kule kaścin narottamaḥ /
analyzed: api jāyeta saḥ smākam kule kaścid nara uttamaḥ
prāvṛṣ kāle site pakṣe trayodaśyām samāhitaḥ
madhu utkaṭena yaḥ śrāddham pāyasena samācaret

original: kārttikaṃ sakalaṃ māsaṃ prākchāye kuñjarasya ca // Vi_78.53 //
analyzed: kārttikam sakalam māsam prāk chāye kuñjarasya ca

original: atha na naktaṃ gṛhītenodakena śrāddhaṃ kuryāt // Vi_79.1 //
analyzed: atha na naktam gṛhītena udakena śrāddham kuryāt

original: kuśābhāve kuśasthāne kāśān dūrvāṃ vā dadyāt // Vi_79.2 //
analyzed: kuśa abhāve kuśa sthāne kāśān dūrvām vā dadyāt

original: daśāṃ visarjayet yady apy ahatavastrajā syāt // Vi_79.4 //
analyzed: daśām visarjayet yadi api ahata vastra jā syāt

original: ugragandhīny agandhīni kaṇṭakijāni ca puṣpāṇi // Vi_79.5 //
analyzed: ugra gandhīni agandhīni kaṇṭaki jāni ca puṣpāṇi

original: śuklāni sugandhīni kaṇṭakijāny api jalajāni raktāny api dadyāt // Vi_79.6 //
analyzed: śuklāni sugandhīni kaṇṭaki jāni api jala jāni raktāni api dadyāt

original: vasāṃ medaṃ ca dīpārthe na dadyāt // Vi_79.7 //
analyzed: vasām medam ca dīpa arthe na dadyāt

original: jīvajaṃ sarvaṃ dhūpārthe na dadyāt // Vi_79.9 //
analyzed: jīva jam sarvam dhūpa arthe na dadyāt
candana kuṅkuma karpūra agaru padmakāni anulepana arthe

original: khaḍgakutapakṛṣṇājinatilasiddhārthakākṣatāni ca pavitrāṇi rakṣoghnāni ca nidadhyāt // Vi_79.16 //
analyzed: khaḍga kutapa kṛṣṇājina tila siddhārthaka akṣatāni ca pavitrāṇi rakṣaḥ ghnāni ca nidadhyāt
pippalī mukundaka bhūstṛṇa śigru sarṣapa surasā sarjaka suvarcala kūśmāṇḍa alābu vārtāka pālakya upodakī taṇḍulīyaka kusumbha piṇḍāluka mahiṣī kṣīrāṇi varjayet
rājamāṣa masūrī paryuṣita kṛta lavaṇāni ca

original: ghṛtādidāne taijasāni pātrāṇi khaḍgapātrāṇi phalgupātrāṇi ca praśastāni // Vi_79.22 //
analyzed: ghṛta ādi dāne taijasāni pātrāṇi khaḍga pātrāṇi phalgu pātrāṇi ca praśastāni
sauvarṇa rājatābhyām ca khaḍgena audumbareṇa vā

original: dattam akṣayyatāṃ yāti phalgupātreṇa cāpy atha // Vi_79.24 //
analyzed: dattam akṣayya tām yāti phalgu pātreṇa ca api atha

original: tilair vrīhiyavair māṣair adbhir mūlaphalaiḥ śākaiḥ śyāmākaiḥ priyaṅgubhir nīvārair mudgair godhūmaiś ca māsaṃ prīyante // Vi_80.1 //
analyzed: tilaiḥ vrīhi yavaiḥ māṣaiḥ adbhiḥ mūla phalaiḥ śākaiḥ śyāmākaiḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ nīvāraiḥ mudgaiḥ godhūmaiḥ ca māsam prīyante

original: saṃvatsaraṃ gavyena payasā tadvikārair vā // Vi_80.12 //
analyzed: saṃvatsaram gavyena payasā tad vikāraiḥ vā

original: viṣāṇavarjyā ye khaḍgā āsūryaṃ tāṃs tu bhuṅkṣmahe // Vi_80.14 //
analyzed: viṣāṇa varjyāḥ ye khaḍgāḥ āsūryam tān tu

original: tilaiḥ sarṣapair vā yātudhānān visarjayet // Vi_81.4 //
na hīnāṅgā adhikāṅgāḥ śrāddhaṃ paśyeyuḥ // Vi_81.15 //
analyzed: na hīna aṅgāḥ adhika aṅgāḥ śrāddham paśyeyuḥ

original: tatkālaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brāhmaṇānumatena bhikṣukaṃ vā pūjayet // Vi_81.19 //
analyzed: tad kālam brāhmaṇam brāhmaṇa anumatena bhikṣukam vā pūjayet

original: havir guṇān na brāhmaṇā brūyur dātrā pṛṣṭāḥ // Vi_81.20 //
analyzed: haviḥ guṇān na brāhmaṇāḥ brūyuḥ dātrā pṛṣṭāḥ

original: yāvad ūṣmā bhavaty anne yāvad aśnanti vāgyatāḥ /
analyzed: yāvat ūṣmā bhavati anne yāvat aśnanti vāgyatāḥ

original: tāvad aśnanti pitaro yāvan noktā havir guṇāḥ // Vi_81.21 //
analyzed: tāvat aśnanti pitaraḥ yāvat na uktāḥ haviḥ guṇāḥ

original: samutsṛjed bhuktavatām agrato vikiran bhuvi // Vi_81.22 //

analyzed: a saṃskṛta pramītānām tyāginām kula yoṣitām

original: ucchiṣṭaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ syād darbheṣu vikiraś ca yaḥ // Vi_81.23 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam bhāgadheyam syāt darbheṣu vikiraḥ ca yaḥ
uccheṣaṇam bhūmi gatam a jihmasya a śaṭhasya ca

original: dāsavargasya tat pitrye bhāgadheyaṃ pracakṣate // Vi_81.24 //
analyzed: dāsa vargasya tat pitrye bhāgadheyam pracakṣate

original: daive karmaṇi brāhmaṇaṃ na parīkṣeta // Vi_82.1 //

analyzed: pitṛ mātṛ guru agni svādhyāya tyāginaḥ ca
brāhmaṇa apaśadāḥ hi ete kathitāḥ paṅkti dūṣakāḥ

original: etān vivarjayed yatnāc chrāddhakarmaṇi paṇḍitaḥ // Vi_82.30 //
analyzed: etān vivarjayet yatnāt śrāddha karmaṇi paṇḍitaḥ

original: api sa syāt kule 'smākaṃ bhojayed yas tu yoginam /
analyzed: api sa syāt kule smākam bhojayet yaḥ tu yoginam

original: vipraṃ śrāddhe prayatnena yena tṛpyāmahe vayam // Vi_83.21 //
analyzed: vipram śrāddhe prayatnena yena tṛpyāmahe vayam

original: paranipāneṣv apaḥ pītvā tatsāmyam upagacchatīti // Vi_84.3 //
analyzed: para nipāneṣu apaḥ pītvā tad sāmyam upagacchati iti
cāturvarṇya vyavasthānam yasmin deśe na vidyate

original: sa mlecchadeśo jijñeya āryāvartas tataḥ paraḥ // Vi_84.4 //
analyzed: sa mleccha deśaḥ jijñeyaḥ āryāvartaḥ tatas paraḥ

original: puṣkare snānamātrāt sarvapāpebhyaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_85.3 //
analyzed: puṣkare snāna mātrāt sarva pāpebhyaḥ pūtaḥ bhavati

original: atra ca pitṛgītā gāthā bhavanti // Vi_85.68 //
analyzed: atra ca pitṛ gītāḥ gāthāḥ bhavanti

original: kule 'smākaṃ sa jantuḥ syād yo no dadyāj jalāñjalīn /
analyzed: kule smākam sa jantuḥ syāt yaḥ naḥ dadyāt jala añjalīn

original: api jāyeta so 'smākaṃ kule kaścin narottamaḥ /
analyzed: api jāyeta saḥ smākam kule kaścid nara uttamaḥ

original: gayāśīrṣe vaṭe śrāddhaṃ yo naḥ kuryāt samāhitaḥ // Vi_85.70 //
analyzed: gayāśīrṣe vaṭe śrāddham yaḥ naḥ kuryāt samāhitaḥ

original: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yady eko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ putrāḥ yadi ekaḥ gayām vrajet

original: yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣam utsṛjet // Vi_85.71 //
analyzed: yajeta vā aśvamedhena nīlam vā vṛṣam utsṛjet
lohitam vā mukha puccha pāda śṛṅga śuklam

original: tato gavāṃ madhye susamiddham agniṃ paristīrya pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ payasā śrapayitvā pūṣā gā anvetu na iha ratir iti ca hutvā vṛṣam ayaskāras tv
analyzed: tatas gavām madhye su samiddham agnim paristīrya pauṣṇam carum payasā śrapayitvā pūṣā gāḥ anvetu naḥ iha ratiḥ iti ca hutvā vṛṣam ayaskāraḥ tvā

original: ekasmin pārśve cakreṇāparasmin pārśve śūlena // Vi_86.10 //
analyzed: ekasmin pārśve cakreṇa aparasmin pārśve śūlena

original: aṅkitaṃ ca hiraṇyavarṇeti catasṛbhiḥ śaṃ no devīr iti ca snāpayet // Vi_86.11 //
analyzed: aṅkitam ca hiraṇya varṇā iti catasṛbhiḥ śam naḥ devīḥ iti ca snāpayet

original: snātam alaṃkṛtaṃ snātālaṃkṛtābhiś catasṛbhir vatsatarībhiḥ sārdham ānīya rudrān puruṣasūktaṃ kūśmāṇḍīś ca japet // Vi_86.12 //
analyzed: snātam alaṃkṛtam snāta alaṃkṛtābhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ vatsatarībhiḥ sārdham ānīya rudrān puruṣasūktam kūśmāṇḍīḥ ca japet

original: pitā vatsānām iti vṛṣabhasya dakṣiṇe karṇe paṭhet // Vi_86.13 //
analyzed: pitā vatsānām iti vṛṣabhasya dakṣiṇe karṇe paṭhet

original: vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmaś catuṣpādaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣaḥ hi bhagavān dharmaḥ catuṣpādaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: vṛṇomi tam ahaṃ bhaktyā sa me rakṣatu sarvataḥ // Vi_86.15 //
analyzed: vṛṇomi tam aham bhaktyā sa me rakṣatu sarvatas

original: etaṃ yuvānaṃ patiṃ vo dadāmy anena krīḍantīś carata priyeṇa /
analyzed: etam yuvānam patim vaḥ dadāmi anena krīḍantīḥ carata priyeṇa

original: mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan // Vi_86.16 //
analyzed: mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhiḥ mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan

original: hotur vastrayugaṃ dadyāt suvarṇaṃ kāṃsyam eva ca // Vi_86.17 //
analyzed: hotuḥ vastra yugam dadyāt suvarṇam kāṃsyam eva ca

original: bhojanaṃ bahusarpiṣkaṃ brāhmaṇāṃś cātra bhojayet // Vi_86.18 //
analyzed: bhojanam bahu sarpiṣkam brāhmaṇān ca atra bhojayet

original: utsṛṣṭo vṛṣabho yasmin pibaty atha jalāśaye /
analyzed: utsṛṣṭaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yasmin pibati atha jalāśaye

original: jalāśayaṃ tat sakalaṃ pitṝṃs tasyopatisṭhati // Vi_86.19 //
analyzed: jalāśayam tat sakalam pitṝn tasya upatisṭhati

original: pitṝṇām annapānaṃ tat prabhūtam upatiṣṭhati // Vi_86.20 //
analyzed: pitṝṇām anna pānam tat prabhūtam upatiṣṭhati

original: atha vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ sakhuraṃ saśṛṅgaṃ suvarṇaśṛṅgaṃ raupyakhuraṃ mauktikalāṅgūlabhūṣitaṃ kṛtvāvike ca vastre prasārayet
analyzed: atha vaiśākhyām paurṇamāsyām kṛṣṇājinam sa khuram sa śṛṅgam suvarṇa śṛṅgam raupya khuram mauktika lāṅgūla bhūṣitam kṛtvā āvike ca vastre prasārayet
sarva gandha ratnaiḥ ca alaṃkṛtam kuryāt

original: catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri taijasāni pātrāṇi kṣīradadhimadhughṛtapūrṇāni nidhyāyāhitāgnaye brāhmaṇāyālaṃkṛtāya vāsoyugena pracchāditāya dadyāt
analyzed: catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri taijasāni pātrāṇi kṣīra dadhi madhu ghṛta pūrṇāni nidhyāya āhitāgnaye brāhmaṇāya alaṃkṛtāya vāsaḥ yugena pracchāditāya dadyāt

original: yas tu kṛṣṇājinaṃ dadyāt sakhuraṃ śṛṅgasaṃyutam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu kṛṣṇājinam dadyāt sa khuram śṛṅga saṃyutam

original: tilaiḥ pracchādya vāsobhiḥ sarvaratnair alaṃkṛtam // Vi_87.8 //
analyzed: tilaiḥ pracchādya vāsobhiḥ sarva ratnaiḥ alaṃkṛtam

original: caturantā bhaved dattā pṛthivī nātra saṃśayaḥ // Vi_87.9 //
analyzed: catur antā bhavet dattā pṛthivī na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: dadāti yas tu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam // Vi_87.10 //
analyzed: dadāti yaḥ tu viprāya sarvam tarati duṣkṛtam

original: atha prasūyamānā gauḥ pṛthivī bhavati // Vi_88.1 //
tām alaṃkṛtāṃ brāhmaṇāya dattvā pṛthivīdānaphalam āpnoti // Vi_88.2 //
analyzed: tām alaṃkṛtām brāhmaṇāya dattvā pṛthivī dāna phalam āpnoti
sa vatsā roma tulyāni yugāni ubhayatas mukhīm

original: dattvā svargam avāpnoti śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥ // Vi_88.4 //
tasmāt tu kārttikaṃ māsaṃ bahiḥsnāyī gāyatrījapanirataḥ sakṛd eva haviṣyāśī saṃvatsarakṛtāt pāpāt pūto bhavati // Vi_89.3 //
analyzed: tasmāt tu kārttikam māsam bahis snāyī gāyatrī japa nirataḥ sakṛt eva haviṣya āśī saṃvatsara kṛtāt pāpāt pūtaḥ bhavati
kārttikam sakalam māsam nitya snāyī jita indriyaḥ
japan haviṣya bhuj dāntaḥ sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: mārgaśīrṣaśuklapañcadaśyāṃ mṛgaśirasā yuktāyāṃ cūrṇitalavaṇasya suvarṇanābhaṃ prastham ekaṃ candrodaye brāhmaṇāya pradāpayet // Vi_90.1 //
analyzed: mārgaśīrṣa śukla pañcadaśyām mṛgaśirasā yuktāyām cūrṇita lavaṇasya suvarṇa nābham prastham ekam candra udaye brāhmaṇāya pradāpayet
tasyām gaurasarṣapa kalka udvartita śarīraḥ gavya ghṛta pūrṇa kumbhena abhiṣiktaḥ sarva oṣadhibhiḥ

original: sarvagandhaiḥ sarvabījaiś ca snāto ghṛtena bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ snāpayitvā gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpanaivedyādibhir
analyzed: sarva gandhaiḥ sarva bījaiḥ ca snātaḥ ghṛtena bhagavantam vāsudevam snāpayitvā gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa naivedya ādibhiḥ

original: abhyarcya vaiṣṇavaiḥ śākrair bārhaspatyaiś ca mantraiḥ pāvake hutvā sasuvarṇena ghṛtena
analyzed: abhyarcya vaiṣṇavaiḥ śākraiḥ bārhaspatyaiḥ ca mantraiḥ pāvake hutvā sa suvarṇena ghṛtena

original: tasyāṃ tilaiḥ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā pūto bhavati // Vi_90.6 //
analyzed: tasyām tilaiḥ śrāddham kṛtvā pūtaḥ bhavati

original: tasyāṃ brāhmaṇāya susaṃskṛtaṃ svāstīrṇaṃ śayanaṃ nivedya bhāryāṃ manojñāṃ rūpavatīṃ draviṇavatīṃ cāpnoti // Vi_90.7 //
analyzed: tasyām brāhmaṇāya su saṃskṛtam su āstīrṇam śayanam nivedya bhāryām manojñām rūpavatīm draviṇavatīm ca āpnoti
tasyām citra vastra pradānena saubhāgyam āpnoti

original: tasyāṃ brāhmaṇasaptakaṃ kṣaudrayuktais tilaiḥ saṃtarpya dharmarājānaṃ prīṇayitvā pāpebhyaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_90.10 //
analyzed: tasyām brāhmaṇa saptakam kṣaudra yuktaiḥ tilaiḥ saṃtarpya dharmarājānam prīṇayitvā pāpebhyaḥ pūtaḥ bhavati
tasyām chatra upānaha pradānena gavā ādhipatyam prāpnoti

original: āṣāḍhyām āṣāḍhāyuktāyām annapānadānena tad evākṣayyam āpnoti // Vi_90.12 //
analyzed: āṣāḍhyām āṣāḍhā yuktāyām anna pāna dānena tat eva akṣayyam āpnoti

original: śrāvaṇyāṃ śravaṇayuktāyāṃ jaladhenuṃ sānnāṃ vāsoyugāc chāditāṃ dattvā svargam āpnoti // Vi_90.13 //
analyzed: śrāvaṇyām śravaṇa yuktāyām jaladhenum sa annām vāsaḥ yugāt chāditām dattvā svargam āpnoti

original: prauṣṭhapadyāṃ proṣṭhapadāyuktāyāṃ godānena sarvapāpavinirmukto bhavati // Vi_90.14 //
analyzed: prauṣṭhapadyām proṣṭhapada yuktāyām godānena sarva pāpa vinirmuktaḥ bhavati

original: āśvayujyām aśvinīgate candramasi ghṛtapūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ suvarṇayutaṃ viprāya dattvā dīptāgnir bhavati // Vi_90.15 //
analyzed: āśvayujyām aśvinī gate candramasi ghṛta pūrṇam bhājanam suvarṇa yutam viprāya dattvā dīpta agniḥ bhavati

original: tasyāṃ sitam ukṣāṇam anyavarṇaṃ vā śaśāṅkodye sarvasasyaratnagandhopetaṃ dīpamadhye brāhmaṇāya dattvā kāntārabhayaṃ na paśyati // Vi_90.16
analyzed: tasyām sitam ukṣāṇam anya varṇam vā śaśāṅka udye sarva sasya ratna gandha upetam dīpa madhye brāhmaṇāya dattvā kāntāra bhayam na paśyati

original: vaiśākhaśuklatṛtīyāyām upoṣito 'kṣataiḥ śrīvāsudevam abhyarcya tān eva hutvā dattvā ca sarvapāpebhyaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_90.17 //
analyzed: vaiśākha śukla tṛtīyāyām upoṣitaḥ kṣataiḥ śrī vāsudevam abhyarcya tān eva hutvā dattvā ca sarva pāpebhyaḥ pūtaḥ bhavati

original: yac ca tasminn ahani prayacchati tad akṣayyatām āpnoti // Vi_90.18 //
analyzed: yat ca tasmin ahani prayacchati tat akṣayya tām āpnoti

original: pauṣyāṃ samatītāyāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣadvādaśyāṃ sopavāsas tilaiḥ snātas tilokakaṃ dattvā tilair vāsudevam abhyarcya tān eva hutvā dattvā bhuktvā ca  #
analyzed: pauṣyām samatītāyām kṛṣṇa pakṣa dvādaśyām sa upavāsaḥ tilaiḥ snātaḥ tilokakam dattvā tilaiḥ vāsudevam abhyarcya tān eva hutvā dattvā bhuktvā ca

original: māghyāṃ samatītāyāṃ kṛṣṇadvādaśyāṃ sopavāsaḥ śravaṇaṃ prāpya śrīvāsudevāgrato mahāvartidvayena dīpadvayaṃ dadyāt // Vi_90.20 //
analyzed: māghyām samatītāyām kṛṣṇa dvādaśyām sa upavāsaḥ śravaṇam prāpya śrī vāsudeva agratas mahā varti dvayena dīpa dvayam dadyāt

original: dakṣiṇapārśve mahārajanaraktena samagreṇa vāsasā ghṛtatulām aṣṭādhikāṃ dattvā // Vi_90.21 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pārśve mahārajana raktena samagreṇa vāsasā ghṛta tulām aṣṭa adhikām dattvā

original: vāmapārśve tilatailayutāṃ sāṣṭāṃ dattvā śvetena samagreṇa vāsasā // Vi_90.22 //
analyzed: vāma pārśve tila taila yutām sāṣṭām dattvā śvetena samagreṇa vāsasā

original: etat kṛtvā yasmin rāṣṭre 'bhijāyate yasmin deśe yasmin kule tatrojjvalo bhavati // Vi_90.23 //
analyzed: etat kṛtvā yasmin rāṣṭre bhijāyate yasmin deśe yasmin kule tatra ujjvalaḥ bhavati

original: āśvinaṃ sakalaṃ māsaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pratyahaṃ ghṛtaṃ pradāyāśvinau prīṇayitvā rūpabhāg bhavati // Vi_90.24 //
analyzed: āśvinam sakalam māsam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pratyaham ghṛtam pradāya aśvinau prīṇayitvā rūpa bhāj bhavati

original: tasminn eva māsi pratyahaṃ gorasair brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā rājyabhāg bhavati // Vi_90.25 //
analyzed: tasmin eva māsi pratyaham gorasaiḥ brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā rājya bhāj bhavati

original: pratimāsaṃ revatīyute candramasi madhughṛtayutaṃ pāyasaṃ revatīprītyai paramānnaṃ brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā revatīṃ prīṇayitvā rūpasya bhāgī bhavati
analyzed: pratimāsam revatī yute candramasi madhu ghṛta yutam pāyasam revatī prītyai paramānnam brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā revatīm prīṇayitvā rūpasya bhāgī bhavati

original: māghe māsy agniṃ pratyahaṃ tilair hutvā saghṛtaṃ kulmāṣaṃ brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā dīptāgnir bhavati // Vi_90.27 //
analyzed: māghe māsi agnim pratyaham tilaiḥ hutvā sa ghṛtam kulmāṣam brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā dīpta agniḥ bhavati

original: sarvāṃ caturdaśīṃ nadījale snātvā dharmarājānaṃ pūjayitvā sarvapāpebhyaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_90.28 //
analyzed: sarvām caturdaśīm nadī jale snātvā dharmarājānam pūjayitvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ pūtaḥ bhavati
yadi icchet vipulān bhogān candra sūrya graha upagān

original: prātaḥsnāyī bhaven nityaṃ dvau māsau māghaphālgunau // Vi_90.29 //
analyzed: prātar snāyī bhavet nityam dvau māsau māgha phālgunau

original: atha kūpakartus tatpravṛtte pānīye duṣkṛtasyārdhaṃ vinaśyati // Vi_91.1 //
analyzed: atha kūpa kartuḥ tad pravṛtte pānīye duṣkṛtasya ardham vinaśyati

original: taḍāgakṛn nityatṛpto vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnute // Vi_91.2 //
analyzed: taḍāga kṛt nitya tṛptaḥ vāruṇam lokam aśnute

original: vṛkṣāropayitur vṛkṣāḥ paraloke putrā bhavanti // Vi_91.4 //
analyzed: vṛkṣa āropayituḥ vṛkṣāḥ para loke putrāḥ bhavanti
vṛkṣa pradaḥ vṛkṣa prasūnaiḥ devān prīṇayati

original: devāyatanakārī yasya devasyāyatanaṃ karoti tasyaiva lokam āpnoti // Vi_91.10 //
analyzed: devāyatana kārī yasya devasya āyatanam karoti tasya eva lokam āpnoti
dīpa pradānena cakṣuṣmān sarvatra ujjvalaḥ ca
deva nirmālya apanayanāt godāna phalam āpnoti

original: devagṛhamārjanāt tadupalepanāt brāhmaṇocchiṣṭamārjanāt pādaśaucād akalyaparicaraṇāc ca // Vi_91.18 //
analyzed: devagṛha mārjanāt tad upalepanāt brāhmaṇa ucchiṣṭa mārjanāt pāda śaucāt akalya paricaraṇāt ca

original: punaḥ saṃskārakartā ca labhate maulikaṃ phalam // Vi_91.19 //
analyzed: punar saṃskāra kartā ca labhate maulikam phalam

original: gocarmamātrām api bhuvaṃ pradāya sarvapāpebhyaḥ pūto bhavati // Vi_92.4 //
analyzed: gocarma mātrām api bhuvam pradāya sarva pāpebhyaḥ pūtaḥ bhavati

original: suvarṇaśṛṅgīṃ raupyakhurāṃ muktālāṅgūlāṃ kāṃsyopadohāṃ vastrottarīyāṃ dattvā dhenuromasaṃkhyāni varṣāṇi svargalokam āpnoti // Vi_92.8 //
analyzed: suvarṇa śṛṅgīm raupya khurām muktā lāṅgūlām kāṃsya upadohām vastra uttarīyām dattvā dhenu roma saṃkhyāni varṣāṇi svarga lokam āpnoti

original: dāntaṃ dhuraṃdharaṃ dattvā daśadhenuprado bhavati // Vi_92.10 //
analyzed: dāntam dhuraṃdharam dattvā daśa dhenu pradaḥ bhavati

original: taijasānāṃ pātrāṇāṃ pradānena pātrībhavati sarvakāmānām // Vi_92.15 //
analyzed: taijasānām pātrāṇām pradānena pātrībhavati sarva kāmānām
tālavṛnta cāmara pradānena adhva sukhi tvam

original: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsti dayitaṃ gṛhe /
analyzed: yat yat iṣṭatamam loke yat ca asti dayitam gṛhe

original: tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā // Vi_92.32 //
analyzed: tat tat guṇavate deyam tat eva akṣayam icchatā

original: abrāhmaṇe dattaṃ tatsamam eva pāralaukikam // Vi_93.1 //
analyzed: a brāhmaṇe dattam tad samam eva pāralaukikam

original: purohitas tv ātmana eva pātram // Vi_93.5 //
na vāry api prayaccheta baiḍālavratike dvije /
analyzed: na vāri api prayaccheta baiḍālavratike dvije

original: na bakavratike pāpe nāvedavidi dharmavit // Vi_93.7 //
analyzed: na bakavratike pāpe na a veda vidi dharma vid
dharma dhvajī sadā lubdhaḥ chādmikaḥ loka dāmbhikaḥ
adhas dṛṣṭiḥ naikṛtikaḥ sva artha sādhana tatparaḥ

original: śaṭho mithyāvinītaś ca bakavrataparo dvijaḥ // Vi_93.9 //
analyzed: śaṭhaḥ mithyā vinītaḥ ca bakavrata paraḥ dvijaḥ

original: ye bakavratino loke ye ca mārjāraliṅginaḥ /
analyzed: ye bakavratinaḥ loke ye ca mārjāraliṅginaḥ

original: te patanty andhatāmisre tena pāpena karmaṇā // Vi_93.10 //
analyzed: te patanti andhatāmisre tena pāpena karmaṇā

original: na dharmasyāpadeśena pāpaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caret /
analyzed: na dharmasya apadeśena pāpam kṛtvā vratam caret

original: vratena pāpaṃ pracchādya kurvan strīśūdradambhanam // Vi_93.11 //
analyzed: vratena pāpam pracchādya kurvan strī śūdra dambhanam
pretya iha ca īdṛśaḥ vipraḥ garhyate brahma vādibhiḥ

original: chadmanācaritaṃ yac ca vrataṃ rakṣāṃsi gacchati // Vi_93.12 //
analyzed: chadmanā ācaritam yat ca vratam rakṣāṃsi gacchati
aliṅgī liṅgi veṣeṇa yaḥ vṛttim upajīvati

original: sa liṅgināṃ haraty enas tiryagyonau prajāyate // Vi_93.13 //
analyzed: sa liṅginām harati enaḥ tiryagyonau prajāyate

original: na dānaṃ yaśase dadyān na bhayān nopakāriṇe /
analyzed: na dānam yaśase dadyāt na bhayāt na upakāriṇe

original: na nṛtyagītaśīlebhyo dharmārtham iti niścitam // Vi_93.14 //
analyzed: na nṛtya gīta śīlebhyaḥ dharma artham iti niścitam
gṛhī valī palita darśane vana āśrayaḥ bhavet

original: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya tayānugmyamāno vā // Vi_94.3 //
analyzed: putreṣu bhāryām nikṣipya tayā an ugmyamānaḥ vā

original: aphālakṛṣṭena pañca yajñān na hāpayet // Vi_94.5 //
analyzed: a phāla kṛṣṭena pañca yajñān na hāpayet
jaṭā śmaśru loma nakhān ca bibhṛyāt
kapota vṛttiḥ māsa nicayaḥ saṃvatsara nicayaḥ vā
saṃvatsara nicayī pūrva nicitam āśvayujyām jahyāt

original: grāmād āhṛtya vāśnīyād aṣṭau grāsān vane vasan /
analyzed: grāmāt āhṛtya vā aśnīyāt aṣṭau grāsān vane vasan

original: puṭenaiva palāśena pāṇinā śakalena vā // Vi_94.13 //
analyzed: puṭena eva palāśena pāṇinā śakalena vā
eka antara dvi antara tri antara āśī vā syāt

original: yavānnaṃ pakṣāntayor vā sakṛd aśnīyāt // Vi_95.11 //
analyzed: yava annam pakṣa antayoḥ vā sakṛt aśnīyāt

original: tapomadhyaṃ tapo 'ntaṃ ca tapasā ca tathā dhṛtam // Vi_95.15 //
analyzed: tapaḥ madhyam ca tapasā ca tathā dhṛtam

original: yad duṣcaraṃ yad durāpaṃ yad dūraṃ yac ca duṣkaram /
analyzed: yat duṣcaram yat durāpam yat dūram yat ca duṣkaram

original: sarvaṃ tat tapasā sādhyaṃ tapo hi duratikramam // Vi_95.16 //
analyzed: sarvam tat tapasā sādhyam tapaḥ hi duratikramam

original: atha triṣv āśrameṣu pakvakaṣāyaḥ prājāpatyām iṣṭiṃ kṛtvā sarvavedasaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā pravrajyāśramī syāt // Vi_96.1 //
analyzed: atha triṣu āśrameṣu pakva kaṣāyaḥ prājāpatyām iṣṭim kṛtvā sarvavedasam dakṣiṇām dattvā pravrajya āśramī syāt

original: ātmany agnīn āropya bhikṣārthaṃ grāmam iyāt // Vi_96.2 //
analyzed: ātmani agnīn āropya bhikṣā artham grāmam iyāt

original: bhuktavati jane atīte pātrasaṃpāte bhaikṣam ādadyāt // Vi_96.6 //
analyzed: bhuktavati jane atīte pātrasaṃpāte bhaikṣam ādadyāt
mṛd maye dāru pātre lābu pātre vā

original: teṣāṃ ca tasyādbhiḥ śuddhiḥ syāt // Vi_96.8 //
analyzed: teṣām ca tasya adbhiḥ śuddhiḥ syāt

original: na grāme dvitīyāṃ rātrim āvaset // Vi_96.12 //

analyzed: kaupīna ācchādana mātram eva vasanam ādadyāt

original: nākalyāṇaṃ na kalyāṇaṃ tayor api ca cintayet // Vi_96.23 //

śārīra mānasa āgantuka vyādhibhiḥ ca upatāpam
tatra ca śīta uṣṇa duḥkha anubhavanam
janma samaye yoni saṃkaṭa nirgamanāt mahat duḥkha anubhavanam

original: yauvane ca viṣayāprāptāv amārgeṇa tadavāptau viṣayasevanān narake patanam // Vi_96.36 //
analyzed: yauvane ca viṣaya aprāptau amārgeṇa tad avāptau viṣaya sevanāt narake patanam

original: apriyair vasatiṃ priyaiś ca viprayogam // Vi_96.37 //

analyzed: evam asmin satata yāyini saṃsāre na kiṃcid sukham

analyzed: yat api kiṃcid duḥkha abhāva apekṣayā sukha saṃjñam tat api anityam

śarīram ca idam sapta dhātukam paśyet

kāma krodha lobha moha mada mātsarya sthānam

original: asthnāṃ tribhiḥ śataiḥ ṣaṣtyadhikair dhāryamāṇam // Vi_96.55 //
analyzed: asthnām tribhiḥ śataiḥ ṣaṣti adhikaiḥ dhāryamāṇam

original: arbudaiḥ sthālakaiś ca sārdhaṃ dvāsaptatiḥ pārśvakāḥ // Vi_96.76 //
analyzed: arbudaiḥ sthālakaiḥ ca sārdham dvāsaptatiḥ pārśvakāḥ

original: nābhirājo gudaṃ śukraṃ śoṇitaṃ śaṅkhakau mūrdhā kaṇṭho hṛdayaṃ ceti prāṇāyatanāṇi // Vi_96.89 //
analyzed: nābhi rājaḥ gudam śukram śoṇitam śaṅkhakau mūrdhā kaṇṭhaḥ hṛdayam ca iti prāṇa āyatanāṇi

original: bāhudvayaṃ jaṅghādvayaṃ madhyaṃ śīrṣam iti ṣaḍaṅgāni // Vi_96.90 //
analyzed: bāhu dvayam jaṅghā dvayam madhyam śīrṣam iti ṣaḍaṅgāni

original: vasā vapā avahananaṃ nābhiḥ klomā yakṛt plīhā kṣudrāntraṃ vṛkkakau bastiḥ purīṣādhānaṃ āmāśayaḥ hṛdayaṃ sthūlāntraṃ gudam udaraṃ gudakoṣṭham
analyzed: vasā vapā avahananam nābhiḥ klomā yakṛt plīhā kṣudrāntram vṛkkakau vastiḥ purīṣādhānam āmāśayaḥ hṛdayam sthūlāntram gudam udaram guda koṣṭham

original: kanīnike akṣikūṭe śaṣkulī karṇau karṇapatrakau gaṇḍau bhruvau śaṅkhau dantaveṣṭau
analyzed: kanīnike akṣikūṭe śaṣkulī karṇau karṇapatrakau gaṇḍau bhruvau śaṅkhau dantaveṣṭau

original: oṣṭhau kakundare vaṅkṣaṇau vṛṣaṇau vṛkkau śleṣmasaṃghātikau stanau upajihvā sphicau
analyzed: oṣṭhau kakundare vaṅkṣaṇau vṛṣaṇau vṛkkau śleṣma saṃghātikau stanau upajihvā sphicau

original: bāhū jaṅghe ūrū piṇḍike tālūdaraṃ bastiśīrṣau cibukaṃ galaśuṇḍike avaṭuś cety asmin
analyzed: bāhū jaṅghe ūrū piṇḍike tālu udaram bastiśīrṣau cibukam galaśuṇḍike avaṭuḥ ca iti asmin

original: hastau pādau pāyūpasthaṃ jihveti karmendriyāṇi // Vi_96.95 //
analyzed: hastau pādau pāyu upastham jihvā iti karmendriyāṇi

original: mano buddhir ātmā cāvyaktam itīndriyātītāḥ // Vi_96.96 //
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ātmā ca avyaktam iti indriya atītāḥ

original: idaṃ śarīraṃ vasudhe kṣetram ity abhidhīyate /
analyzed: idam śarīram vasudhe kṣetram iti abhidhīyate

original: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajñam iti tadvidaḥ // Vi_96.97 //
analyzed: etat yaḥ vetti tam prāhuḥ kṣetrajñam iti tad vidaḥ

original: kṣetrajñam api māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhāvini /
analyzed: kṣetrajñam api mām viddhi sarva kṣetreṣu bhāvini

original: ūrusthottānacaraṇaḥ savye kare karam itaraṃ nyasya tālusthācalajihvo dantair dantān
analyzed: ūru stha uttāna caraṇaḥ savye kare karam itaram nyasya tālu stha acala jihvaḥ dantaiḥ dantān

original: asaṃspṛśan svaṃ nāsikāgraṃ paśyan diśaś cānavalokayan vibhīḥ praśāntātmā caturviṃśatyā
analyzed: a saṃspṛśan svam nāsikā agram paśyan diśaḥ ca an avalokayan vibhīḥ praśānta ātmā caturviṃśatyā

original: nityam atīndriyam aguṇaṃ śabdasparśarūparasagandhātītaṃ sarvajñam atisthūlam // Vi_97.2 //
analyzed: nityam atīndriyam aguṇam śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha atītam sarvajñam ati sthūlam

original: dhyānaniratasya ca saṃvatsareṇa yogāvirbhāvo bhavati // Vi_97.6 //
analyzed: dhyāna niratasya ca saṃvatsareṇa yoga āvirbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: atha nirākāre lakṣabandhaṃ kartuṃ na śaknoti,
analyzed: atha nirākāre lakṣa bandham kartum na śaknoti

original: tadā pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśamanobuddhyātmāvyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ dhyātvā tatra labdhalakṣaḥ tatparityajyāparam aparaṃ dhyāyet // Vi_97.7
analyzed: tadā pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa manaḥ buddhi ātma avyakta puruṣāṇām pūrvam pūrvam dhyātvā tatra labdhalakṣaḥ tat parityajya aparam aparam dhyāyet  /

original: tatrāpy asamarthaḥ svahṛdayapadmasya avāṅmukhasya madhye dīpavat puruṣaṃ dhyāyet // Vi_97.9 //
analyzed: tatra api asamarthaḥ sva hṛdaya padmasya avāṅmukhasya madhye dīpa vat puruṣam dhyāyet

original: tatrāpy asamartho bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinam aṅgadinaṃ śrīvatsāṅkaṃ
analyzed: tatra api asamarthaḥ bhagavantam vāsudevam kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam aṅgadinam śrīvatsa aṅkam

original: yad dhyāyati tad āpnotīti dhyānaguhyam // Vi_97.11 //
analyzed: yat dhyāyati tat āpnoti iti dhyāna guhyam

original: tasmāt sarvam eva kṣaraṃ tyaktvā akṣaram eva dhyāyet // Vi_97.12 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvam eva kṣaram tyaktvā akṣaram eva dhyāyet

original: na ca puruṣaṃ vinā kiṃcid apy akṣaram asti // Vi_97.13 //
analyzed: na ca puruṣam vinā kiṃcid api akṣaram asti

original: puram ākramya sakalaṃ śete yasmān mahāprabhuḥ /
analyzed: puram ākramya sakalam śete yasmāt mahā prabhuḥ

original: tasmāt puruṣa ity evaṃ procyate tattvacintakaiḥ // Vi_97.15 //
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣaḥ iti evam procyate tattva cintakaiḥ
prāk rātra apararātreṣu yogī nityam atandritaḥ

original: dhyāyeta puruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ nirguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśakam // Vi_97.16 //

analyzed: tattva ātmānam agamyam ca sarva tattva vivarjitam

original: aśaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca // Vi_97.17 //
analyzed: aśaktam sarva bhṛt ca eva nirguṇam guṇa bhoktṛ ca

original: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca /
analyzed: bahis antar ca bhūtānām acaram caram eva ca

original: sūkṣmatvāt tadavijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat // Vi_97.18 //
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt tat avijñeyam dūra stham ca antike ca tat

original: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūtena vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
analyzed: avibhaktam ca bhūtena vibhaktam iva ca sthitam
bhūta bhavya bhavat rūpam grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca

original: jyotiṣām api tajjyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate /
analyzed: jyotiṣām api tat jyotiḥ tamasaḥ param ucyate

original: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya dhiṣṭhitam // Vi_97.20 //
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam jñāna gamyam hṛdi sarvasya dhiṣṭhitam

original: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ /
analyzed: iti kṣetram tathā jñānam jñeyam ca uktam samāsatas
mad bhaktaḥ etat vijñāya mad bhāvāya upapadyate

original: ity evam uktā vasumatī jānubhyāṃ śirasā ca namaskāraṃ kṛtvovāca // Vi_98.1 //
analyzed: iti evam uktā vasumatī jānubhyām śirasā ca namaskāram kṛtvā uvāca

original: bhagavan, tvatsamīpe satatam evaṃ catvāri bhūtāni kṛtālayāni ākāśaḥ śaṅkharūpī,
analyzed: bhagavan tvad samīpe satatam evam catvāri bhūtāni kṛta ālayāni ākāśaḥ śaṅkha rūpī

original: aham apy anenaiva rūpeṇa bhagavatpādamadhye parivartinī bhavitum icchāmi // Vi_98.2 //
analyzed: aham api anena eva rūpeṇa bhagavat pāda madhye parivartinī bhavitum icchāmi

original: ity evam ukto bhagavāṃs tathety uvāca // Vi_98.3 //
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ bhagavān tathā iti uvāca
vasudhā api labdha kāmā tathā cakre

original: stutvā tv evaṃ prasannena manasā pṛthivī tadā /
analyzed: stutvā tu evam prasannena manasā pṛthivī tadā

original: uvāca saṃmukhaṃ devīṃ labdhakāmā vasuṃdharā // Vi_98.102 //
analyzed: uvāca saṃmukham devīm labdha kāmā vasuṃdharā

original: dṛṣṭvā śriyaṃ devadevasya viṣṇor gṛhītapādāṃ tapasā jvalantīm /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā śriyam devadevasya viṣṇoḥ gṛhīta pādām tapasā jvalantīm

original: sutaptajāmbūnadacāruvarṇāṃ papraccha devīṃ vasudhā prahṛṣṭā // Vi_99.1 //
analyzed: su tapta jāmbūnada cāru varṇām papraccha devīm vasudhā prahṛṣṭā
unnidra kokanada cāru kare vareṇye unnidra kokanada nābhi gṛhīta pāde
unnidra kokanada sadma sadā sthiti ite unnidra kokanada madhya samāna varṇe
nīla abja netre tapanīya varṇe śukla ambare ratna vibhūṣita aṅgi

original: candrānane sūryasamānabhāse mahāprabhāve jagataḥ pradhāne // Vi_99.3 //
analyzed: candra ānane sūrya samāna bhāse mahā prabhāve jagataḥ pradhāne

original: tvam eva nidrā jagataḥ pradhānā lakṣmīr dhṛtiḥ śrīr viratir jayā ca /
analyzed: tvam eva nidrā jagataḥ pradhānā lakṣmīḥ dhṛtiḥ śrīḥ viratiḥ jayā ca

original: kāntiḥ prabhā kīrtir atho vibhūtiḥ sarasvatī vāg atha pāvanī ca // Vi_99.4 //
analyzed: kāntiḥ prabhā kīrtiḥ atho vibhūtiḥ sarasvatī vāc atha pāvanī ca

original: svadhā titikṣā vasudhā pratiṣṭhā sthitiḥ sudīkṣā ca tathā sunītiḥ /
analyzed: svadhā titikṣā vasudhā pratiṣṭhā sthitiḥ sudīkṣā ca tathā sunītiḥ

original: khyātir viśālā ca tathānasūyā svāhā ca medhā ca tathaiva buddhiḥ // Vi_99.5 //
analyzed: khyātiḥ viśālā ca tathā anasūyā svāhā ca medhā ca tathā eva buddhiḥ

original: ākramya sarvaṃ tu yathā trilokīṃ tiṣṭhaty ayaṃ devavaro 'sitākṣi /
analyzed: ākramya sarvam tu yathā trilokīm tiṣṭhati ayam sita akṣi

original: tathā sthitā tvaṃ varade tathāpi pṛcchāmy ahaṃ te vasatiṃ vibhūteḥ // Vi_99.6 //
analyzed: tathā sthitā tvam vara de tathā api pṛcchāmi aham te vasatim vibhūteḥ

original: ity evam uktā vasudhāṃ babhāṣe lakṣmīs tadā devavarāgrataḥsthā /
analyzed: iti evam uktā vasudhām babhāṣe lakṣmīḥ tadā deva vara agratas sthā

original: sadā sthitāhaṃ madhusūdanasya devasya pārśve tapanīyavarṇe // Vi_99.7 //
analyzed: sadā sthitā aham madhusūdanasya devasya pārśve tapanīya varṇe

original: asyājñayā yaṃ manasā smarāmi śriyā yutaṃ taṃ pravadanti santaḥ /
analyzed: asya ājñayā yam manasā smarāmi śriyā yutam tam pravadanti santaḥ

original: saṃsmāraṇe cāpy atha yatra cāhaṃ sthitā sadā tac chṛṇu lokadhātri // Vi_99.8 //
analyzed: saṃsmāraṇe ca api atha yatra ca aham sthitā sadā tat śṛṇu lokadhātri

original: vasāmy athārke ca niśākare ca tārāgaṇāḍhye gagane vimeghe /
analyzed: vasāmi atha arke ca niśākare ca tārā gaṇa āḍhye gagane vimeghe

original: meghe tathā lambapayodhare ca śakrāyudhāḍhye ca taḍitprakāśe // Vi_99.9 //
analyzed: meghe tathā lamba payodhare ca śakrāyudha āḍhye ca taḍit prakāśe

original: tathā suvarṇe vimale ca rūpye ratneṣu vastreṣv amaleṣu bhūme /
analyzed: tathā suvarṇe vimale ca rūpye ratneṣu vastreṣu amaleṣu bhūme

original: prāsādamālāsu ca pāṇḍurāsu devālayeṣu dhvajabhūṣiteṣu // Vi_99.10 //
analyzed: prāsāda mālāsu ca pāṇḍurāsu devālayeṣu dhvaja bhūṣiteṣu

original: sadyaḥ kṛte cāpy atha gomaye ca matte gajendre turage prahṛṣṭe /
analyzed: sadyas kṛte ca api atha gomaye ca matte gaja indre turage prahṛṣṭe

original: vṛṣe tathā darpasamanvite ca vipre tathaivādhyayanaprapanne // Vi_99.11 //
analyzed: vṛṣe tathā darpa samanvite ca vipre tathā eva adhyayana prapanne

original: siṃhāsane cāmalake ca bilve chatre ca śaṅkhe ca tathaiva padme /
analyzed: siṃhāsane ca āmalake ca bilve chatre ca śaṅkhe ca tathā eva padme

original: dīpte hutāśe vimale ca khḍga ādarśabimbe ca tathā sthitāham // Vi_99.12 //
analyzed: dīpte hutāśe vimale ca khḍge ādarśa bimbe ca tathā sthitā aham
pūrṇa uda kumbheṣu sa cāmareṣu sa tālavṛnteṣu vibhūṣiteṣu

original: bhṛṅgārapātreṣu manohareṣu mṛdi sthitāhaṃ ca navoddhṛtāyām // Vi_99.13 //
analyzed: bhṛṅgāra pātreṣu manohareṣu mṛdi sthitā aham ca nava uddhṛtāyām

original: kṣīre tathā sarpiṣi śādbale ca kṣaudre tathā dadhni puraṃdhrigātre /
analyzed: kṣīre tathā sarpiṣi śādbale ca kṣaudre tathā dadhni puraṃdhri gātre

original: dehe kumāryāś ca tathā surāṇāṃ tapasvināṃ yajñahutāṃ ca dehe // Vi_99.14 //
analyzed: dehe kumāryāḥ ca tathā surāṇām tapasvinām yajña hutām ca dehe

original: śare ca saṃgrāmavinirgate ca sthitā mṛte svargasadaḥprayāte /
analyzed: śare ca saṃgrāma vinirgate ca sthitāḥ mṛte svarga sadaḥ prayāte

original: vedadhvanau cāpy atha śaṅkhaśabde svāhāsvadhāyām atha vādyaśabde // Vi_99.15 //
analyzed: veda dhvanau ca api atha śaṅkha śabde svāhā svadhāyām atha vādya śabde

original: rājyābhiṣeke ca tathā vivāhe yajñe vare snātaśirasy athāpi /
analyzed: rājya abhiṣeke ca tathā vivāhe yajñe vare snāta śirasi atha api

original: puṣpeṣu śukleṣu ca parvateṣu phaleṣu ramyeṣu saridvarāsu // Vi_99.16 //
analyzed: puṣpeṣu śukleṣu ca parvateṣu phaleṣu ramyeṣu sarit varāsu

original: saraḥsu pūrṇeṣu tathā jaleṣu saśādvalāyāṃ bhuvi padmakhaṇḍe /
analyzed: saraḥsu pūrṇeṣu tathā jaleṣu sa śādvalāyām bhuvi padma khaṇḍe

original: vane ca vatse ca śiśau prahṛṣṭe sādhau nare dharmaparāyaṇe ca // Vi_99.17 //
analyzed: vane ca vatse ca śiśau prahṛṣṭe sādhau nare dharma parāyaṇe ca

original: ācāraseviny atha śāstranitye vinītaveṣe ca tathā suveṣe /
analyzed: ācāra sevini atha śāstra nitye vinīta veṣe ca tathā su veṣe

original: suśuddhadānte malavarjite ca mṛṣṭāśane cātithipūjake ca // Vi_99.18 //
analyzed: su śuddha dānte mala varjite ca mṛṣṭa aśane ca atithi pūjake ca

original: svadāratuṣṭe nirate ca dharme dharmotkaṭe cātyaśanād vimukte /
analyzed: sva dāra tuṣṭe nirate ca dharme dharma utkaṭe ca ati aśanāt vimukte

original: sadā sapuṣpe sasugandhigātre sugandhalipte ca vibhūṣite ca // Vi_99.19 //
analyzed: sadā sa puṣpe sa sugandhi gātre su gandha lipte ca vibhūṣite ca

original: satye sthite bhūtahite niviṣṭe kṣamānvite krodhavivarjite ca /
analyzed: satye sthite bhūta hite niviṣṭe kṣamā anvite krodha vivarjite ca

original: svakāryadakṣe parakāryadakṣe kalyāṇacitte ca sadā vinīte // Vi_99.20 //
analyzed: sva kārya dakṣe para kārya dakṣe kalyāṇa citte ca sadā vinīte
nārīṣu nityam su vibhūṣitāsu pativratāsu priya vādinīṣu
a mukta hastāsu suta anvitāsu su gupta bhāṇḍāsu bali priyāsu
saṃmṛṣṭa veśmāsu jita indriyāsu kali vyapetāsu a vilolupāsu

original: dharmavyapekṣāsu dayānvitāsu sthitā sadāhaṃ madhusūdane ca // Vi_99.22 //
analyzed: dharma vyapekṣāsu dayā anvitāsu sthitā sadā aham madhusūdane ca

original: nimeṣamātraṃ ca vinā kṛtāhaṃ na jātu tiṣṭhe puruṣottamena // Vi_99.23 //
analyzed: nimeṣa mātram ca vinā kṛtā aham na jātu tiṣṭhe puruṣottamena

original: dharmaśāstram idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ svayaṃ devena bhāṣitam /
analyzed: dharma śāstram idam śreṣṭham svayam devena bhāṣitam

original: ye dvijā dhārayiṣyanti teṣāṃ svarge gatiḥ parā // Vi_100.1 //
analyzed: ye dvijāḥ dhārayiṣyanti teṣām svarge gatiḥ parā

original: idaṃ pavitraṃ maṅgalyaṃ svargyam āyuṣyam eva ca /
analyzed: idam pavitram maṅgalyam svargyam āyuṣyam eva ca

original: jñānaṃ caiva yaśasyaṃ ca dhanasaubhāgyavardhanam // Vi_100.2 //
analyzed: jñānam ca eva yaśasyam ca dhana saubhāgya vardhanam

original: adhyetavyaṃ dhāraṇīyaṃ śrāvyaṃ śrotavyam eva ca /
analyzed: adhyetavyam dhāraṇīyam śrāvyam śrotavyam eva ca

original: śrāddheṣu śrāvaṇīyaṃ ca bhūtikāmair naraiḥ sadā // Vi_100.3 //
analyzed: śrāddheṣu śrāvaṇīyam ca bhūti kāmaiḥ naraiḥ sadā

original: ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ bhūtikāmo naraḥ sadā /
analyzed: yaḥ idam paṭhate nityam bhūti kāmaḥ naraḥ sadā

original: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ kathitaṃ ca dhare tava // Vi_100.4 //
analyzed: idam rahasyam paramam kathitam ca dhare tava

original: mayā prasannena jagaddhitārthaṃ saubhāgyam etat paramaṃ yaśasyam /
analyzed: mayā prasannena jagat hita artham saubhāgyam etat paramam yaśasyam
duḥsvapna nāśam bahu puṇya yuktam śiva ālayam śāśvata dharma śāstram
